1b1(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta/ 
1b2(rgyud): na da guh+Na d+hA tu/  dAr
1b3(rgyud): ma hA yA na sU tra/ bodi skad du/ 'phags pade bzhin
2a1(rgyud): / gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po
2a2(rgyud): gsang ba ring bsal gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i ga zungs// theg pa chen
2a3(rgyud): po'i mdo// sangs rgya sa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
2a4(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2b1(rgyud): yul ma gad+hAn dri ma med pa'i kun dga' rangab dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge
2b2(rgyud): 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham
2b3(rgyud): yin dang / na mkha' lding da/ nga/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pod mi dang mi ma yin dbye ba
2b4(rgyud): mang po rnams dang / yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing / mdun du byas nas thabs gcig tu
2b5(rgyud): bzhug so// de nas 'khor gyi nang de nas bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/ gsal ba
3a1(rgyud): yid gzhungs pa / mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba
3a2(rgyud): dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gas la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bas
3a3(rgyud): ba dang ldan pa/ zhib mo ba/ dgas pa/ sems can thams cad de/ rang dge ba'i don la brtson pa
3a4(rgyud): nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba drug pa/ rdzas mang ba so bya dadun sum tshogs pa yin no// 
3a5(rgyud): de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
3a6(rgyud): bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod do// na bza' rin
3b1(rgyud): 'bum ri ba yang gsol bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
3b2(rgyud): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sras
3b3(rgyud): kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gi sdum par gdugs tshed la spun 'dren na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
3b4(rgyud): bar mdzad par ci gnang // de na/ nyes bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri me/ de legs snang gis spun dngas par
3b5(rgyud): thugs su chud nas/ ci'ang mi gsu nga bar gyur par gnang ngo // de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
3b6(rgyud): snga nas cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ des rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / 
3b7(rgyud): zhal zas dang / yo byad dang / zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas/ bkod pa chen pos bka shis kyi gzhal med chen po
4a1(rgyud): dang / gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang bdug pa khyer te 'khor mang po dang / sil snyan dang
4a2(rgyud): pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la dus la dab par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
4a3(rgyud): bram ze chen po de med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhi na gshegs pa'i dus lags te// bcom/ 
4a4(rgyud): ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus chod la bab/ na bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang // / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze
4a5(rgyud): chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad dang don chen por
4a6(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu
4a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung te/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas
4b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par sheso// de nas bram ze chen po legs snang gi mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen pos mchod cing
4b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so// 'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang
4b3(rgyud): mi'am tso dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis
4b4(rgyud): kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so// de nas bcom da ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang da zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod de
4b5(rgyud): skyed mos tshal de'i nang na/ mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhigayid de/ zhig pa/ tsher mas gang ba rtswa dang shing dang gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar gyi phung
4b6(rgyud): po lta bu zhig yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag drung ngo // 
4b7(rgyud): phyag dar gyi phung po de las kyang leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legaso legs so// dreng ni gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o// bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs
4b8(rgyud): ba spyan drangs pa na yang khyed legs so// ding khyed la don chen po mdzad par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la
5a1(rgyud): yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas/ nyid kyi sku las na bza' gsil nas mchod rten rnying ba dug dang kyi phung po lta bu de la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
5a2(rgyud): kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po byung bas bshums pa mjed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
5a3(rgyud): cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'ong
5a4(rgyud): beng bkye ste/ mchod rten rnying po'i phung po chen po der zhugs so// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de ya mtshan chen por gyur te/ yi chad de 'khod par gyur te/ 
5a5(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar zhing snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing / rings pa rings parabacom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan
5a6(rgyud): 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mgo bos ngag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa shum pa snga lAs chen po gdang ba gang gis na
5a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan mchims gang ba'i snga lngas gdarab/ bcom ldan 'das ci rags ci'i srad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dpe bang ciganang de nas
5a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'dind ces bka 'astsal to// lagan rdorje ring bsrel gyi dung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten/ de bzhin
5b1(rgyud): gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/ 
5b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu ji snyed gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas/ khar yas shes bya ba rnyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so// 
5b3(rgyud): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bya ba til gyi gang bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang spyi bo yid de bzhin du gnas so// lag
5b4(rgyud): na rdo rje gangan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin pa/ shegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to// la ga na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar ban yon che ni
5b5(rgyud): mthu che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam gra sa 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad
5b6(rgyud): rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la
5b7(rgyud): de nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo// kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ kha cig gis ni
5b8(rgyud): rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i// / kha cig gis ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni drang chub sems dpa'i sa laganas// 
6a1(rgyud): kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo// kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o// kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa gsum
6a2(rgyud): pa'o// kha cig gis nis bzhi pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o// kha cig gis nis drug pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o// kha cig ni sa dgu pa'o// 
6a3(rgyud): khacig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so// / bram ze chen po de yang mngon pa
6a4(rgyud): shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / ser sna dang phrag dadog dang bral bar gyur to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje ro 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar
6a5(rgyud): dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ches kyi na mgrangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyi brgyan pa 'di lta bu/ 
6a6(rgyud): bon/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du pung deng bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po rdo lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur
6a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi se / 'astsal pa/ logan rdo rje rje na/ rigs kyi bri'am/ gas bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge snyen nas/ dge basbyin mag
6a8(rgyud): lalam ches rnam grangs 'di dri ba byed na/ lag na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bre ba khrag khri gtil gyi gang dri da dgu bcu dbu'i bsod napas kyi rung po dang / dge pa
6b1(rgyud): ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rje su bzung bar 'gyuraro// gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdos
6b2(rgyud): rnams bcangs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang
6b3(rgyud): phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing / nyin cig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam
6b4(rgyud): grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed par dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog breng rgyu dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lcug
6b5(rgyud): dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum drag
6b6(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyu dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod par
6b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin ga shegs pa'i mnoni/ sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas lha dang / 
6b8(rgyud): kludang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du
7a1(rgyud): gyur nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ mchod rten snying pa phyag dar dang / gyo me'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di ni rdzu 'phrul chen po ston
7a2(rgyud): pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin
7a3(rgyud): po che'i mchod rten tu dga' ba bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi/ 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rin po che'i mchod rten chen po
7a4(rgyud): yin no// lag na rdo rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras dbu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i
7a5(rgyud): mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa 'am/ 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam
7a6(rgyud): par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur te/ lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
7a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par mi byed rgyu de dang / rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo// lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang
7a8(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchim byung ngo // dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par gyur gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs
7b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod
7b2(rgyud): rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs
7b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa
7b4(rgyud): til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig
7b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi na nga du 'jog par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par
7b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'khor lo phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang / char kab kyi gzugs dang / dril bu bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis
7b7(rgyud): brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang / dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug
7b8(rgyud): gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag mchod rten de la bud dud dang / sti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
8a1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug gi bar la sogs
8a2(rgyud): rnams las yongasu thar bar 'gyur zhing / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gnas gang na mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa/ 
8a3(rgyud): sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyogs der klu mi sman pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par gyu
8a4(rgyud): gnas der srog chags mi srun pa dang / gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan zan gyis kyang mi chu gas par 'gyur/ bya mi srun pa dang / ne tse dang ra/ 
8a5(rgyud): skegs dang / bying dang / ske mo dang sha sbrang da/  / sbrang bu dang / bye ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / rta blo'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung
8a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdugs pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur// phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad 'ge ba dang / 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
8a7(rgyud): 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / brjod byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs pa
8a8(rgyud): 'byung nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / rol mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol pa dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / 
8b1(rgyud): mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang skyes pa
8b2(rgyud): dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'tshe bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin mtshon
8b3(rgyud): gyis ma yin zhing me dang chus kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyos kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rgyal po
8b4(rgyud): chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sa phyo/ gas de srung bar byed/ yongasu skyong bar byed do// gnod
8b5(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyuraro// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang
8b6(rgyud): nyi ma dang / mjug rings chen po yang nyin mtshan 'thun par byed par 'gyuraro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing / legs pa kho nar ma
8b7(rgyud): rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba da mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas
8b8(rgyud): dus gsum du 'ong ngo / yul du gnas pa thams kyang mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'o / bstod pa
9a1(rgyud): byed/ bskor ba byed par 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam gzugs
9a2(rgyud): brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob cing bzhug so// 
9a3(rgyud): mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan ji lnga ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi 'am/ dngul gyi'am/ gsar gyi'am/ zangs kyir byed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dris te/ de'i nang du
9a4(rgyud): bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// 'angang dang / tham skas dang / kha sran dang / 'khor le'i dring ba
9a5(rgyud): dang bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'byung ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyu ro// phyogs bzhi'i kun na yang
9a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bsnyen gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod
9a7(rgyud): rten dang / mchod gnasu 'gyuraro// sku gzugs dang mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongasu bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongasu gzung bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde
9a8(rgyud): dngon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs
9b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi zam tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis ka
9b2(rgyud): pa yin no// rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci ga nang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na
9b3(rgyud): rdo rje nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
9b4(rgyud): gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad da kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi
9b5(rgyud): rnar grangs yin no// / na maste ya d+hi kA nAn/ sir+b+bA ta thA gai tA nAn/ oM b+hu bi bA na bar btsir/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+hA ra d+ha re/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA/ d+hA tud+hA re/ pad+mar
9b6(rgyud): b+ha ti/ dza ya ba re/ a tsu le/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+har+m+ma tsakra/ pre brta ne badz+ra/ be d+hi ma tA a laM kA ra/ ai laM kr-i ti/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a dwiSh+Ti te/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ be d+ha ni bai dA nr-i/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ saM bo d+ha ni/ sau do d+ha ya/ 
9b7(rgyud): tsa la tsa la/ tsa lan+tu sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni/ sad+d+ha pA bi bi ga te/ hu ru du ru/ sar+b+bA sho ka big te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ bidz+rA Ni/ saM bA ba saM bA ba/ ta thA ga te gud+d+ha/ d+hA ra Ni mung+ga/ dud+d+he bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ 
10a1(rgyud): Shang+ga tu mu drA Ni swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga tA na sAd+hA tra bid+hA Shita ad+hiSh+Ti te tu ru tra ru/ hUM hUM swAhA// bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel zam tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma
10a2(rgyud): thag tu/ phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum drug bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang du snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas bcor ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la shAkya thub pas
10a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa leg so lags zhes
10a4(rgyud): bya ba byin no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig dang byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// gang / na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ 
10a5(rgyud): mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjesu 'brang zhing bzhugs par
10a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten snying pa phya ga dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin
10a7(rgyud): po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing / 'phang dang / legs par rnam par 'phyes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to// bcom ldan
10a8(rgyud): 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / na mkha' ldi dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
10b1(rgyud): lte phye chen ba de dag dang / lha dang ming bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ mngon pang bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba
10b2(rgyud): ring bsrel gyi bam tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i rade rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ng+ga kar pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de zangs de bin dra rak+Shi tAs
10b3(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan lang bab// rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hAg d+hA la dUr la/ d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas
10b4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oMn mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi pu laM bde kany+tsa nod kIp+ta/ prab+hAs dke tu rmur+d+ha ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+ta te sam+ba kr-i dudrA ya/ na mo b+hag
10b5(rgyud): ba te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga ta ya/ aR+Sha te/ samyak+saM bu d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ be d+hi de d+hi/ bod+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta gaM tsi re d+ha ra d+ha raM/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ ma hA bi dI tsit+ta d+ha re/ 
10b6(rgyud): tsu lu tsu lu/ ShaT rasmi sany+tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shi ka te/ gu Ne gu Na ba te/ sarba bud+d+ha gu NA da b+hA se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ na b+hastA le/ sha ma
10b7(rgyud): sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha me/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma naM/ sarba pA paM bi sho dI nai/ hu lu hu lu hrIM/ me hA baud+ha mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga ta su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he swA hA/ nA la man+ta/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
10b8(rgyud): bya ba le ki te/ dza ya dza ya swAhA/ hri da yaM/ oM hu ru hu ru/ dza ya mu khe swA hA/ u pa hr-i da yai/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ 
11a1(rgyud): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bris te/ mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na des mchod
11a2(rgyud): rten cig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur// lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dI dang / dreng ba dang / drug pa dang / bye ma dang / na b.ra' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan la sogs
11a3(rgyud): ngas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos / na mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang
11a4(rgyud): mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur// / dga' bongs mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tsom
11a5(rgyud): zazung dang / 'tshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang 'tshams med par 'gro ba'i
11a6(rgyud): sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do// dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod
11a7(rgyud): par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la nyan
11a8(rgyud): pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis rgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dngag tu med par 'gyur ro// sdong pos rgyan pa bklags
11b1(rgyud): shing bton du byas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du'ang zhugs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bur las 'dus pa/ 'bum gyi
11b2(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dA da sha bu d+hA kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa/ 
11b3(rgyud): chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ 
11b4(rgyud): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub semasadapa' mi pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri
11b5(rgyud): nyis steng gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thab sa gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal
11b6(rgyud): pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig
11b7(rgyud): rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog
11b8(rgyud): pad+ma de DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin be che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par rgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od
12a1(rgyud): de dang ga med na 'ang smon lamagyis brgyan pa/ rab skul bkod parten pa chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'dags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya nga lta ya
12a2(rgyud): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go// de nas
12a3(rgyud): drang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab
12a4(rgyud): mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi pad+ma beDUR+Ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugaras lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spros mchog dam pas mchod pra/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par rgyan pa
12a5(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon/ lam gyis brgyan par basprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyi/ ngas las mngon 'ang gas chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs
12a6(rgyud): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na mid pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
12a7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston/ 
12a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu gzhon nu/ nyi ma'i smon mthanga'i me tog pad+mag seng sdug nam mkha' lnga bu'i skurnam par snang mdzad 'ong pa rab rgyan rdzogs med ga la ri lo kyil
12b1(rgyud): phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
12b2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // tshig 'don to// phyag bya'o// lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
12b3(rgyud): spongs pa'i rgyal la dgengs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // yid la bya'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // 
12b4(rgyud): phyag bya'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bko/ da pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin
12b5(rgyud): gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i
12b6(rgyud): mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang shar
12b7(rgyud): gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bag tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dgyings pa
12b8(rgyud): ming pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// 
13a1(rgyud): byams pa dal pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la/ 
13a2(rgyud): nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la
13a3(rgyud): gsol ba 'debs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// 'on kyang sdig pa thams cid zad par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams
13a4(rgyud): cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi de zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / de mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan dun
13a5(rgyud): sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum chog sa pa yang thob bo// ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa
13a6(rgyud): yang thob bo// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa yang myur du yongasu 'dzin to// bla na med pa
13a7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par yang 'gyur ro// 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe yang kun tu mdzes pa dang / de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
13a8(rgyud): rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa
13b1(rgyud): rang yongs su 'dzin to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dang gang du skyes pa yi// tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad du// mthong na dag 'a ding dag 'a byed dang / 'od dreng ba dang mthu che dang
13b2(rgyud): 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyang brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ a kha ma khas maM tu mu khe/ se ti yuk+She/ ni ru/ te pra b+he/ sa ma yo ge/ tsit+ta
13b3(rgyud): tsit+tAn+te/ a khe ma khe/ mad ne/ bi bar+Ne/ sa ran+ta mu NaM/ sad tur me/ yuk+te pra yuk+te/ hi li mi li/ ma sa le/ A na le/ tsa me/ a tsiTi a tsi Ti/ tse tse/ ar he/ ba tud tshe/ mA yu
13b4(rgyud): gra he/ he ma ba ti/ dz+yo ti ba ti/ d+har+m+ma tsit+te/ ts+yu ti b+ha ga/ a bi k+Sha bir d+hik+Sha ma~M/ sAM dA bi bak+She/ sangs rgyasad/ dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
13b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi rna mas grub par gyur cig/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na// phyogs bcu dag na
13b6(rgyud): gang bzhugs pa'i// bye ba drug cu'i drang song rnams// de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur// skye ba dag ni kun tu yang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur// chung zad dge ba gang yin pa/ 
13b7(rgyud): don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// pad+ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon du mthong // gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa// mkhas pa dpal ldan brdzus te
13b8(rgyud): skye/ dran dang blo gros brtag pa dang // mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel// thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// thos pa rnams kyis yongs mi nyams// 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi
14a1(rgyud): mtshan rnams su zhig brjod byed pa// ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni// bzang 'gror myur bar 'gro bar 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog
14a2(rgyud): de dag de la mngon du 'gyur// byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya// zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag/ gser gyis bkang ste sprin byin pas// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// mtshan rnams
14a3(rgyud): 'dzin par byed pa yi// bsod nams phung po de ches mang // rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas 'byung ba
14a4(rgyud): rab mdzes te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// / dad pa bla na med pa thob// sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing // mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// sangs
14a5(rgyud): rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de// mthong nas ston la rab tu dang // 'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni// mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin
14a6(rgyud): byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// 'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su// byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya// nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na// 
14a7(rgyud): gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i// rgya chen mig ni spungs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed na// skye ba gang dang gang skyes par/ 
14a8(rgyud): de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dgon grags pa thob// mtshan rnams
14b1(rgyud): 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de la bskal pa du mar ni// lha rnams sti stang byed par 'gyur// byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// mos med shes rab 'tshal mi 'gyur// 
14b2(rgyud): g.yo dang sgra ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// lha dang dri za klu dbang dang / mkha' lding lha min gsang ba ba// rtag tu de la srung bar byed// 
14b3(rgyud): gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// nor tshe khyim du skye bar 'gyur// sems can kun la sbyin par byed// dpa' zhing gtong 'od ser sna med// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por// lha yi tsan dan
14b4(rgyud): dmar po dang // shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyis// spos dang de yi kha nas 'byung // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'ji ni byed pa// bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs
14b5(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur// rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan// / mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// rin chen sna bdun/ pad+ma'i mdab// bye ba stong phrag mang yod las// 'byor
14b6(rgyud): chen de skye lha gzugs ldan// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de ni nga ma spun sdug dang // skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang // 'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo // drang srong chen po rnams
14b7(rgyud): kyi mtshan// bud med kyis ni bzung byas na// bud med lus la ma chags nas// skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur// mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas// bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te// chos kyi
14b8(rgyud): 'khor lo rab bskor nas// 'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan 'da'// mtshan rnams 'di dge su 'dzin pa// de yi lus la mtshon dang ni// dug dang me dang rgyal po dang // g.yon can rnams kyis mi
15a1(rgyud): tshugs so// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de yi sems lanam kyang ni// dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi// bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag gi/ 
15a2(rgyud): ni mtshan gyi rnams// mi gang 'dzin par byed pade// zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas// 'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu// 
15a3(rgyud): de dag de yis bsam mkhyen nas// rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur// sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las// lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas// de ni shin tu yi rang ste// rgyal ba'i bstan la the
15a4(rgyud): chom med// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// 'ji dag rten mgon po rnams las ni// zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te// thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas
15a5(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa dang // mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang // / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams// ma lus par ni rje/ gas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni// gang gi
15a6(rgyud): zhing du 'dong 'gyur ba// der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs// byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// skyes pa'am ni bud med gang // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi// yon tan 'di dag
15a7(rgyud): gzhan dag kyang // sangs rgyas bskal par rgyun tu gsungs// bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni// yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// de dag mtshan rnams
15a8(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po// sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog/ 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gis// mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang // gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan
15b1(rgyud): cing / thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba// de dang de dag shes rab che// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// drang srong chen po de dag gis// 'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas// bag yod ldan zhing ma tha
15b2(rgyud): gyur la// shes rab ldan mi su mi 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag
15b3(rgyud): dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu
15b4(rgyud): gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
15b5(rgyud): zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa // rgya gar skad du// Ar+ya sap+ta bu d+hA kan nA ma ma hA/ yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa
15b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas
15b7(rgyud): na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15b8(rgyud): byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis
16a1(rgyud): / thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse me'i nags khrod de nyid na/ dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas rdol zhing gcer bu gos med la/ 
16a2(rgyud): lag pasgreng ste ngu zhing bdug pa gzigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos/ bla gos drag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ljangs la btsugs
16a3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang / dge
16a4(rgyud): slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la/ lag pa stod tsog shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la
16a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyi// sa btab pa yin no// cig shos 'di yang nad kyis pa tab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
16a6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gas la to// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po bzlog pa'i rigs sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du
16a7(rgyud): gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo // bdun pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
16a8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad
16b1(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la ha la/ 
16b2(rgyud): hi li hi lA ya/ na medzag na mi tsa nA ya/ na mon maHswA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshes pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub se mas dpa' se mas dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces
16b3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig reg sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang / sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi
16b4(rgyud): ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro// zas dang skom la lan bdun
16b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// ring / du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 
16b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin// mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la/ sna ma'i mar dang / 
16b7(rgyud): ud pa la sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing ba rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor
16b8(rgyud): can stang gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag bka' stsal
17a1(rgyud): to/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsa~M g+ha ya/ oM pa tsa pa tsa pa tsA ya btsA ya/ sarba b+hU tA nAM/ tsi ta ya/ kI lA ya/ pa ra bid+yA nA~M swAhA// nam mkha'i snying po sems can
17a2(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'go mnyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba
17a3(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig/ nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na de la pha rol gyi gnod
17a4(rgyud): pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de ra bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// ga da shis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di nas shing phos nas
17a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed/ par 'gyur ro// de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni/ nad tha mas cad la skud pa bcing bar bya'o// 'dus pa las gyur
17a6(rgyud): pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no// chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// skud pas bdag srung ngo // byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar
17a7(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o// gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i/ 
17a8(rgyud): don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'drung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ oM ka la ka
17b1(rgyud): la ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lod spang naM/ ku ru sarba graha NaM swAhA// nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
17b2(rgyud): dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad de/ na mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag zung shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun
17b3(rgyud): chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rim nad kyis mi 'debs shing chu dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi
17b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/  dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang bar lasanas mgo bkrus te de
17b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar
17b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o// 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po
17b7(rgyud): gdags so// mi gnad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la bdags so// dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la bsngags pa'i 'bras yos lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg
17b8(rgyud): bya'o// rA dzA nai rA dzA ma tra ma bA shi ka ra tu kA man/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi spar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sprin bsreg bya'o// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrub pa thams
18a1(rgyud): cang dang / sdig pasbyangs shing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na/ 'o ma can gyi shing sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg byatil dgal nu snod sbyin bsreg bya'o// 
18a2(rgyud): sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad spangs par 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na lad dang / khre dang / shi ri sha dang / rgyu spos dang
18a3(rgyud): gur gum dang / bla sgang dang / in+d+ra ba ru dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mr-i 'i mgo thogs dang / 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bya zhing bum pa
18a4(rgyud): gsar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku na sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o// dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar
18a5(rgyud): seng ldeng gi pur ma spyi bor spyugs la brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos/ te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro// gdon/ dang / srung ba dang / 'drung po la sogs pa'i las thams
18a6(rgyud): cad la yang sbyar ba byos na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa leg par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la ngan pa'i
18a7(rgyud): don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bu d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~Mg+hA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshan
18a8(rgyud): dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ya te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ oM kaT ka Ta/ ka Tha kaH/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki dzi ki dzi/ ki Ta pa yan maHswAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin te gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
18b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dang sel ces bya ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig/ blangs shing bzung ste/ kun chub par byas na phyi
18b2(rgyud): ma'i tshe/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mdag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang
18b3(rgyud): spos dag gi mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par 'gyur te/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// lha rnams kyi nang du lce'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyuraro// yang na mi
18b4(rgyud): rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// yang na cho grwa bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar
18b5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las tha/ ra bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zas da/ nga skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na
18b6(rgyud): nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod no/ bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o// lhog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa
18b7(rgyud): dang / bcings pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar par 'gyur ro// ci ste de
18b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du
19a1(rgyud): smras shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// yid la ci smos sems cad ston to// che'am stongs sama'a'am rgyal thams/ 
19a2(rgyud): cad kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams
19a3(rgyud): cad bzlog pa'i phyir sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bu d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+ha ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+sha te samyakl-i bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa
19a4(rgyud): ra/ sar sa ra/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri/ sI rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha mdai/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma d+hA ma/ d+hu ma ya/ da na mo na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+yA te sa mya k+saM/ 
19a5(rgyud): bu d+hA ya swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po/ 
19a6(rgyud): 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung // me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ 
19a7(rgyud): dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring por 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
19a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// ci ste pha rol nad las thar par byed par 'dod na ci nus
19b1(rgyud): su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ga rus bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o// mdze dang skangs nad dang mchin sman la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sangs rgyas bcom
19b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la bkrus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan
19b3(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad posngags te mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar por 'gyur ro// lus hrul pos zin pa/ 
19b4(rgyud): rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/ de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cadad pa zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung
19b5(rgyud): steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te sems can thams cad la pha/ na pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di
19b6(rgyud): dag bka' stsal to// na mo bu d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsog+hA ya/ oM ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na ma kA shrA pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arA te sa myak+saM bu d+hA ya/ sid d+hAn+t+ra man+ta pA da swA hA/ 
19b7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sru ring gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
19b8(rgyud): ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam// klog
20a1(rgyud): gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo la'am mtshan mo lan gsul gsum bzlas po da/ mngor na rmil lan de bzhin gshegs par thong bar 'gyur ro// de'ilam/ 
20a2(rgyud): kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so// las thams cad la yang sbyang bar bya'o// mdzod sha kar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la bul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas
20a3(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro// klad pan pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar
20a4(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad du yang sbar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ 
20a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dog bka' stsal to// na mo bud+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+hu ma
20a6(rgyud): ta le ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu ra d+hu re/ ma hA d+ha re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ke li/ many+dzu ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi l-i mi li/ ma hA mi li/ to liH
20a7(rgyud): li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa le/ mu hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khai ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swA hA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems
20a8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klad pa'i nang bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o// sprin bzlog na shing kar bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o// 
20b1(rgyud): dug spon chus bya'o// las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o// khrus kyi tshogs sbyar bar bya'o// cho ga thams cad dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
20b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod // 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen por
20b3(rgyud): mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha aM ga ba tinA mad+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang
20b4(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem rdzas dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad pa de dag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i
20b5(rgyud): klu chen po'i 'gram na/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs/ cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyisam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces
20b6(rgyud): bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga ba dang / 
20b7(rgyud): na ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'chi ba'o// de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/ bcom pa med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang
20b8(rgyud): ba'o// rgyal po chen po dag de la/ 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
21a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas skye dgu rjes su gzung ba 'di ni/ deng bdag cag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de nas
21a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/ se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
21a3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi
21a4(rgyud): grogs mdzod cig/ des na bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad ra kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog
21a5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa/ yang bskor bar bgyi'o// zhes gsung ngo // de bzhi/ na du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi/ 
21a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du
21a7(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo // de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang 'di skad ces/ gang gi/ 
21a8(rgyud): phyir 'di dag tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang ldan pa yongs su grub cing / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod
21b1(rgyud): cig ces gsung ngo // de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du
21b2(rgyud): gang te/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsung ngo // tad+ya thA/ tsa la tsa la tsa le/ bin+daN+Di
21b3(rgyud): swasti ke/ tsakra aM ga ti/ pra sha maM du/ sarba ro ga a na te/ kuN+De kuN+De/ ma hA kut+te/ tsa re tsa re re/ he ma gi ri/ he ma gau ri/ he ma ni shun+ti/ he ma si si/ kau ra be kau ra ba be / he ku
21b4(rgyud): ra re/ kur re/ ku ma ti/ bi ra sa ma Ni/ shi'u b+hi/ tsa le tsa le de/ dai tsa le/ mA bi li ba hu mu hu mu swA hA// gsang ba ba'i dbadag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa
21b5(rgyud): thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ hUM nAM/ si si swA hA/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang gde ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
21b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis srung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par
21b7(rgyud): 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ shwe te shre te she te/ le li li/ 'phags skyes pos kyang smras pa mA taM ge mA taM ge/ mA taM gi ni/ shU mA shU mA/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa
21b8(rgyud): tsa re tsa re re swA hA/ mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ ba la~M pa ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzigs pa'i rig
22a1(rgyud): sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'don na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu me ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 
22a2(rgyud): 'dis sems can thams cad kyi sreg la phan btags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don tu nyin cig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang / gang yang 'di klog bde la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i
22a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa med do// de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab pas ma yin no// 
22a4(rgyud): gang la la rgyal ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sang sa rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs dpar rigs par bya'o// yi ger 'dri ba'am yi ger 'drir 'jug pa
22a5(rgyud): des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba thams cad kyi sti stang byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sem sa can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa
22a6(rgyud): yin no// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro// su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrungs par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka
22a7(rgyud): stsal nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 
22a8(rgyud): 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu
22b1(rgyud): chen gyi le tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ A bud+hA tring yan ma d+hA ra Ni d+ha rba bdul/ 
22b2(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di ska nga bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/ 
22b3(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul/ chos kyi dbyings dgon pa/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyi rnam par spyad pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa
22b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod po/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi ma chog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rje su spyod
22b5(rgyud): pa/ kun nas 'od zer gyi khang bzang dbus na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'dzi ga rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/ thams cad
22b6(rgyud): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang / ting 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa/ sha stag gis
22b7(rgyud): yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
22b8(rgyud): skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i chos kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
23a1(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do// rigs kyi
23a2(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang
23a3(rgyud): dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/ lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral
23a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa
23a5(rgyud): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i sri da pa'i rgya mtsho phyir rnyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par
23a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la
23a7(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad srung bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
23a8(rgyud): yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / 
23b1(rgyud): drug gzhil bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud/ 
23b2(rgyud): kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing / spangs la spangs par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// sangs rgyas kyi chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi
23b3(rgyud): gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ ma hA bud+d+he/ i tA bud+d+he/ ta tra bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+ha
23b4(rgyud): bud+d+ha ma ti bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu ma he/ sar+b+ba bud+d+he/ a da nu dz+nyAn te/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/  bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas
23b5(rgyud): te ji chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi/ gcig tu yidal bya ba ni mdor na chos sgom pa'o// gzungs 'di na sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams
23b6(rgyud): cad kyis gsungs paste/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no// tad+ya thA/ shud d+he/ su shud d+he/ su shud d+he/ sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha no/ nirmA le ma la a ba ga te/ ga ti sa mA d+hi tr-i ti/ kra me sa ma sa re/ sa
23b7(rgyud): rA sa ra pa ri a sho ke/ bi sho ka/ sho ka sha ma ni/ shAM te/ u pa shAM ti/ pa shAM te/ a ba b+hA se/ sar+b+ba pu N+ye pa ri mi ta te/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma pra ta maN+Di te/ ha ra ha ra/ ma la ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ tsa la
23b8(rgyud): tsa la saM tsa la/ ta la ta la ma ta la/ sa ma ta la/ ri Ne ri Ne/ su ri Ne/ sa ma ri Ne/ ri Na ma ti lo ka d+ha re/ lo ka d+ha ri Ne/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ Da ra Da ra/ ro d+ha ro d+ha/ ma hA bi dza ya/ bI hi ni/ ha na ha na/ sar+b+ba
24a1(rgyud): bud+d+he/ he pre shi tra si/ sarba dz+nyA ba the/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA pa ri mi te/ ma hA pra tidz+nyA na/ saM pan+d+he/ sa man+ta/ a lo ke bud+d+ha/ bi Sha ye/ bud+d+ha/ pra ti ma~M ri te/ b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ 
24a2(rgyud): pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ri/ pra sa ra sar+b+ba sho ka a paM ga te swAhA// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas bcas pa
24a3(rgyud): dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/ rab tu 'jug
24a4(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg/ cing 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang skraganas bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams dang / bdud sdig can
24a5(rgyud): rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing / yid mi bde bar gyur/ nas nyam thag go// sems can gang dgas chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs
24a6(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod
24a7(rgyud): pa lan gsum ched du brjod do// lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis/ lha'i me tog man dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor nas
24a8(rgyud): gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la// 
24b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi// gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yis// skad cig yung der sa yang rnam drug g.yos// rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang // rab tu/ 
24b2(rgyud): g.yos nas bdud kyi rigs rnams ni// lha dag rab tu sngags shing 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non// de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos nas// 'jig rten
24b3(rgyud): mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// namakhar gnas nas me tog man da 'thor// gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang gzhan rnams kyis// se mo do dang sho shal spos rnams dang / phye ma dag dang byug
24b4(rgyud): bgos rnams dang / rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu dbul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste
24b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongasu tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgyan
24b6(rgyud): dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing spyod pa'i
24b7(rgyud): rgyan dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang / gzungs
24b8(rgyud): thob pa'i rgyan te/ brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di ni rtag tu rgyun tu yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// gzungs kyi
25a1(rgyud): gzhi 'di dag rnams yid la byas na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang thob bo// nang
25a2(rgyud): thams cad dang / na ba thams cad la lag pas khyab par bya'o// bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
25a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon
25a4(rgyud): par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA puSh+pa ku
25a5(rgyud): Ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me tog brtseg/ sa pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chu ba sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
25a6(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa na klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i khang pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 
25a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting 'dzin thob pa/ skye
25a8(rgyud): bcig gis thogs pa/ sa bcu la gnas pa/ de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskur ba/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la the tshom med pa sha
25b1(rgyud): stug dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i chen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
25b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par brtse ba/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzang nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logasu thal mo/ 
25b3(rgyud): sbyang ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams
25b4(rgyud): ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dadapa' chen po seng ge rnam par brtse ba la 'di skad ces bka'
25b5(rgyud): te/ 'a mas mi jomos gas de shi gshegs pa la ma da yi de ma ma ma da shing chu she ye she rje / mi'i ci po shig kyi ldan gams dug na nas
25b6(rgyud): dag sa/ rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa ste/ seng ge rnam par brtse ba gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa lang
25b7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de'i phying / de la mdzod pa'i rnam par smin pa de yang dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// seng ge rnam par
25b8(rgyud): brtse ba gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
26a1(rgyud): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen po'am/ theg pa gsum las theg pa gcig gis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// seng ge rnam par brtse yang / 
26a2(rgyud): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas/ sems dngas par gyur la/ dad pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
26a3(rgyud): cha dang / bsnyun gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbar ba thams cad kyis sti stang du byas shing / ri mor byas te/ mchod cing rjed la/ rim gror byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin
26a4(rgyud): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gyis mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mnyam par shes par bya ste/ bye brag gam tha dad
26a5(rgyud): du bya ba med do// seng ge rnam par brtse byang chub sems dpa/ 'i khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
26a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam dbul ba phul ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas kar sha pa na cig tsam dbul bar phul la/ phul nas kyang bla na med pa
26a7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang bkra
26a8(rgyud): ba dang / skrun pa dang / rgyu yang nye ba mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// seng ge rnam par brtse gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
26b1(rgyud): lo gcig gam/ lo brgya'am/ le stong yang rung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la/ 
26b2(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par zin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir me tog 'ga' 'bul lam/ chu snyim pa gang tsam 'thor ram/ byug pa'i thig le dri'am/ me tog gi nyal
26b3(rgyud): nyil 'phyag gam/ drug pa 'bul lam/ spos 'bul lam/ me tog 'bul lam/ bdug spos 'bul lam/ phreng ba 'bul lam/ rol mo'i sil snyan 'bul lam/ gdugs 'bul lam/ 
26b4(rgyud): dri 'bul lam/ dpyangs pa 'bul lam/ rgyal mtshan 'bu dal lam/ ba dan 'bul lam/ dar 'bul lam/ ma dAr ma 'bul zhing / phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom
26b5(rgyud): pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshalo// zhes smra ba de dag ni seng ge rnam par/ brtse bskal par ram/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal
26b6(rgyud): pa stong du'am/ bskal pa 'bum du'ang ngan 'gror log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/ 'di la dogs pa'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar mi bya'o// seng ge rnam par
26b7(rgyud): brtse me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod kyis/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo bal po che'i don dang / pan
26b8(rgyud): pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bshad par bya'o// seng ge rnam par brtse gang la la zhig me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid lo byed dam/ kun chub par byed
27a1(rgyud): dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dal ba rnyed par 'gyur/ 
27a2(rgyud): nam du yang dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang sangs rgyas rje su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang byang
27a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang byang chub sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// nam du yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam du yang rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur/ 
27a4(rgyud): spobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ d+yo rigs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag gi sang ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya
27a5(rgyud): thA/ d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra Ni/ mu ni pra b+hAstA re/ sid+d+he/ tsat+pa De/ nA/ maHtsi ni he re/ a rog pa ti/ bud+d+ha ma ti d+her+ye/ oM kar te/ ga gar te rA dza bita/ bi shu la bud d+hi/ d+har+m+ma a bab+hA sa
27a6(rgyud): akA ya kalpe/ kal+la ba ti/ a mr-i ka l+le hU tI sha ne/ te dze ba ti/ ni d+ya sa hi te/ te dze gra ba/ tiSh+Thi na dra yaM bud d+hi swA hA// seng ge rnam par brtse ba gang la la zhig gis me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs
27a7(rgyud): 'di'i ming dang / yi ge dang tshig mtha' dag shes te kun chub par byed pa des/ dpyid zla tha chung dang / dbyar zlar ba dang / ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas bzung la bco lnga'i bar du/ 
27a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bsam zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la rtse gcig tu yid la byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog
27b1(rgyud): dang / mar me dang / bdug spos kyis mchod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing / chos kyang ston pa bco lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs rab tu thob par 'gyur/ dran pa/ 
27b2(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo dang ldan par 'gyur/ yongs mya ngan las 'dra'ada'i bar du che rabs dran par 'gyuraro// thos pa thams cad dang
27b3(rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad dang / bzo thams cad dang / las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/ ting 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems la gnas par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni ma
27b4(rgyud): gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni zag pa med par gtogs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ngas bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
27b5(rgyud): po seng ge rnam par brtse dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin/ dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
27b6(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la na ma d+ha ra Ni
27b7(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
27b8(rgyud): rgyal po'i khang na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims
28a1(rgyud): yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ting nge 'dzin yong su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag
28a2(rgyud): go blo gros rnam par dag pa bzod pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ phan pa'i dngos po yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs
28a3(rgyud): pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byams pa yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pas/ snying rje yongasu dag pa dang / dga' ba yongasu dag
28a4(rgyud): pa dang / btang snyoms yong su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yongasu dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
28a5(rgyud): mthong ba yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / stobs yongs/ su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongasu dag pa dang / sangs
28a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag
28a7(rgyud): go blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag pa la/ su zhig me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra
28a8(rgyud): dang 'byug pa rnams kyi sti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i
28b1(rgyud): mthar thug pa ma gtogs par/ bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas
28b2(rgyud): kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon dul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so// bsam gyis mi khyab po/ mtshungs pa med do// grangs
28b3(rgyud): med do// dpag gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes pa la sti stang du byed pa dang / bla
