28b4(rgyud): mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring
28b5(rgyud): bsrel yung 'bru tsam la sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa/ dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/ byang chub tu
28b6(rgyud): gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / gsol ba dang
28b7(rgyud): bsngags pa dang / bskor ba byed pa des pan yon lngar shes par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan pa
28b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / myur du bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa bskyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po dag tu shes par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang chos bzhir shes par bya
29a1(rgyud): steng bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshigs so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
29a2(rgyud): 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi pa de dag yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'
29a3(rgyud): chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / 
29a4(rgyud): phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin ga/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros
29a5(rgyud): rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang / ldan na/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnam sa kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa
29a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas/ dad pa bskyed de/ dbus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal
29a7(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sku legs par rgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na blo gros rnam par
29a8(rgyud): dag pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya
29b1(rgyud): byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zang par byar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
29b2(rgyud): gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des/ bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung ba yin te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin
29b3(rgyud): gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong khyer du 'jug kyang rung / de bzhin
29b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu yang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
29b5(rgyud): na/ sems can lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lA ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ mi 'am/ mim
29b6(rgyud): yin pa'am/ shing ngam/ ri 'am/ khung bu 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bde logs su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi
29b7(rgyud): byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong
29b8(rgyud): brdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho drang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// a mi tAm te/ 
30a1(rgyud): prab+he/ ma hA pra b+he/ pra bA ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ pra bA ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol
30a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan tu gsol/ tad+ya thA/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ smai ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smai ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ 
30a3(rgyud): ma hA smr-i ti/ ma hA smr-i ti/ ma hA smr-i ti/ chags pa mi mnga' ba gti mug bsal du gsol/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so mai/ so me/ so ma/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ so ma/ 
30a4(rgyud): na su mu pa na ya/ so ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ so ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ so ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ so ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/ som na s+ya mu ba na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+yA
30a5(rgyud): mu pa na ya/ so ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi/ shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ zhi bar gyur cig/ nad med par gyur cig/ bgegs med/ 
30a6(rgyud): par gyur cig/ pra b+ha ba ti/ ma hA ma t+ye/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rashrI/ rash+mi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan yang gzung / 
30a7(rgyud): bar bya zhing phyag bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin
30a8(rgyud): chen mkhregs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen me tog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mi 'khrugs pa dang / 
30b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das thub dka' dang / bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen
30b2(rgyud): 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang / bcom ldan 'das skar ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bden dbyangs dang / bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral ba dang / bcom
30b3(rgyud): ldan 'das zla ba dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das dri med 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang
30b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha' yas dang / bcom lnga na 'das rin chen snying po dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma
30b5(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'ad sa pad+ma'i sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i mchogadang / bcom ldan 'das yan lag mchog dang / 
30b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang
30b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / bcom ldan 'das spos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das phreng ba'i rgyal po dang
30b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpa' brtan pa'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha spong dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin po che dang / bcom ldan 'das dpag med rtogs 'od/ 
31a1(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang / bcom ldan
31a2(rgyud): 'das snying pos zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das rnga sgra'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
31a3(rgyud): sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ma dang / bcom ldan 'das skrag byed dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang / bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bcom ldan
31a4(rgyud): 'das blo yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag med sprul 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab ltar rnam paraganon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rin chen mchog
31a5(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang / ba com ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshe ga gi dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang
31a6(rgyud): mdzad rnam par dag pa brnyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang / bcom
31a7(rgyud): ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu'o// tad+ya thA/ pa ta pa te/ da ma da ma/ g+ha ma g+ha ma swAhA// shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs
31a8(rgyud): pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo// de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ lho phyogs logs
31b1(rgyud): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tsha lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ nub phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom
31b2(rgyud): ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ byang phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
31b3(rgyud): dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ 'og gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
31b4(rgyud): dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar sru rang du gsol/ steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom
31b5(rgyud): ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang // zhi bar srung du gsol/ phyogs mtshams logs na
31b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ bi ma le bi ma
31b7(rgyud): lAHkA re bi ma la saM b+ha be swA hA/ di ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma la/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka raM/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi
31b8(rgyud): ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA sa mud te/ bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/ bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/ bi ma lA sa mudrA te/ bi ma lA sa mud te/ bi ma lAs
32a1(rgyud): mu dA te/ bim lAs mud te/ bi ma lAs mud te/ bi ma lAs mud te// rigs sngags 'di ni rig sngags che// lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni dus gsum dzod/ 
32a2(rgyud): byas na/ nad rnams la ni yongasu thar// mi ma yin gyis gang bas dang // sdig pa gang dag sbyong bas sgrol// de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur// gzung ba rnams kyang chung mig/ de dag skye ba rnams
32a3(rgyud): su yang // rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur// su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs// 'di ni dga' bas 'dzin par byed// zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba na// dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por 'byung // mtshan
32a4(rgyud): rnams kyi ni legs par brgyan// yan lag 'od zer dra ba 'byung // trad+ya thA/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kuta tsA lo// e la e la/ muH/ kod thA lo/ e ri ri/ ra mr-i ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das
32a5(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sri mas dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang lha dang m-i dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
32a6(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan
32a7(rgyud): dan a~M ga na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
32a8(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rag
32b1(rgyud): tu mang po dang / gzhan yang lha khyad par can mang po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger
32b2(rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig
32b3(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ tsan dan gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ 
32b4(rgyud): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ de'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba da ltar yang ban dgas te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// gang
32b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'ad sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
32b6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi yan lag des/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gsungs pa 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog ste sdig
32b7(rgyud): pa dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad dang / gzhan yang 'das pa'i sangs
32b8(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sngon chad gsungs te/ ngas kyang da khyed rnams la bshad kyis sems can thams cad rjesu gzung ba'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang
33a1(rgyud): khyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ thams cad chos dang mi ldan pa mtshams med pa byed pa dam pa'i chos la spod pa
33a2(rgyud): mchod rten 'dral ba/ dge 'dun gyi rdzas la rku 'brog byed pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas mche ba/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po spong ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag rjes su gzung ba'i
33a3(rgyud): phyir tsan dan gyi yan lag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'di bshad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nga la nyon cig/ de nas byang
33a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bskul ba
33a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gzhan yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnam sa la thugs brtse ba dang / sdig pa byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
33a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis kyang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de
33a7(rgyud): dag gzung bar bgyi ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ tsi rA
33a8(rgyud): te/ mA ri tsi ke/ dur da me/ dur dan te/ dur rA nu/ pra biSh+Te/ tsan dan naM ga dze/ sa man+ta pa ri sho d+ha ni/ bi shud+d+ha shI laM/ tsa rit+na ba ti/ a na tser+ya pra ti b+hA ne/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ 
33b1(rgyud): b+ha ga ba ti/ pA pak+Sha ye/ A shA me/ pa ri pu ra ya swA hA/ rigs kyi bu po 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston tam/ 
33b2(rgyud): kun chub par byed na de'i tshe 'di nyid la mig rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// thos ma thag tu sdig pa'i las rab tu grol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 
33b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ zla ba byed kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar
33b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa byas pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur/ skye ba dran par 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas kyang lha da rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag chen po skyid pa
33b5(rgyud): dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar/ 'gyur ro// 'di ltar sa chen po ma lus pa 'di ni grum par 'gyur yang srid/ rgya mtsho ni bskams kyang srid/ 
33b6(rgyud): bzhin du ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni 'jig par 'gyur yang srid/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa'i steng du lhung yang srid/ nam mkha' ni lag pa gnyis kyis
33b7(rgyud): mnan du rung yang srid/ ma ni chur 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin
33b8(rgyud): gshegs pas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid ngo // sus kyang bskyod pa'am/ bskul bar mi nus so// 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis bklags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// 
34a1(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
34a2(rgyud): bdag gis kyang / gzungs 'di'i cho ga bshad par bgyi'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
34a3(rgyud): bgyis te/ me tog sil ma gtor la/ tsan dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ zla ba tshes nas brtsams nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing gos kyang lan gsum du brjes
34a4(rgyud): te/ kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing / gso sbyong dang ldan pa / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang da/ zla ba nya'i bar zhag gcig spang bar bgyi te/ rtswa bam gyi steng
34a5(rgyud): du mchis shing / rtsa ba ma bting ba'i steng du nyal la sems/ rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyi zhing / me tog dri zhing ngo / lan brgya stong du gtor nas g.yo bar 'gyurabadag
34a6(rgyud): nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/ gzungs chen po thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur/ thos pa
34a7(rgyud): 'dzin par yang 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams/ 
34a8(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
34b1(rgyud): tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pratI t+ya sa mud pAd pa ri hr-i da ya d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing
34b2(rgyud): 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni// rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa// de
34b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to// de skad gsung ba dge sbyong che// tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// las kun grub par byed pa'i phyir// de bzhin
34b4(rgyud): gshegs pas rab tu gsungs// rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyi dar// dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan la// gus da shing dang ba'i sems bskyed nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis
34b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// rten 'brel zab mchog bshad// thams cad las dang 'thun par gsungs// dang po 'jug par tshig gsungs pa// 'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod gyur na// 
34b6(rgyud): sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro 'gyur la// las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba las kyang ldog/ bden pa 'di yis bdag gi bsam pa grub gyur cig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo// chos
34b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// rang sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra
34b8(rgyud): bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshalo// brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la
35a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// sems can rnams kyi sman pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM yed+harmA he tu pra bA bA he
35a2(rgyud): tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba dat+ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro drA e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA// las rnams kun gyi cho ga la// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag brjod// bsam rgyud rang gi lag mthil la// sangs
35a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rgyan// dpe byed bzang po brgyad nus spras// me yi khams la zhugs pa sgom// de ni lha dag rje su dran// de ni sbyor ba'i las bshad de/ 
35a4(rgyud): rim pa bzhin du so sor bstan// rims kyis btab nas na ba da dang // klad pa na dang mig nad dang / khong nad la sogs nad rnams la// tshigs bcad 'di dang snying po 'di// mang por
35a5(rgyud): bzlas shing langs nas ni// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// dbyung ba'i thabasu byab par bya// nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur// nyin gcig nyin gnyis nyin
35a6(rgyud): gsum dang // nyin bzhi rtag pa'i rims rnams la// bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// skud pa dkar po sum sgril la// bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas// mgul du btags na bde bar 'tsho// 
35a7(rgyud): nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing btang // snying nad rtsib logs na ba dang // khong na nang rnams ci yod la// chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas nas// blud na pan
35a8(rgyud): zhing bde bar 'gyur// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// bzlas shing btang na 'tshe bar 'gyur// g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang // pol mig dang ni rma rang la// grog tshangs la snying po 'di// mang du
35b1(rgyud): bzlas te btab na 'tshe// gzhang 'brum gzhang nad za gu dang // po mtshan skang zhing na ba la// skyer ba'i kha d+ha'i ril bu'am// byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu la// nyi shu bzlas shing bskus na pan// nad kyi
35b2(rgyud): rnam pa gang na yang // nad tshabs che chung tshod btags nas// tshig su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la// mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas su// lus la byab cing bzlas na pan// 'khru bag nad kyis btab pa la// 
35b3(rgyud): sman nam ril bu kha zas la// bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang // khong du btang na phan par 'gyur// de yi bzlas brjod snga ma ste// 'di dag rab tu bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he
35b4(rgyud): tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya bdata/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni rod+ha e \u0f7f bA dI ma hA shra ma Na/ swAhA// de dag bzlas na nad rnams 'tsho// de ni nad rnams 'tsho ba'o// de nas yang ni bka' stsal
35b5(rgyud): pa/ nas dang gro dang sran ma dang // 'bras dang sran chung mon sran/ dang / shing rtog rkun 'brum a ru ra// de dag kun la za ba yi// srin bu sbur bu phye ma leb// bye'u dang byi ba ni tsa
35b6(rgyud): dang / lo tog za ba kha bcing na// zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang // bye ma sa dang thal ba la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// zhing dang shing rtog gtor byas na// de dag kun kyang kha bcings
35b7(rgyud): 'gyur// ha cang char pa ches pa na// bcom ldan 'das la phul ba yi// me tog dman ma re re la// bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus
35b8(rgyud): dag tu// bum pa gang ba'i steng dag tu// kham por gtsang ma'i nang du yang // me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de// bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur// ser ba nyid drag lcug ma la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa
36a1(rgyud): brgyad bzlas// ser ba gang nas g.yongs su// klang la bskor zhing byabs na 'chang// yang na thal chen yungs kar la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// thum po byas te lcug ma la/ 
36a2(rgyud): btags te btsugs na ser ba 'chang // 'byung po sha za yi dgas dang // brjed byed gdon gyis zin pa la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste// gu gul dud pas bdugs
36a3(rgyud): nas kyang // yungs kar ga pur tsan dan dang // gla ci la sogs sman sbyar te// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du bzhugs// bum pa
36a4(rgyud): chu yis bkru bar bya// sangs rgyas skra bsil byas pa'i chus // dbakru zhing blung na rab tu phan// nad dang gnod pa kun las tha da ro// 'byung po brjed byed sha za yis// glags kyang rnyed par
36a5(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la// gi wang la/ ni sngags bzlas nas// snying po stobs chen 'di bris gang / gas// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya
36a6(rgyud): dza Ti/ laM bo da ra/ u tsush+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT swA hA// gtsang sbra byas te mgul par gdags// de bzhin yungs kar dag la yang // bzlas brjod byas te bsnams la gdags// mkha' 'gro gdon gyis zin
36a7(rgyud): pan yungs kar dang ni gu gul lo// sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas// dud pas bdugs na 'tshe bar 'gyur// de la the tsom mi za'o// bus pa gdon dang nad las thar// bud med bu ni
36a8(rgyud): thogs 'gyur na// chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas// blung na legs par btsas par 'gyur// bud med mo sham bud med la/ sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu// de la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya// 
36b1(rgyud): khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la// chu de blung na chu tsha 'ban// rigs brgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// skud pa dang ni gos kyi grwar// bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun// 
36b2(rgyud): bdud cing bzlas te song ba na// bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub// dgra dang nye zho med par 'gyur// yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/ shu dag tshon gang tsam pa la// mar srang sum brgya drug cu la/ 
36b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang // bum pa gcig tu blugs la bkrug/ nyi ma re re lo gcig tu// shu dag gi ni dum re dang / mar srang dag ni re re la/ bzlas brjod re re bya zhing bza'/ 
36b4(rgyud): de ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur// de bzhin pa ni ser skya ma'i/ mar dang 'o ma dag la yang // bzlas brjod pa rgya ni rtsa brgyad du// bzlas te'o thug dkrug cing bza'// 
36b5(rgyud): yid gzhungs pa yi mchog tu 'gyur// ming dang 'grog sa shing mdza' 'dod na// gang dag yid dang 'thadapa la// me tog dag ni rtsa shing la/ 'bras bu'am
36b6(rgyud): ni'aji bdag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i chang bar bcug/ bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa gcig gdab// gang gi lag tu byin pa na// de dang rtag tu mdza' bar 'gyur// rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams
36b7(rgyud): kun 'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na// chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// de la gtor na sos par 'gyur// yang na nyungs kar brgya brgyad la// bzlas
36b8(rgyud): pa'i thum po mgul du gdags// de ni nad med bde bar 'gyur// mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na// yungs kar la ni bzlas brjod bya// thum po byas te mgo la gdags// bzlas
37a1(rgyud): brjod brgyad stong 'bum yang bzlas// mi nang dang ni byugs nadang kun// ming yang med cing bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni// 'di dag kun tu rgya cher gsungs/ 
37a2(rgyud): namo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+teShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha a baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswAhA// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na ni// bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par
37a3(rgyud): 'gyur// gnod pas cis kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dam chos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni// 
37a4(rgyud): gang la dad pas yid ches na// 'grub par the tsam med par 'gyur// bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ston pa shAkya'i
37a5(rgyud): thugs rje 'di// dge slong ner ban rak+Shi tas// tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs
37a6(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags parten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba
37a7(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na
37a8(rgyud): ar me ni ka lta bu'i rdo le ba la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs
37b1(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po la
37b2(rgyud): sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur pud lnga pa la sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spun
37b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
37b4(rgyud): btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par da'atshal ba sha stag ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis
37b5(rgyud): na/ ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang / lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer
37b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i skye dgu las/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dgra bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
37b7(rgyud): de dag la chos bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshig su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta
37b8(rgyud): thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa lo na ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH// chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/ rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te// dge sbyong
38a1(rgyud): chen pos de skad gsungs// spyan ras gzigs dbang drug 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/ sus rten
38a2(rgyud): cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su
38a3(rgyud): mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam srog shing ni khab tsam/ gdugs ni bku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigasu bcad pa nang du bzhugs na/ 
38a4(rgyud): des tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shing phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa 'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
38a5(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos de dag dang / byang / chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
38a6(rgyud): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// 
38a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA nA lo ka nA ma d+ha ra Ni sarba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu spyong ba/ thams cad mkhyen
38a8(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
38b1(rgyud): gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gsung la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems
38b2(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgya la po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / 
38b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga la
38b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga la ba der song nas/ de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa rnams dang
38b5(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa de dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod pa yang mthong / ngo // de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis gcig la gcig
38b6(rgyud): sems te/ ji ltar byas na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams las sems can thams cad la snang ba sbyin pa dang / mun pa mun nag bsal ba'i
38b7(rgyud): phyir/ shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya ba gang gi mthus/ bdag cag sems can thams cad la snang ba byed pa thob par gyur zhig gu snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs
38b8(rgyud): pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'
39a1(rgyud): dang bcas pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/ s+yad ya the dan/ tsaSh+Ta shur dang / tsak+Sha shA b+ha/ d+hu la me thA/ ka lang tha/ id tid tha nas/ sU
39a2(rgyud): ra tra/ sung rang tra/ sud thA ya/ id thanas/ be lA be lA pa NaM/ tsa ru murti ni/ a ra Ni/ a ra Ni/ kA la pa Ni/ kA la ba Ni/ tu ru du si/ tu ru du saM/ d+ha su ti/ d+hu su ti/ dI ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu rA
39a3(rgyud): kA la kA la/ sad thA sa/ gI la gI la/ gI la pa ya/ gI la pa ya/ d+hu su d+hu su/ sun d+hu sun d+huH/ sid thA su/ yad tha su/ e tha su/ e thA swa pa ni/ yu dzu re d+he/ su d+ha re/ ka ra ka ra/ ki
39a4(rgyud): ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ kurma kurma/ kurba pa Ni/ kurba pa Ni/ ke lu ke lu / kai lA pa ni/ ke lA ba ni/ kat+ka ri/ kat+kA ri/ lA da ru bud d+he/ d+hu ru d+he/ d+hu ru dwe/ ma hA d+hu ru d+he/ ka ra kar/ kI ri ki/ 
39a5(rgyud): ri/ bi hu si/ bi hu saM/ d+ha su d+ha su/ ha su ha su/ sA pa ni swA hA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma rnams la 'di skad
39a6(rgyud): ces smras so// kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu
39a7(rgyud): dag/ u duM ba ra'i me tog ni ches rnyed par sla'i// gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung ba de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches rnyed par sla'i/ 'di
39a8(rgyud): dag ni 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa ni de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni ches rnyed par sla'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin no// 
39b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag gal te sems can mnar med pa na 'khod pa bskal par gnas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir// gzungs sngags kyi
39b2(rgyud): tshig 'di dag zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum brjed na/ de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa kha brgyar
39b3(rgyud): gyes par 'gyur la/ sems can de dag kyang yongasu thar par 'gyur na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams lta ci smos te/ gang dag gi rnal lam du grag par gyur pa de dag gis ni/ bdag cag ni de
39b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po rnams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma rnams kyis yongasu zin pa yin no snyam du yongasu shes pa kho nar bya ste/ 
39b5(rgyud): 'di la so mnyi'am/ yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// ta/ thA/ d+hun tri/ d+hun Ti/ ma hA d+hun Ti/ su ru su ru sAtA/ shukrA bi shod+ha ni/ tar ta ra sAhA/ dz+yo ti shrI dI pa~M/ tu
39b6(rgyud): tu ru sAtwa/ pad+ma mA li ni/ sad t+ye tar bud d+he/ hu ru dra ru sAt+ma/ sad tu bud d+hi/ sad t+ya oM ba lo ka na/ kar ka ra~M/ kir kau swAhA/ d+ha ra na bu Ti/ a pra titaH/ dud+d+he/ tsu ru ts+tshaH
39b7(rgyud): swA hA/ la k+Sha Ni tsi te/ hu ma ba ri/ ha re/ hu ru hu ru/ khu ru khu ru sA hA/ d+hA ra d+ha ra/ mA d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra yan+ti ye swA hA/ su pra ti/ su ma he/ a pra ti ha ta/ bud d+hi/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra yan+ti yaM/ 
39b8(rgyud): swA hA// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la
40a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// swA hA/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad la yongasu spyod ba
40a2(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mA hi ma hen+ta nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
40a3(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od bram ze sa'i dbang po shing sa la chen po lta bu'i gnas/ lha dang ldan pa
40a4(rgyud): na bzhugs te/ de na bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sa la che ngan po lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa de'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom
40a5(rgyud): ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'du/ go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po
40a6(rgyud): shing sa la chen po lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
40a7(rgyud): tu smon lam btab lags na/ gang gis bdag bdag skye ba dran par 'gyur/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de bcom ldan 'das kyis
40a8(rgyud): bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyis bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu la 'di
40b1(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smon na/ de ci'i phyir kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun tu
40b2(rgyud): 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ a mo da ni/ pra mo da ni/ bi mo da ni/ saM mod ni/ pr-i ya ka ra Ni/ shrA ka ra Ni/ shA ka ra Ni/ bo d+hi ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra/ s+yan sa myak+saM bu d+d+ha kar
40b3(rgyud): NI/ a nut+ta ra Ar+ya ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra pradz+nyA ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta rabak+Shi ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra sar+b+ba kle sho pa kle sha bi d+hA ra Ni/ a bad+hA na d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma ni/ a nut+ta ra bad+ya a lo kod pA di na/ a nut+ta ra
40b4(rgyud): shrI kA shI la bid+yA tsa ra Na/ bi muk+ta gu Na ga Na/ saM b+ha d+ha ni/ a nut+ta ra sar+b+ba ku sha la/ mu long b+ho ni/ a nut+ta ra la b+ho na mU la ni/ a nut+ta ra rA ga do Sha mo hon mU la ni/ a nuH/ 
40b5(rgyud): ra shai k+Sha ma Na a bid+yA an+ta rA bi d+ha ma ni/ a nut+ta rA sI a pra ti/ ha ta ba la tsakra/ a nut+ta rA sar+b+ba la ra bi drA ma ni/ tr-i ti bA/ dre a nut+ta rA ba la b+ha dra/ su b+ha dra shrI b+ha dra a nut+ta ra b+ha dra/ sa
40b6(rgyud): man+ta b+ha dra/ a sa me sa ma b+ha dra/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha b+ha dra/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha se bi tA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha a nu brta nI/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+harma de shi kA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA/ 
40b7(rgyud): pu ru Sha/ d+harma ko Sha/ saM b+had+d+hi kA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha nidrA NA/ a nud pra ta ra shi gA/ tA hi b+ha d+he gaM ga si ta pak+Sha/ samyak+saM bud+d+he/ a se bi tA/ b+hA bi tA b+hA ba tA ba hu lI kro d+ha stu ta sto mi ta/ 
40b8(rgyud): bir+Na tA pra shasta// / bu 'di ni kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po yin te/ de bas na bu khyod kyis kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 
41a1(rgyud): nyal ba na yang yid la gyis shig/ bu gang la la zhig kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di/ ming dang / rigs dang / rigs kyi bye brag yid la byed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud
41a2(rgyud): mad dang / khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am lha 'am/ lha mo'am/ klu 'am/ kla mo 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ mi'am ci mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po
41a3(rgyud): 'am/ lto 'phye chen mo 'am/ yi dgas sam/ yi dgas ma'am/ sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ lus srul po'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ kun tu 'od kyi
41a4(rgyud): rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gram/ lung 'bo ga gam/ ston tam/ 'chang na de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du bla na
41a5(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed/ par 'gyur// lhar gyur kyang rung / mir gyur kyang rung ste/ de mtshon cha'am/ dug gam/ chu'am/ mes par
41a6(rgyud): mdor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
41a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba'i 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od rgyal ba 'od srung gi
41a8(rgyud): rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
41b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mnyam pa med pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la
41b2(rgyud): phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang srong
41b3(rgyud): chen po 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshalo// zhi ba'i dbyingasu zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
41b4(rgyud): nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// / 'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
41b5(rgyud): rdzogs so// / bod skad du/ 'phag pa gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// 'di skad bdag/ gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das be sha la'i
41b6(rgyud): spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag lha ma yin rnams kyis rgol zhing gtses
41b7(rgyud): te/ bdag dang lha ma yin dus yun ring por mi mdza' zhing dgrar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ci nas kyang yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu'i chos bdag la bshad du gsol/ 
41b8(rgyud): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir ko'u shi ka khyod kyis nga'i snying po gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di long shig/ 
42a1(rgyud): tra thA/ urba ba/ ni tri sirbi/ udru rbu re/ hU le hU me/ di khu me/ pra tri ga ma A gats+tsha ma hA ma yu ri nA ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / 'khor thams/ 
42a2(rgyud): cad dang bcas pa la srungs shig srungs shig/ sarba kA ya bA ga ma no sh+tsa ra te swA hA// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal pa dang brgya byin lha'i dbang po yid dga' ste/ bcom ldan
42a3(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la rje su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te rdzogs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge
42a4(rgyud): 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tsha lo// dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las brgal// rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che // rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor ro// thams cad skyob pa'i
42a5(rgyud): shes rab dang // leg dang sel ba'i stobs nyid dang // gas ra thub kyi ni rlabs pa dang // 'od srung gi ni yon tan dang / shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdag ni rtag tu bde
42a6(rgyud): bar shog/ tad+ya thA/ dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dzi ti dzi ti/ a pa ra dzi te/ pa ra sa n+ya pra marda ni ye swA hA// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogaso// 
42a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a nan+ta mu kha ni hA ra na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags bsgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
42a8(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can/ tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
42b1(rgyud): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bcom ldan
42b2(rgyud): 'das kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing / mkhyen bzhin du/ tshe'i 'du byed rnams btang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal te/ mo'u dgal gyi bu
42b3(rgyud): chen po khyod song la/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na dge slong ji snyed gnas pa/ de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang 'dir sngas shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
42b4(rgyud): chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcodam ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ skad cig de nyid la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste/ 
42b5(rgyud): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skad kyis go bar byas pa/ bde gshegs slob ma sems can gang su dag/ 'jig rten khams 'dir gnas pa kun nyon cig/ deng 'dir ston pa
42b6(rgyud): chos kyi char 'bebs kyi// gang dag nyan par 'dod pa 'dir gshegs shig/ de'i tshe tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang su/ dge slong bzhi khri 'dus par gyur te/ de dag lhags nas
42b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
42b8(rgyud): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba gang mngon par 'dus byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
43a1(rgyud): rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po yang rung ste/ dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad/ tshal chen po'i
43a2(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs su 'du bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu mngon par
43a3(rgyud): 'du byas te phrul ma don pang 'dus byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/ dge slong
43a4(rgyud): ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de'i khang bzangs su 'dus par gyur te/ de dag lhags de nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
43a5(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ska da cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
43a6(rgyud): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
43a7(rgyud): po ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad
43a8(rgyud): rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'ong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / 
43b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid yongs su mi skye
43b2(rgyud): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang / 
43b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems
43b4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa
43b5(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
43b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
43b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed deng la/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha
43b8(rgyud): ma pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa 'am/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'am/ dad pas mos pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs
44a1(rgyud): pa'i khang bzang 'dir sdus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so/ 
44a2(rgyud): legs so zhes gsol nas skad cig de nyid la ltas de lta bu byas te/ ltas de byas pas/ tshul chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs su byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa/ bye ba khrag khrig
44a3(rgyud): stong rdzo da pa sa skyes pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag lhags par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gi thogs pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag dgu bcu dang / byang chub
44a4(rgyud): sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya 'bum phra ga brgyad cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ da' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
44a5(rgyud): phrag brgya stong phrag sum cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas mos pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bru ma phrag brgya stong phrag brgyad lhags par gyur to// de dag thams
44a6(rgyud): cad lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
44a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/ skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/ zhus pa lung bstan pa ji lta bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi som nyi
44a8(rgyud): thams cad spang bar 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / spobs pa myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
44b1(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
44b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang yin pa bzhi po de dag rjesu thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su dag pa
44b3(rgyud): dang / chos yongasu dag pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa dang nga/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag rjes thob par 'gyur ba dang / gya nom pa/ yid du 'ong bar byed pa'i
44b4(rgyud): chos bzhi rjesu thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// lus yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag yid du 'ong ba dang / sems yid du 'ong ba dang / skye ba yid du 'ong ba rjes su 'thob
44b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sgo mi bzad pas bsgrubs pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang po la mkhan
44b6(rgyud): pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa 'dus ma byas kyi gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa rje su thob par 'gyur ba
44b7(rgyud): de lta bu zhu ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag gis zhu gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus zhu ba ji skad smos pa ji ltar
45a1(rgyud): bzung ba ji ltar yid la byas pa/ ji ltar kun chub par byas pa de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol to// 'di skad ces kyang gsol te// bcom ldan 'das
45a2(rgyud): nu ba ji skad smos pa/ ji ltar bzung ba/ ji ltar yid la bgyis pa/ ji ltar kun chub par bgyis pa 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi spyod pa ji ltar yong su dag par 'gyur ba
45a3(rgyud): de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu lagaso
45a4(rgyud): leg so// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu ba dar sems dpa' khyod yang legs so// shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / 
45a5(rgyud): ngas khyod la bshad do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i busabacom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshalo// de bzhin no zhes gsod/ la te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom
45a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad khos mi len cing 'dzin par mi byed pa des/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags
45a7(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a Ne ma Ne/ a khe ma khe mu khe/ sa man+ta mu khe/ dz+ye ti sau me sa t+ye sat+kA rA me/ sau ti yuk+Shi/ ni ru k+ti/ ni ruk+Shi pra b+he/ hi li hi li
45a8(rgyud): kalpe/ ka lA si sA re/ sA ra wa ti/ hi li hi le hi le/ hi le hi le hi le/ ti le hi le/ he li le/ ma hA hi li laM/ hi le tuN+De/ tsaN+De/ tsa wane/ tsa rA tsa ra Ne/ a tsa le maH
45b1(rgyud): / ma na ga/ anan su 'o/ a d+he/ mi NAM/ niH ni/ niHrbA/ nib+hU/ rmAd+hAne/ nI de/ nIhA/ bim la/ d+hA/ 
45b2(rgyud): d+ha ne pra kr-i ti/ dI pa ne/ b+ha wa/ ni b+hA ba/ bi b+ha wan/ e sang+ge/ a sang+ga/ bi hAM re/ da me/ sha maM/ bi ma la/ bi ma la pra b+he/ sa mA kaR+Sha Ni d+hi ra
45b3(rgyud): ma hA d+hi d+hi re/ ya sho/ ya sho wa ti/ tsa le/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ sa ma tsa le/ dr-iD+h+we dre n+de san+ni su s+thi re/ a sang+ge/ a sang+ga bi hA re/ a sang+ga ni hA re/ ni hA re bi ma
45b4(rgyud): ni hA ra sho d+ha ne/ dr-i D+ha so me/ s+thi re s+tha ma/ s+thA ma wa ti/ ma hA pra b+he/ sa man+ta pra b+he/ bi pu li pra b+haM/ bi pra la rasmi sam+b+ha wa mu khe/ sarba trA nu ga te/ a nAts+tsha d+ye/ 
45b5(rgyud): anI ts+tshe d+ya pra ti b+hab+hA ne/ d+hA ra NI ni d+hin/ d+harma nid+hAn/ d+harmA ni d+ha na goSh+Tha/ sa man+ta b+hadre/ sarba tra thAgatahrid ya/ ang+giSh+ThA na ang+giSh+NI ta swAhA/ shA r-i'i du
45b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs 'di dge 'dzin pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed/ smod par mi byed/ btang snyomasu mi
45b7(rgyud): byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ rtsom par mi byed de/ de dag thob par bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi
45b8(rgyud): byed/ mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang mi mthong / chos rnams kyi skye ba yang mi mthong / 'gog pa yang mi mthong / 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong // 
46a1(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa yang mi mthong / chos gang yang sogs par yang mi byed/ 
46a2(rgyud): 'grib par yang mi byed/ rnam par rig par yang mi byed par/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa 'ga' zhig sgom ste/ de sgom pa na/ gzugs su ma yin/ gzugs med par ma yin/ mtshan du ma yin// 
46a3(rgyud): mtshan med par ma yin/ dpe byad bzang por ma yin/ dpe byad bzang po med par ma yin/ rnam par shes par ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med par ma yin/ nyon mongs par ma yin
46a4(rgyud): nyon mongs pa med par ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin/ la khrims med par ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin du ma yin// ting 'dzin med par ma yin/ shes rab tu ma yin
46a5(rgyud): shes rab med par ma yin/ rnam par grol bar ma yin/ rnam par grol ba med par ma yin/ rnam par grol kha'i ye shes mthong bar ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i
46a6(rgyud): ye shes mthong ba med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ skye bo med par ma yin/ rigs su ma yin/ rigs med par ma yin/ rus su ma yin/ rus med par med par ma yin
46a7(rgyud): 'khor du ma yin/ 'khor med pa ma yin/ gnas par ma yin/ gnas med par ma yin/ thob par ma yin/ thob par med par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs par ma yin/ mngon par
46a8(rgyud): rtogs pa med par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa zang par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa ma dzad par ma yin/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched du ma yin/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched med pa ma
46b1(rgyud): yin/ shes par ma yin/ shes pa med par ma yin/ chos ston par ma yin// chos mi ston par ma yin/ bdag rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ 
46b2(rgyud): sems can rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ sems can med pa rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ bdag gi don tu ma yin/ gzhan gyi don tu ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ 'dul ba
46b3(rgyud): ma yin/ lus rnam par dag par ma yin/ ngag rnam par dag par ma yin/ yid rnam par dag par ma yin/ spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa
46b4(rgyud): rnam par dag par ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa rnam par da/ dag par ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa rnam par dag/ par ma yin/ bdag gi rnam par dag par ma yin
46b5(rgyud): gzhan gyi rnam par dag par ma yin pa 'di ni shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
46b6(rgyud): zhes bya'o// don dam pa bsgrubs pas chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la mi 'jigs pa thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// gcig tu nges pa thob pas bsam pa thams cad yongasu
46b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes sgrub pas chos kyi gter mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rigs zil gyis mi non pa
46b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// dam pa yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
47a1(rgyud): sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i don thob pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
47a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang / yon tan thams cad kyi gter nges pa'i phyir ro// dmigs pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di
47a3(rgyud): nyid las/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi bye brag mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
47a4(rgyud): stsal to// chos rnams stong par dogs med cing // byang chub ched du spros mi byed// chos rnams 'khrugs par mi byed na// de phyir gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// mdo sde
47a5(rgyud): 'di ni mnyan par bya// 'di la gzungs 'di zad pa med// ye shes 'byor 'di 'di la te// des na byang chub thob par/ 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ 
47a6(rgyud): gzungs 'di rab tu bzung byas na// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas kyi// chos bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur// don dang tshig 'brus bskyed kun gyi// mchog gi chos ni rnam par shes// nyi
47a7(rgyud): ma'i 'od zer ji snyed pa// de snyed tshigs rnams shes par 'gyur// gang dag chos kyi mchog 'gyur ba// rlabs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te// gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin de la// thams cad
47a8(rgyud): rtag tu mngon du 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad kyis// de la bskal par dogs dris te/ the tshom thams cad chad gyur kyang // de yi ye shes mi zad do// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// 
47b1(rgyud): de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// byang chub mchog la nye ba ste// yid brtan gyur dang chos 'dzin pa'o// gzungs 'di 'dzin par su byed pa// de la sems can thams cad dga'// sangs rgyas
47b2(rgyud): rnams kyang de la dgyes// grags pa 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur// su zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// de ni 'chi ba'i dus byed che// sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong // lag pa de la nye bar 'jog/ gdungs
47b3(rgyud): 'di 'dzin par byed pa ni// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa// zla ba gcig gis byang bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang // bskal pa bye bar sgrub pa
47b4(rgyud): kun/ gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yis// zla ba gcig gis zil gnon 'gyur// khams gsum sems can ji snyed pa // gal te thams cad bdud gyur kyang // mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin/ 
47b5(rgyud): pa de la bar chad byed mi rus// byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du de// dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan 'gyur// gzungs kyi ma pa gang yin pa// de yi lce yi rtse mor gnas// ji ltar mdo
47b6(rgyud): sde brtan 'di la// gzungs ni so sor nges pa bzhin// 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa bstan// 'di las byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang // mar me zhes bya
47b7(rgyud): lung bstan// skad cig de la sangs rgyas ni// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed mthong // gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa 'dir ni rtogs 'dod cing // mdo sde 'di la bstan pa des// 
47b8(rgyud): thams cad myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang // nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang // / 'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag pa// mdo sde 'dis ni byed par 'gyur// de bas
48a1(rgyud): ngag ni yod 'gyur la// zhag bdun par du 'di sems dpa'// sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yis// de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur// bsam pa sems par mi bsam ste/ 
48a2(rgyud): bsam bya min pa'ang mi bsam mo// soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig/ de yi 'og tu gzungs thob 'gyur// dper na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i mi// nor la soms nyi med pa ltar// de bzhin gzungs
48a3(rgyud): 'di thob gyur nas// bde ba la yang som nyi med// 'di las rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye// de bas 'di la spyor bar gyis// zhi ba'i gnas ni thob myur nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas
48a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyuraro// bzhi gang
48a5(rgyud): zhen 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa yin/ sems can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin// bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong zhing 'gyod pa
48a6(rgyud): med par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin// nyin mtshan du 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba yin te// nyin mtshan du chos la dga' zhing chos 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
48a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba// 
48a8(rgyud): 'dod pa dring spang bar byos// de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen// ngan song rnams kyi rgyu yang yin// shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang grags pa'i phyir// pha rol dag la phrag dog mi bya ste// dga'
48b1(rgyud): 'i mig gis sems can bltas byas na// mthuche pa dang gzugs kyang mdzes par 'gyur// sems can gang dag pa cig thor 'gyung ba// de yiga'i rtsa yong su 'dzin pa ste// de lam gang la sred pa
48b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba spongs// sred pa spang ba byas na gzungs su 'gyur// gal te byang chub 'dod na gzhanam sems// nyin dang mtshan du chos ni brtsal bar byas// chos tshig 'di 'dra 'di dag sbyin byed na// de la
48b3(rgyud): gzungs ni mngon du 'gyur bar 'ong // shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyuraro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
48b4(rgyud): dgon pa dang / dben pa la gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa nyid dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la lhag par chags pa med
48b5(rgyud): ba dang sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta zhing tha na ru sa dang srog kyang yongasu gtong ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po
48b6(rgyud): de dag dang ldan ni gzungs 'di thos par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis/ 
48b7(rgyud): de la gnas pas gzhan la bsnyas mi bya// zab mo'i bzod la 'dun pa bskyed nas su// bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis// de ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir
48b8(rgyud): gyur pa'ishes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed// bya dang 'dra bar ngan ngon dag gis chog byas te/ mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par byos// kye ma sangs rgyas bstan pa
49a1(rgyud): legs pa snyed// sdug bsngal ma pa'i rtsag khyim yang spos// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang yongs dag pas// sangs rgyas ngan ches la gum par rtsam/ 
49a2(rgyud): rnyed 'dod dran pa ma yin shes rab min// dang drang tshul khrims ma yin chos sems min// de ni byang chub ring ste gnams bzhin// de ltas rnyed pa yongasu spang bar bya// shA ri'i bu
49a3(rgyud): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don khong du chud par bya'o// 
49a4(rgyud): brgyad po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pa zhes bya ba don dam pa chos thams cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / la zhes bya ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po
49a5(rgyud): dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de bzhin gshig/ sa pa'i chos kyi sku la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / ba zhes bya ba byis pa'i chos rnams dang / mkhas pa'i
49a6(rgyud): chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyi su med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / dzi zhes bya ba skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa'i 'gro
49a7(rgyud): ba mi skye/ mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / ka zhes bya ba las dang / rnam par smin pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / dA
49a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / sha zhes bya ba zhi gnas dang / 
49b1(rgyud): lhag mthong dang / lhag mthong med par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa dang / kA zhes bya ba chos thams cad skad cig pa ste gzod ma nas zhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa
49b2(rgyud): med pa dang / rgyu med pa dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'jug par khong du chud pa ste/ de ltar yi ge 'bru brgyad po de dag gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud
49b3(rgyud): pa dang po'o// gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te gzungs par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gnyis pa'o// zla ba phyed byed cing gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog
49b4(rgyud): pa dang / rjesu dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni do/ dan khong du chud pa gsum pa'o// gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
49b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yang dag par/ dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa la gzung pa'i phyir brtson
49b6(rgyud): par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa bzhi pa ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
49b7(rgyud): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// yi ge 'bru brgyad 'di dag bsam par bya// mdo sde 'di ni bris nas bcang bar bya// zla ba phyed cing rtag tu bklag par bya// sems can rnams
49b8(rgyud): kyang 'di 'dzin gzhug par bya// shes rab rgya chen byang chub nye dang shes rab rgya yang che ba ste// phyogs bcu rnams na sangs rgyas gang su dag/ bzhugs pa thams cad des ni mdun du mthong // 
50a1(rgyud): de phyir 'dun pa bskyed de 'di la bslab// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi
50a2(rgyud): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la dgongs pa dang / de la bdud kyi las mi 'byung ba dang / de'i las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byung ba dang / spobs pa
50a3(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad pa myur du 'thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
50a4(rgyud): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas su ngan gyis de ni yid la mdzad// de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// de yi las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byung / 
50a5(rgyud): spobs pa mtha' yas rnams kyang thob par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa grangs med// pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa rgya cher gyur pa
50a6(rgyud): tshad dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
50a7(rgyud): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ shA
50a8(rgyud): ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'khor
50b1(rgyud): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po snang ba 'dzin ces bya ba/ mi'i dbang por rin po sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // de'i bu yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de skyes nas so/ 
50b2(rgyud): bcu drug lon pa dang / des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal
50b3(rgyud): gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de las thos te/ des gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de lo bdun khrir rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis ma rten to// 
50b4(rgyud): non par ma gyur to// de lan 'ga' yang rgyal srid la dag/ da' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba'am/ bdag la dga' bar ma gyur to// de lo bdun khrir lan 'ga' yang
50b5(rgyud): sa la glos ma pab ste/ gcig tu nges par nang du yangadag 'dzeg la gnas so// sangs rgyas bye ba phragadagu las chos bstan pa thos te thos nas kyang nyam su blangs// 
50b6(rgyud): thams cad bzung ngo // gzungs nyams su blangs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de nyid la rab
50b7(rgyud): tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas de lo dgu khri 'das pa dang de sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di bsgrubs te/ bsgrubs nas kyang / sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do// 
50b8(rgyud): des tshe gcig po de nyid la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du btsud cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod
51a1(rgyud): par gyur to// shA ri'i bu 'khor de na/ tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos
51a2(rgyud): smra ba'i dge slong de las thos so// thos nas kyang rje su yi rang bar gyur te/ de rje su yi rang ba'i mdo las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa
51a3(rgyud): thos so// thos nas kyang nyam su blangs so// thams cad bzung ngo // thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang / tshig btsun pa dang / gzungs su bzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa
51a4(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' da chen po spobs pa rgyun mi chod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// / des bskal pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa sra bcom pa yang
51a5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mnyes par bya'o// mnyes par byas nas bskal pa gsum 'das nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
51a6(rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar
51a7(rgyud): gyur na/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de'i tshe de'i
51a8(rgyud): dus na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur to// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba chos smra bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa
51b1(rgyud): snyam du khyod som nyid / yid gnyis sa mthe tshom za bar gyur na/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
51b2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong tshes smra ba yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// shA ri'i bung dang / bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'
51b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de'i tshe gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang ste/ rje su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa des/ ngas bskal pa
51b4(rgyud): bye ba 'bum phrag bzhi khrir 'khor ba phyir brnyil to// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstan pa phos te/ thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang
51b5(rgyud): tshig btsun pa bzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs/ pa rgyun mi gcod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// shA ri
51b6(rgyud): bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ tha na gzungs kyi
51b7(rgyud): / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rje su yi rang bar yang brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched
51b8(rgyud): du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang chos smra ba rnams mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 
52a1(rgyud): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can/ 
52a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang shes pa 'am/ bsam par mi nuso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// mdo sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang // yi ger/ 
52a3(rgyud): bris dang bzung dang daklags pa yi// bsod nams chu ba ji tsam bskyed pa ni// sems can kun gyis shes par yong mi nus so// de ni tshe rabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong // de dag la yang
52a4(rgyud): dad pa bsam yas rnyed// mdo sde zab mo'i tshul yang shes par 'gyur// de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'chadang rgya// bla med byang chub ma reg par du yang // de ni ting
52a5(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang // gzungs rnams dang ni gzug sa dang longs spyod dang / sangs rgyas mthong las nyams par yongs mi 'gyur// rjes su dran pas sngon gyi
52a6(rgyud): tshe rabs na// tshong dpon bus ni gzungs 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye snyed mthong gyur te// des ni 'dod bzhin byang chub rnam sangs rgyas// mar me mdzad pa de tshe tshong dpon du// 
52a7(rgyud): sngon gyi tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur// de tshe chos smra sangs rgyas tshe dpag med// nga ni bskal pa bzang dang bcas yi rang // byang chub myur du reg par su 'dod dang // bdud rnams myur
52a8(rgyud): du gzhom par su 'dod dang / bsod nams brgya yi mtshan bzang su 'dod pa// 'di la brtson na rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed 'jig rten khams// gang gis rin chen bkang ste/ 
52b1(rgyud): sbyin byin yang // bris dang bzung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa// de la sbyin pas dper yang mi 'gyur ro// de ltas thos nas rtse gcig bag yod par// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas 'di bzung / 
52b2(rgyud): ngam/ gzungs 'di bris shing sems dpa'adi dag ni// byang chub rnyed pa dka' ba med par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sgo mthar
52b3(rgyud): yas pasgrub pa'i gzungs 'di la mngon par brjon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la/ gangs la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin brgyad gzi byin mdangs 'jug cig/ nyin mtshan du
52b4(rgyud): srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// / brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang / brtan po dang / bdag po dang
52b5(rgyud): sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / spyod pa'i blo gros dang / thub bka' dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / gnod sbyin lag bzang zhes bya ba ste/ gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag 'ong
52b6(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir/ shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos shin tu gtsang ma bgo ba dang / 'chag par 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya/ gzungs
52b7(rgyud): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yid la bya ste/ de ltar byas na de la gnod sprin brgyad po de dag myur du bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na smod pa'i lha
52b8(rgyud): rnams kyi nang du skyes pa brgyad po 'di dag kyang de la sems par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / 
53a1(rgyud): srang byed dang / shes rab 'a dang / nyida'i 'od dang / yang dag par bskul byed dang / bsam pa thams cad yong su chags byed dang
53a2(rgyud): skar ma'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag des gzungs
53a3(rgyud): thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o// byas
53a4(rgyud): pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tsher ba can dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / zab mo'i chos la bzod pa mngon par brtson par bya'o// byang chub
53a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtson pas/ kun 'gyed/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul du bla ste/ des ji ltar chung ba dang / ji ltar nyung ba
53a6(rgyud): las kyang sbyin pa sbyin par bya na// mang po las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
53a7(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sum cus ni sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// 
53a8(rgyud): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu sngon sems bskyed pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag drug nus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas/ 
53b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
53b2(rgyud): pa/ shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di/ sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu nges par mngon par 'phags
53b3(rgyud): par byed pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya bar ya rung shig/ gcig tu nges pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu thob par byed pa zhes bya bar
53b4(rgyud): yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang
53b5(rgyud): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'dzi/ garten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la/ mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas
53b6(rgyud): pasgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Sha Ta mu khi nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 
53b7(rgyud): 'bigs pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor
53b8(rgyud): gyi khyams nas gtsang ma'i steng gi na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa/ rin po che sna bdun rab tu phye bas rnam par spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 
54a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gdungs
54a2(rgyud): 'di zung shig/ de 'di lta ste/ bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gang la la myong ba de sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pam nyid du mgyur cig/ bdag gis 'jig rten
54a3(rgyud): pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang la la myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thung mong du yongasu spyad par gyur cig/ bdag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang la la yod bde/ so sa
