79a8(rgyud): nadade 'gro ba thams cad las srungs shig swA hA// kun dga' bo gzungs chen po rigasang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ nga yang
79b1(rgyud): da ltar 'chad cing rje su yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed
79b2(rgyud): dam/ kun chub par byed na/ de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gnas gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di
79b3(rgyud): rnams yin no// trad+ya thA/ an+te/ ban d+haM/ kA me/ k+Sha ma me/ d+hA na se/ ba da naM/ a da ne/ ad ne/ hu le/ ma hA laM/ ka re gaM b+hI re/ duSh+Ta sa twe/ bdag dang sems can thams cad
79b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swAhA// kun dag/ da' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang
79b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis/ gsungs te/ nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rjes su yi ring // kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
79b6(rgyud): bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na de tshe rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 
79b7(rgyud): de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ aT+TA/ baT+Te/ ag+ne/ ba/ 'gre/ khrag+ne/ d+ha ke/ d+hA ra
79b8(rgyud): d+haSh+pe/ Ta ke Ta ra ke/ a ka saM/ sa ka si/ ma ka si/ i li mi li/ ti li mi li/ re ra be/ ma hA ro ra be/ b+hU taM ga me b+hU ta ba rA ya Ne/ ti ma maM gi se/ ma hA ti mi se/ saM b+hA be/ ma hA saM b+ha ba
80a1(rgyud): bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig swAh+ma// kun dga' bo gzungs
80a2(rgyud): chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rje su yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
80a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du
80a4(rgyud): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems las phyir ra ldog par mi 'gyuraro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ ru le/ ma hA ru
80a5(rgyud): le/ he he ri/ mad ta ri dza~M b+ha ni/ sta ma b+ha ni/ kun dga' bo dad pa'i rig/ sa kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis shing skam po srung ba 'am/ 
80a6(rgyud): yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa
80a7(rgyud): dang / na mkha' bcing ba dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ de la srad bus bcings na de'i rtsa ba yang skye bar 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / lcug ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu yang skye bar 'gyur na/ 
80a8(rgyud): rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo nyi bla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di
80b1(rgyud): ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis ni sa la ltung yang srid do// kun dga' bo re'i rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yo yang srid do// kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar rgya che la/ 'di ltar rdzu
80b2(rgyud): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba bzhi po 'di dag ni skams shing yongs su zad de/ mthar thug par 'gyur yang srid do// kun dga' bos chen po 'di ni rnam pa stong du 'gyes kyang srid/ chu ni gsher ba nyid 'dor yang / 
80b3(rgyud): srid/ me ni chab 'dir yang srid/ rlung ni grang ba 'dor yang sred kyi/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sku mi srid do// kun dga' bo lnga'am/ klu'am/ lA ma yin
80b4(rgyud): nam nam mkha' lding ngam/ rlung lha'am/ dri za'am/ da mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gnod sbyin da nam/ srin po'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za'am
80b5(rgyud): grul bum mam/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am 'byung po'am/ bram ze srin po'am/ grib gnon nam/ mi dang mi ma yin pa gang la la zhig gam/ gzhan su
80b6(rgyud): yang rung ba zhig gis gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ tad+ya thA/ a g+ni le/ tsag+ni le/ bal le/ mal le/ oM hA ni/ mo hA ni/ dze bA ni/ staM ba ni bdag
80b7(rgyud): dang sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba ma
80b8(rgyud): lce gcig tu gyur pas/ de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gems so// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi b.rang dang / rnam thos kyi bu yang / lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'ag
81a1(rgyud): pa/ kun tu rab tu 'ched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas/ de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'grem so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang rdo rje 'ben to// gsang ba pa'i bang
81a2(rgyud): bo lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba dang / kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas/ de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gam so// de rgyal po'i pho brang lung lo can du
81a3(rgyud): gnasu mi dbang ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhi du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang
81a4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom da ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags depa gzungs chen po rdzog so// 
81a5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi le tse ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar cha dkyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// 
81a6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sprul pa a kA ra predz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang
81a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i
81a8(rgyud): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lnga
81b1(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
81b2(rgyud): dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'dzum
81b3(rgyud): sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las
81b4(rgyud): kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la de nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba/ gang dag gsang sngags da sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang
81b5(rgyud): sngags sgrub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas pa com ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
81b6(rgyud): leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / 
81b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba
81b8(rgyud): dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
82a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
82a2(rgyud): de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// mnyam par gzhag pa des smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer
82a3(rgyud): de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to// sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
82a4(rgyud): byang chub tu nges par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cadad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de bzhin gshegasadapa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab bo// 
82a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang 'a mnyam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / byas
82a6(rgyud): pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
82a7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA// ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
82a8(rgyud): bo/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las/ khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
82b1(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dngal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas
82b2(rgyud): nyid du lung yang bstan to// gang dag khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams
82b3(rgyud): cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ai dza ya dza ya/ pad mA b+he/ a ba me sa ra sa ra Ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi r-i d+hi ri/ de ba tA/ a nu pA la ni/ bud d+ho ta tA ra Ni bu
82b4(rgyud): ra ya pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba A shI ma ma pa ri pU ra ya sa pa/ da ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwa nAny+tsa/ sarba karma A ba ra NA ni bi da sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya bu d+hA a d+hiSh+Tha ne na swA hA/ don dam pa
82b5(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cadabaskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum/ 'brel tu/ sdig pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par byed pa 'di lta ste
82b6(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nuso// 'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyuraro// 
82b7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82b8(rgyud): phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba
83a1(rgyud): dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs slabs/ byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces
83a2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji
83a3(rgyud): tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo tshar
83a4(rgyud): to/ bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'dardzas kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sem das dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
83a5(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems da/ ba' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin/ dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
83a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// 
83a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hri da ya/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
83a8(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di dag bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang
83b1(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
83b2(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o// 
83b3(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu 'am
83b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
83b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbangaphyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
83b6(rgyud): gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'ded pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par yang dag par rje su blta'o/ 
83b7(rgyud): gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gzug so// gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no// stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
83b8(rgyud): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ 
84a1(rgyud): gang ba med pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/ 
84a2(rgyud): lce med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med/ ro med/ reg bya med/ chos med// mig gis khams med pa nas/ yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do// / 
84a3(rgyud): ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa zad pa med/ rga shi med/ rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do// sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa yang med
84a4(rgyud): do shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la dbarten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/ 
84a5(rgyud): phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma thar byin to// dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten nas
84a6(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyaso// de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa
84a7(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga te
84a8(rgyud): gte pA ra ga te/ pA ra saM ga te/ bo d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom
84b1(rgyud): ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes byi ba byin nas/ leg so legaso// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// 
84b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rje su yi rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das
84b3(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
84b4(rgyud): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan/ 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcon ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
84b5(rgyud): mdo rdzog so// / sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzung sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs
84b6(rgyud): sngags dang bcas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i tsan dan dri zhim po'i spos chus byugs pa'i sku/ zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ 
84b7(rgyud): rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phan par mdzad pa/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// 
84b8(rgyud): skud dpa byad kyis rgyan pa/ yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhed/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor
85a1(rgyud): bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ dpa' zhing gsal ba la nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa'i mchog stobs
85a2(rgyud): bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'dud do// oM b+ho/ hU~M hUM/ A A/ hrIh+ni/ shri ba shi ba/ shA~M ti shAM ti/ sha ma sha ma sham pa ya/ ta thA ga ta/ a nu ga ta/ swa b+hA ba/ a b+hA ba/ sa mud tA ya/ a
85a3(rgyud): sa ma ba la/ a bi ra la ba la/ a mi ta ba la/ a ti ba la/ hI g+h+r-i g+h+raM/ d+h+r-i dz+nye/ b+h+r-i b+h+yo/ b+he du b+he du/ hI hI/ b+ha ga bAM/ b+ha bAM ta ka sur ta b+ho ga ma hA/ shAM ti ka ra/ pra pa kil+lo Sha nA shaM ka sA hA// de nas dpe byad mtshan
85a4(rgyud): gsal bas// yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing // nyi ma 'anadon du gsal ba'o// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mnga' ba/ dgrags shing dri marab spangs la// dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo// 
85a5(rgyud): bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan// rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa 'o// rin chen sa gzhi chen po la// pho brang rtse mo rdo rje rtse// rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa// nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing // 'od zer
85a6(rgyud): dri med gsal bkod pa'i// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na// thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la// seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs// nor bu'i dbyig gi sa gzhi dang // khri chen rab dpa' de nyid la// de bzhin
85a7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgyes chen gyi// phun sum tshogs pa brgyan bkod lta// thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od// nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa// bde blag shin tu bkra shis tshul// 'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas// sku 'od 'bar ba'i
85a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor can// 'od gsal rgyas pa thub dbang gis// dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni// mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya// dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi// rdo rje can dag rab 'dul ba// gang yin de kun dngag byas nas// 
85b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dri med bskor bar byed// ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun// legs par shin tu dag byas so// srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la// rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba// 'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa// bkod nas
85b2(rgyud): bde chen rdo rje can// rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de// cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs// de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis// 'gengs shing mig ni glog ltar 'gyu// rig sngags hUM zhes sgrogs pa po// rdo rje 'jigs byed/ 
85b3(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa// bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par rgyan// sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing // / stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas// legs par mchod byas smras pa ni// kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'jom shing
85b4(rgyud): bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel// rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa// / thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// de gzigs dge/ deb du ma brnyes// sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur// byang chub sems
85b5(rgyud): dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang // rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi// yon tan 'di yis spos ldan 'di// thob pas spro bar mi nus// longs
85b6(rgyud): spyod rgya mtsho chen po can// byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du// rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i// phyir mi ldog pa'i chos chen ldan// 'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi
85b7(rgyud): sdig pa rnams// ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni// blo gros dri ma med par 'gyur// zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis la// rdul med rgyan te zhi bar byed// dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel// sdug bsngal thams cad nges
85b8(rgyud): par 'joms// dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste// sa sdengs sdig pa thams cad sel// ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin// bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul// nyes pa byas pa sel ba yi// gzungs 'di gang
86a1(rgyud): gis thos gyur des// sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang // ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing // khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba// gang zhig nyon mongs
86a2(rgyud): zhi byed pa// gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis// kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni// lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob// rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang // 'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun la lham me ba// bcom
86a3(rgyud): ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyi// dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa// 'di ni ji srid ma gsan par// rab ni nyon mongs 'dul ba yi// rang byung go 'apang ma brnyes te// rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas// gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag/ 
86a4(rgyud): de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang // legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas// thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa// 'khor ba 'di ni nam du yang // bdud kyi las dang 'khrug
86a5(rgyud): med dang ka/ mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa// gzungs la gnas pas / thob par 'gyur// gnas kyi dam pa thos nas kyang // thub pa dri ma/ med pa'i blo// gzigs pa bzang rnams gang gshegs pa'i// 
86a6(rgyud): bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni// tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par bgyis// nyon mongs pad par bya ba la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'dis chog/ sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang / 
86a7(rgyud): sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa// gang gis thos nas des spong ba// nga yis mngon sum 'byor par 'gyur// sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing // snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya// gzungs mchog gi ni mthu stobs
86a8(rgyud): kyis sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang // tshe rab bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa// dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang // da
86b1(rgyud): bzhin tshes ni bco lnga la// bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs te// cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod// de nas rmongs pa med par yang // nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing // shin tu thub dka' dpe med
86b2(rgyud): pa/ nyes pa bzlog pa'i gzungs brjod na// thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur// de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yang // rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur// 'od dpag
86b3(rgyud): med la mnga' ba yi// yon tan mtha' yas rab rgyan pa// bskal pa bye ba stong du yang // mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi tshig/ dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis/ 
86b4(rgyud): thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa// bcom ldan 'das la da bul bar byed// rdo rje ril ba la sogs pa// lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang // ri bo ta sai ri rab la/ 
86b5(rgyud): gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // de bzhin da ti/ la 'khor chen po na// 'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang / rnams dang // ma la ya yi ri bo la// gnas shing
86b6(rgyud): rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang // khyab 'jug lnga chen la sogs pa// lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams// nor bu'i
86b7(rgyud): dpung rgyan rna cha dang // rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus// rab tu bskyed de langs nas ni// sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// kun gyi sa yi
86b8(rgyud): dbang phyug go// thub mchog dam pa de la ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyid// shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba// dul ba bstan pa dri ma sel/ 
87a1(rgyud): dri ma med pa skyon bral ba// thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi// 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba/ 
87a2(rgyud): ston pa sngon mdzad brtan pa ste// sdig pa meng pa rdul dang bral// 'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa// dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras// nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa// ston pa po de dri ma se la// 
87a3(rgyud): spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba// zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan// btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings pa las grol nges
87a4(rgyud): par grol// 'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa// bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med// nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan// dpal mdzad de bzhin phan mdzad pa// mnyam pa
87a5(rgyud): med pa dpe med pa// khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong // / khengs pa med pa dman pa med// mnyam pa de bzhin/ mi mnyam mnyam// snang ba mnyes pa sna byed med// 'jig
87a6(rgyud): rten snang mdzad sdig med pa// sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo zhi bzhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad// mnga' bdag thabs/ 
87a7(rgyud): mkhyen thabs che ba// sems can kun gyi 'khras lags// don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan// rdo rje dkyil 'khor thub par dka'// skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos
87a8(rgyud): 'dzin pa// dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med// gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi longs spyod rgya tshe lags// dpe byad bzang po bkod pa'i sa// 
87b1(rgyud): spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston// dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po// de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin pa// mthu chen yangs pa rgya che ba// bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa// brtson chen spro ba che ba ste// dgyes pa
87b2(rgyud): chen po stobs po che// mthu brnyes bstan pa chen po ste// gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags// gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa// dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal// rab tu zhi ba mun pa med// blo
87b3(rgyud): gros chen po chos 'dzin te// phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes// 'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa// dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan// dpal gyi longs spyod shin tu rgyas// bcom ldan
87b4(rgyud): legs bgo bgo bar mdzad// gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa// mnyam dpa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med// rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal
87b5(rgyud): gzhi bcas sel ba mnyam pa lags// blo dang blo ldan dri mas ngas// gnas chen brtan pa ldan pa ste// rgyal ba long sa spyod dri ma med// thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba// bskal
87b6(rgyud): pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel// dri med skyon bral longs spyod can// sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes// sku bzang dag pa rig pa'i mchog/ thugs rje'i
87b7(rgyud): 'od ldan 'od bzang ba// mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags// chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas// rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che// nam mkha'i mtshan te rnam dag blo// rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis/ 
87b8(rgyud): pa/ khyu mchog che spyan pa rdzi ma// rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can// shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod brtan pa dang / sa dang stobs dang ye
88a1(rgyud): shes bzod// pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'// ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnam par bgol mngon sum pa// stong pas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde
88a2(rgyud): bar 'char ba lags// thams cad mkhyen pa yul las 'das// spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal// dam pa'i don te tshul che ba// shes bya'i yul rnams mtha'
88a3(rgyud): dag la// sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes// rin chen 'thun par skyes pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas// khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes// mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang
88a4(rgyud): mnyam// don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'// dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa// ga nod pa med par bde bar 'byin// blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen// 
88a5(rgyud): thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan// dkon pa bde bar 'thob 'gyur ba// mnyam pa khyad pa yul dang ldan// 'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon// zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'
88a6(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul// dpe med pa ste dper bya ba// 'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan// legs gsungs blo yi stobs kyis 'byung // mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa// rab dgyes
88a7(rgyud): 'das pa'i spyod yul can// gsung ba chen po ye shes che// gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste// mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das// bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po// sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/ 
88a8(rgyud): shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba// kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba// kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul rol
88b1(rgyud): pa'i thabs dang ldan// chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan bsgyur mdzad pa// spyod pa ma lus 'dud par mdzad// yongasu rdzogs pa rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas// bgegs
88b2(rgyud): mad ma legs byed pa bcom// bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes// dpa' bo chen po thub med stobs// theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs// blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi// 
88b3(rgyud): nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa// nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste// sangs rgyas pa yi 'bras
88b4(rgyud): bu gnas// gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen// khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs// bde 'byungs dang zhing rnams kyi// mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod// sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la
88b5(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// de la lha tshogs tshogs rna/ mas kyis// phyag byas mgo smang phyogs gcig 'khod// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni// gnas pa ma lus chem mar 'khod
88b6(rgyud): thong du rdo rje'i thod 'chang zhing // langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos// dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du// skad ber chen por yongs bkang nas// nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing // ha ha drag pa'i sgra sgrogs te// 
88b7(rgyud): kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa// byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya
88b8(rgyud): rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang // gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni// sgrib dang kun nas nyon mong/ 
89a1(rgyud): dang / sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing // nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spongs// shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur// 
89a2(rgyud): de ni longs spyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas sras de la// bcom
89a3(rgyud): ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis// mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste// nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin gshegs bde
89a4(rgyud): mngon du phyogs// gzhan gyi mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// mtshan da brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa// de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de/ sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan cig thos pa tsam gyis
89a5(rgyud): kyang / de dag sa chen 'bras bur 'gyur// ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na// 'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos// de phyir rtag/ tu rab sgrims la// gtan tu bde ba 'dod pa yis// yon tan rgya
89a6(rgyud): mtshe ldan pa'i gzungs// mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni// de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur// 'di ni
89a7(rgyud): yon tan kun gyi snod// dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa// kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla med mchogabade 'byung thob par byed pa yin// 'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung // thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med// 
89a8(rgyud): kun mkhyen go 'bang thob gyur nas// dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan// sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan// snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa/ 
89b1(rgyud): 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ma // 'jig rten ku gnas dga' bste// 'jig rten kun gyi de 'byung ba// 'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med// snyan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun brtacwa brgyad pag nga drugs
89b2(rgyud): dang bcas paldog s+ho// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA thub pa la phyag 'tsha'o// d+ya thA/ oM sun suM ni ma du sun yis tu/ 
89b3(rgyud): lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzog so// 
89b4(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam dpar snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
89b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tsha'o// dz+ha/ thA/ ka la ka la/ kaM li kI li/ bi ri bo ri/ hu ru hu dz+ra/ rnaM can pashrIs ts+tshed ti Ag ts+tsha/ Ar+ya Aka shag d+hA ma hAk+Sha
89b6(rgyud): Ni ka pU ra ya ta shan/ dA ra ya budz+nye bi shwa yan/ 6 ra/ tsi tsi ri swAhA/ bton pas 'grub ste/ mtshan cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dug sbyang ma dang / byang sems rnams kyis ma tshugs/ 
89b7(rgyud): rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// gang du bris te bzhag pa der// yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nang thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa'i rang
89b8(rgyud): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin
90a1(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tong b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi ta bi kAn+ta gA mi ni/ ga ga na kIr ti ka re/ 
90a2(rgyud): sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA// gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na/ de rnams zad par rig par bya'o// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa
90a3(rgyud): byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba snyan par yang 'gyur// snang ba mtha' yas rjesu dran pa rdzog so// / zla ba'i
90a4(rgyud): 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ dasangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra tsan+ne/ su tsan+de// ma ti tsan+d+ra/ tsan+d+ra ka ra Na/ si ri si ri/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ 
90a5(rgyud): d+har+m+ma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ saM g+ha a dISh+Ti te swAhA// rigs kyi bu' ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te// zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi
90a6(rgyud): khri'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyuraro// zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjesu dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rje su dran pa rdzog so// 
90a7(rgyud): namaHsarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ a nu ga te/ oM ku ru gi ni swA hA// 'di lan gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa
90a8(rgyud): spyi'i snying po rjesu dran pa rdzog so// / sangs rgyas rin chen gtsugs tor can la phyag 'tshalo// na mo rat+na shi khi ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya k+saM bud d+hA ya/ tang shwa/ rat+ne rat+ne/ 
90b1(rgyud): rat+na shi khe ne swA hA// 'chi ba'i tshe dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran par
90b2(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ pU dza me g+ha na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// na mo ratAtra/ 
90b3(rgyud): yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ badz+ra sAr pra mdza ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+tha te sa mrak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ ma hA te dza badz+re/ mahA bid+yA swA hA/ ma hA bo d+ha tsit+ta badz+re/ ma hA bo d+hi ma N+Do pa saM k+Sha ma~MN/ 
90b4(rgyud): badz+re/ sarba barba A pa ra Na/ thi sho d+han badz+re swA hA// gzungs sngags 'di'i chog ni 'di yin te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la dbugs bcu dgan bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA klung gi byem
90b5(rgyud): rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing / zhabs la phyag/ byas par 'gyur ro// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / smra sa dang / me tog breng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos
90b6(rgyud): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan thams cad dang / gdan dang / gding ba dang / na bza' dang / spyan gzigs dang / bshos gtsang la sogs pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub thams cad kyis
90b7(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin
90b8(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po
91a1(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams pa bzhin yang dag par 'brang zhing / srung ba dang // skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
91a2(rgyud): can du skye bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs par lan cig dran pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyuraro// mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// // dkon mchog gsum
91a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag
91a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM ta ra ta ra/ ti rI ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la da ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hI da ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ b+ha ya b+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na
91a5(rgyud): dza ni me sha pra b+ha ya swA hA/ dza la ne b+hid+ha ni bai swAhA/ ku ru pany+tsa li sA/ hA/ sA ga ra saM bi ro swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Ti/ te swA hA// gzungs 'di'i cho ga 'di yin te/ nang par langs nas lan
91a6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// sman lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// de la mig nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lus la nad 'brung
91a7(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du yid rnam pa lnga yang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyuraro// 
91a8(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos mthong ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur// lus mdzes par
91b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sems dang par 'gyu'o// 'phags pa pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gdungs rdzogs so// / rgyag skad du/ su ru ba nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bang skad du/ su ru ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
91b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// na maHsu rU pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+yA te/ samyak+saM bud+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru/ pra su ru pra su ru/ ta ra ta ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa~M b+ha ra
91b3(rgyud): saM b+ha ra/ sma ra sma ra/ Sh+Tha ba gas nas ga sarba pre ta nA ma swA hA// gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i phan le lan bdun yongasu bzlas te/ lag pa g.yon pas se gol gyi sgral na gsum du byas nas yi dgas thams cad/ 
91b4(rgyud): la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing / 'di skad kyang brjod pa dar bya ste/ skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i yi dgas
91b5(rgyud): rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o// zhes pa'o// zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o// de ltar/ na yi dgas thams cad la 'bras bre'i che re re'i bza' ba so sor byin pa/ 
91b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de ltar byas na skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur// dbul por mi 'gyur ro// stobs che ba dang / mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / byug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro// tshe rang zhing nang med pa
91b7(rgyud): dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyuraro// gzugs legs shes
91b8(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ad+ya aSh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA rA Ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya
92a1(rgyud): pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas
92a2(rgyud): spos dri la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
92a3(rgyud): zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
92a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tsha lo// tad thA/ d+ha red+ha re/ d+hA re d+hA re NI ka ra na ko te/ a b+ha ya kalpe kalpA ni/ ga Ne a nan+ta kalpe/ a mr-i ta kal+le/ hutA sha re/ a nan+ta
92a5(rgyud): khe/ a nan+ta tsak+Sha sa mung+ga te/ oM b+ha swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'a gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi/ 
92a6(rgyud): bye ma rnyed dag gis gsungs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rje su yi rang ba yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de/ 'jigs pa brgyad po/ sems
92a7(rgyud): can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas
92a8(rgyud): pa dang / bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas padag las yang dag par
92b1(rgyud): 'da' bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur/ 
92b2(rgyud): zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/ sprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyuraro// na maHsarba bid+yA/ sid d+hA nu me man+ta pad swA hA// 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
92b3(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA bai sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
92b4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad dbadag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul dgyi le'i dgun zla ra ba tshes nyi shu la/ yul dug ron can na/ 
92b5(rgyud): grong khyer sin tse zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don gcig gi phyir/ gro khyer gan so zhes bya bar song ste/ dge slong de mi yul gyi grong khyer
92b6(rgyud): nas dpag tshad brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang / dge slong des/ bar der mi lus chen po khrun tu 'doms sum cu yod pa/ bzhin 'dom bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des
92b7(rgyud): mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/ des dbus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mi lus chen po ga
92b8(rgyud): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smraso// ci khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de/ 'dir 'khod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong de de bzhin// 
93a1(rgyud): dge slong des smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams la nad rnam pa sna
93a2(rgyud): tshogs pa 'byung ste/ gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so// des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang
93a3(rgyud): gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang nam mkha' bar skabs na mi snang ngo // de'i tshe lha dang lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/ g.yul bkye ba dang / lha rnams ni 'pham/ lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i
93a4(rgyud): tshe 'byung po dang / yi dgas rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sem/ das can rnams la nad gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha dgor dang / 'brum phran dang / me dpal dang / lto ba na pa
93a5(rgyud): dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsu ma pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang
93a6(rgyud): 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad pa dang / mig nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrub po/ 'di lta ste/ char ches pa dang / than pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i
93a7(rgyud): char gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'ongs 'phrog/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ tshe dang stobs dang / mdog dang gzugs 'phrog ste/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can thams cad nang sA
93a8(rgyud): tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to// gtum po seng ge dang / srung ki dang / stag dang / sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la dus
93b1(rgyud): ma yin par chud za ba nye bar gnas pas/ sems can rnams nad las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang / bar ma dang / gzhon pa dag las bkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi bar
93b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir/ nga dge slong khyod kyi gan du yongs kyis/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems/ 
93b3(rgyud): can thams cad ni/ 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro// de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs
93b4(rgyud): te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan dgyis shig/ dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu rgyun tu dad par/ dgyis shig/ lha brjod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
93b5(rgyud): mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams la spos dang me to ga dang bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig/ khyad pa ra can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig/ nyi ma bdun yan lag
93b6(rgyud): brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs rab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ bi pu la gaN+DI te/ 
93b7(rgyud): bi s+phu la sA re/ bi bu la yo na she/ a na sa le/ a na la saM b+ha be/ an le te/ sha ta kar/ b+he dza li ne swA hA/ dza ma b+ha ni/ sam+b+ha naM/ mo ta ne swAh+ma/ bon ta ri ka yang swAhA/ ho me d+harmaM/ d+harmA tsi ta le swAhA/ 
93b8(rgyud): d+ha re bAd+ha re sAhA/ ka la bai ka ru ta ye swAhA/ shA te phen ne ni tra pan+ya sA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bi du ru d+hi ye swA hA/ bi la ma pa tsun d+ha ye swAhA/ a ba lo ka~M ta bi lo ki tA ye swA hA/ a dz+nyA na bid+ha ma n+ya sA hA/ pad+mas/ 
94a1(rgyud): re pad+ma sa~M b+ha re/ ki ka re/ hi taM ka ri ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tsan+da prab+he/ tsan+dan gar+b+he/ tsan+da nur+Ne/ ke la
94a2(rgyud): sa pa ti/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a deSh+Ti ta a nu mo de ti swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya la ba d+he/ dza ya ma hA me he sAhA/ byang
94a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga na ar+ye/ ga ga na sa mud ga te/ ga ga na bi krAn ta Shishwi te/ a dze me dzI pad+me dzi swAha/ 
94a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di ngalta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ho b+ha dre/ ma hA b+ha dre/ a ti b+ha dre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ bi ga ta rA dza me/ ma hA bi ga tA rA dza se/ sa gting ga
94a5(rgyud): te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par se la ba la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ he ma he ma ha ma ha ma swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag
94a6(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ ma mi ng+ge/  mo ti'i smye de/ a mi ta ga ga ni kArti ka re swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ gag na a/ 
94a7(rgyud): ka re rag ga na saM b+ha be/ ga ga na kIrti ka ra swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ sa ma sa me swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal
94a8(rgyud): mtshan stsal gyi 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// a sa ma a sa me swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ mA nA bi shu d+he/ pad+me shwa re/ pad+ma saM b+ha re/ king
94b1(rgyud): ka re ya ting ka re le swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag
94b2(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ ma ti bi ga rA dza se/ he ma ga ti/ karma ma hA rA dza dza/ bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ mai tri ma ni se swA hA/ byang chub sems
94b3(rgyud): dpa' 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di lta ste/ gar+b+he gaN+DI/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ek+Sha ye nu/ ak+Sha ye bu/ at+ma
94b4(rgyud): ya kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ni pu swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di lta ste/ da kIrti tA/ sar+b+ba dza ni/ a b+hi kIrti tA/ badz+ra sar+b+ba dzi naM/ badz+ra a ka re/ 
94b5(rgyud): badz+ra be dI ka re swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams ca nga rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ sarba/ A ba ra Na bi skam bi t+yai swA hA/ d+hA tu bi kar t+ye swA hA/ me g+ha mi s+pho Ta
94b6(rgyud): mi swAhA/ a pa rA dzi ta kA yi swAhA/ ba la dang t+yaM swA hA/ da kar+Na da pa me s+yAhA/ karma nir+thA bi tA kA ye swA hA/ e ka a ra ma ye swA hA/ yo gA tsa rA ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba bud+hA e b+hi Shi ka ta ye swA hA/ prad+d+ho ba ku
94b7(rgyud): te ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma a bi Shi ka ta ye swA hA/ sarba bud+d+ha a b+hi ShI ta ye swAhA/ e ka shr-i gA ya swA hA/ a shraM gA ye swA hA/ b+ha ta yai swA hA/ a saM b+hU ta ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba duHkho pra sha ma N+yai swA hA/ zla 'od/ 
94b8(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tse dra pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+ha a ka re/ pra b+hod ka re/ pra b+ha ba taM/ d+har+m+ma bi shu d+haM/ karma bi shu d+hir/ b+ha ba tu me swA hA// tshe brjod gang la la zhig rigs sngag
95a1(rgyud): 'dis nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du bya ba byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// dge slong bdun la zas sbyin no// me las me spel
95a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la sti stang byas la bskor ba bya'o// dam pa'i chos bri ba dang / bklag pa la brtson pa bya'o// gal te yams kyi nad cher byung nas/ khyim nas khyim
95a3(rgyud): dang / grong nas grong dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du/ khu ba dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos kyis mchod pa bya'o// nad pa gang yin pa des kyang / cho ga 'di bzhin du byas na/ de myur du/ 
95a4(rgyud): nad las thar bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzho dan nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras // dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos
95a5(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ 
95a6(rgyud): chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur bar
95a7(rgyud): yul nas yul dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe brjod rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
95a8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bad gnyid thar bar 'gyuraro// sus lan gnyis bklags na de lta bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar 'gyuraro// sus lan gsum
95b1(rgyud): bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye bo dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor thams cad thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan lnga bklags na de nyen 'khor gyi rgyal po dang
95b2(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di
95b3(rgyud): dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog gam/ yi ger mi 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dag
95b4(rgyud): la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu mi ston na/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ mi nyan tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
95b5(rgyud): yongasu mi bsngo na 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba/ ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o// yang 'jam
95b6(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par bya ba yin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad
95b7(rgyud): bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang dri za rnams la rjesu bstan pa dang 'thun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o// de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi/ 
95b8(rgyud): snang bar gyur to// dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de bzung nas song ngo // 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / 
96a1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mU la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag
96a2(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang me'i stengs gi na mkha'i dkyil na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba so
96a3(rgyud): sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag khyed cag nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
96a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ba sam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ ti 'a dadzin gyi bye brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
96a5(rgyud): 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid la bsams pa yong su rdzogs par
96a6(rgyud): byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin tu legs par nyon la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbar
96a7(rgyud): babatud nas bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / sa chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / 
96a8(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnam su skye bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba dang / nad rnams zhi bar byed
96b1(rgyud): pa/ longs spyod kyis byug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi byed pa/ re ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
96b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs dang / phan pa'i thugs dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas bcom ldan
96b3(rgyud): 'das de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/ yul
96b4(rgyud): rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod pa nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
96b5(rgyud): dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la la/ na gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig
96b6(rgyud): rten gyi khamasu song nas/ byang shar phyogasu brgya stong gi gang ga'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rje su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun tu skyes
96b7(rgyud): pa rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro// der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang
96b8(rgyud): ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras
97a1(rgyud): pa/ rgyal ba'i sras dag 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smras// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
97a2(rgyud): chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas 'od gang na ba de logasu mngon du bltas nas 'dug go// de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang
97a3(rgyud): ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
97a4(rgyud): spyi bor nub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs
97a5(rgyud): pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal na/ sa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad
97a6(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom
97a7(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib
97a8(rgyud): mo dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad
97b1(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshalo// 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang / 
97b2(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
97b3(rgyud): kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i sras leg so leg so// 'di lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan
97b4(rgyud): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nuso// 
97b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgya la po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te
97b6(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/ sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad
97b7(rgyud): byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang dag par bsgrub par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi
97b8(rgyud): gsungs par gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par dgongs nas byams pa'i thugs kyis
98a1(rgyud): sngags gsu so// namaHsarba bud dA na oM ma/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting 'dzin de las 'angs
98a2(rgyud): nas dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskums pa la sa btung ba dang / brkyang ba las bskums pa'am/ se gol btogs pa tsam mamra/ mig 'byed badzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi nug
98a3(rgyud): bloting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'o/ de 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su chas te song ba dang / steng gi na mkha'i dkyi len nor bu rin po che
98a4(rgyud): rtags rigs gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas chas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bsag dasal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gas
98a5(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par dug so// 'jam dpalang/ zhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs pa ma thag tu rin du che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin pa
98a6(rgyud): tshe'i gdugs dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag dum rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jas
98a7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ 'on kyang nga'i dkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyamang ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par
98a8(rgyud): gnas sa ma zhes zhu bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ras
98b1(rgyud): yang gzhon nu gang+ga'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang ba
98b2(rgyud): dang dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs dang / cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang / brtul zhugs pasam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad
98b3(rgyud): dga' bar byed pa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byam 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa shes pa/ rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/ sngags bzla ba yul gyi mthar
98b4(rgyud): 'gro bar byed pa/ mi spang bar byed pa dang / dus dang / dam tshig rab 'byam gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'jig rten dpa ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs
98b5(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa maHra thugs pa gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsungs par
98b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar rje su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te/ 
98b7(rgyud): khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro// yang gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ a tsin t+ya a pra tiha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM s+phar smA ra a pra ti ha ta shrI sa ni ku mA ra rU pa ha ri Na/ oM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// 'di
98b8(rgyud): ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur la/ khyod kyang mi
99a1(rgyud): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas dbye ba dang / rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di
99a2(rgyud): rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro// 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni/ oM bAkye de na maH'dir nye ba'i snying po ni bI kye hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal
99a3(rgyud): de 'dibang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyu 'thun pa byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// bcom ldan
99a4(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam parabakod pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phreng ba de'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel ba/ snyan
99a5(rgyud): pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / byug pa dang phreng ba dang / phye ma'i char dbab par mngon par sprul to// 
99a6(rgyud): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas ba spu ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing spangs
99a7(rgyud): te/ ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur tam zhes phan tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthon pos smra ba rtsom par byed de/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das yongasu bskyab du gsol// shAkya thub pa
99a8(rgyud): yongasu bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs ma 'jigs shig/ 
99b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de spyan snga nas nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen
99b2(rgyud): bkur bya ba dang / don chen po'i spyod pa dang / sngags kyi tshig dang / rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das
99b3(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud de/ tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ skyes
99b4(rgyud): bu bskyes pa khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// skyes bu gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal// spyod pa thams cad don sgrub pa// skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal
99b5(rgyud): phung khrol thams cad bzlog byed pa// dpa' bo chen po l+ya/ daphyag 'tshal// ngan 'gro thams cad 'jigs byed/ pa// skyes bu padade dkar khyod phyag 'tshal// kun nas
99b6(rgyud): bsod nams dri ldan pa// skyes bu pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal// srid gsum 'dam ni rnam dag byed// rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed// zhi gyur khyod la
99b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// thams cad ldan pa legs 'dul byed// thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub byed// bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis
99b8(rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas kun la khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kun rnam par rtogs mdzad pa// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par rje su zhugs shing ston par byed pa'i de
100a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// shes pa dang shes bya'i dngos po thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / theg pa gsum gyi lam dang / mya
100a2(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed pa dang / gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
100a3(rgyud): sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang ga'i klung brgya phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes
100a4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis te/ de na me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin
100a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri/ ga pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 
100a6(rgyud): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongs su dkar
100a7(rgyud): pa/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sngags kyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod
100a8(rgyud): pa'i lam sgrub par byed pa/ skyob pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang / shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yongs su mthar phyin par byed pa sems
100b1(rgyud): can rnams la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de yang bcom ldan
100b2(rgyud): 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o// 'di skad kyang gsung ste/ gang du 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
100b3(rgyud): shAkya thub pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes so// de yang lam gsum dang / byang grol dang / mir skye ba thob pa nyid kyi chos ston par byed do// gang du sems can gyi ris skal pa med pa dang
100b4(rgyud): srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms par byed pa'i lam dang / gtan du grub pa dang / bde ba dang / 'thun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams 'god par byed pa'i
100b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
100b6(rgyud): 'das kyis mkhyen par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis ci zhig 'tshal ba rdo thog/ dbang phyug gis rnam par 'phral pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas
100b7(rgyud): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par gyur ram/ 'tshal bar ram/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i rjesu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang / spyod pa 'tshal bar ram/ mdor na bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong
100b8(rgyud): gi bar du yang bstan par mi nuso// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsdus pa 'am/ tha dad ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'di ni chos 'dus ma byas su blta
101a1(rgyud): par bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba la brten pa 'am/ yon tan ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho nas mkhyen pa yin gyi/ bdag gis ni ma lags so// 
101a2(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas rin po che'i pad+ma sprul pa la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta zhing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
101a3(rgyud): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang rje su 'thun pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs sngon du 'gro ba mdzad nas chos bstan pa dang rjesu 'thun
101a4(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang rjes su 'thun pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i skad dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra skad kyi gsung gi
101a5(rgyud): dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gnorur gyur pa khyod legs par ngas pa/ sems das chen po'i spyod pas ngas rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sgrub pa
101a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don thob par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi tshig dang / gsang ba dang bcas pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'a khor chog
101a7(rgyud): dang / dbang bskur ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa sgrub pa'i thabs thams cad dang ldan pa/ rgyad shes pa dang
101a8(rgyud): shes bya dang / dus dang / mi snang ba dang / rgyal po'i zhing du gyur pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes par byed pa/ mdor na sems can thams cad
101b1(rgyud): kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rang gi yon tan dang 'thun pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa rjesu 'jug pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/ mi snang bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha' la 'gro
101b2(rgyud): ba/ chu la mi nub par 'gro ba/ yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'gugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa/ mngon du spyod par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par byed pa/ gnod sbyin
101b3(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / sha za dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu gnas ji lta ba
101b4(rgyud): bzhin 'jog par byed pa/ mdor na las thams cad byed pa ste/ yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa mngon spyod dang / rgyas pa dang / zhi ba'i las
101b5(rgyud): dag rab tu byed pa/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de lta ter byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che bskal pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam 'di ngas kyang rje su gnang
101b6(rgyud): zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs te/ sems can dag pa'i rang gi sngags spyod pa'i don gyi chos kyi mdzod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi
101b7(rgyud): rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bstan pa'i phyiraro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'od kyi snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan yang dag par
101b8(rgyud): bskul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can gyi 'od kyi snang bas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'og
102a1(rgyud): min gyi gnas kyi bar dang / mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar du khyab par byas te/ sems can gang su dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu ni pa/ 
102a2(rgyud): gyur to// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul nas/ 'od de yang 'jam dpal gzhon nu
102a3(rgyud): gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsugs tu nub par gyur to// 'dir gang dag shar phyogs na rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'od zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi reg pa'i bya bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang
102a4(rgyud): dag par bskul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi zla ba dri snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu
102a5(rgyud): snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po yang da ga par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshig/ sa pa sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
102a6(rgyud): pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ye shes rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dbang po'i
102a7(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba mtha'
102a8(rgyud): yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa dag la/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas
102b1(rgyud): gtsang ma'i khang bzang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa
102b2(rgyud): dang sngags kyi tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam ston te/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i
102b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdud kyi gnas thams cad dpa' bskong bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongasu bskor cing nyan
102b4(rgyud): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun gyis bltas te/ nas gtsang ma'i gan su sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po blta bar 'dod pa
102b5(rgyud): dang / sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dpar dang / le'u'i tshogs dang / de bzhin gshen/ sa pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa gsal bar 'dod pas chas
102b6(rgyud): pa ni 'di lta ste/ lag bzang dang / rin chen bzang po dang / brtul zhugs bzang po dang / spyan mdzes dang / bzang dga' dang / chos bzang dang / don thams cad grub pa dang // thams
102b7(rgyud): cad du 'phags pa dang / chos 'phags dang / rin chen 'phags dang / rin chen dpal dang / lhun po'i dpal dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang / 'od byed dpal dang / 'od
102b8(rgyud): dngal dang / don thams cad kyi dpal dang / thams cad drag na rin po che dang / phyag na gtsug gi rin po che dang / phyag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin
103a1(rgyud): chen snying po dang / ye shes snying po dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags kyi snying po dang / rgyal mtshan gyi tog dang / tog bzang dang
103a2(rgyud): mtha' yas tog dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / mtha' dag gi tog dang / nam mkha'i tog dang / rin po che'i tog dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i skad kyi rgyal po dang / mtha' yas par snang
103a3(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang / mun pa mun nag thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / gnod pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyal po dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi yul shes pa'i rgyal po dang
103a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mngon par rtogs/ dpa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rgyal po dang / nges par g.yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po
103a5(rgyud): dang / nyi ma'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa yang da ga par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / mi mthun
103a6(rgyud): pa'i phyogs med pa'i rgyal po dang / rang bzhin gyi 'od dang / bsod nams 'od dang / 'jig rten 'od dang / dpag med 'od dang / mtha' yas 'od dang / spyan bzang 'od dang / 'byung
103a7(rgyud): med 'od dang / don gyi 'od dang / mi tshugs pa dang / bzod par dka' ba dang / las med dang / 'og min dang / dri med dang / me dang / 'od dang / blo dang / rtogs pa dang / bde ba dang / 
103a8(rgyud): bde ba'i mu khyud dang / mu khrud tog dang / 'dod pa'i lha dang / lha dang / lha yul na yod pa dang / lte ba dang / rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten zhi ba dang / nye bar 'dod pa dang / rnga bo che dang / grub pa
103b1(rgyud): dang dkar po dang / grags bzang dang / bzod par dka' ba dang / rnyed par dka' ba dang / gdul bar dka' ba dang / snyen par dka' ba dang / ring du song ba dang / ring ba'i don dang / ring ba la
103b2(rgyud): gnas pa dang / mtho ba dang / shin tu mtho ba dang / srin bu me khyer dang / kun tu snang ba dang / snang med dang / khyu mchog dang / kun nas 'od dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / yid bzang
103b3(rgyud): dang / lha chen po dang / dri med bzang po dang / dri ma mthar byed dang / dul ba dang / zhi ldan dang / mtshan bzang dang / rgyal mtshan dkar po dang / tshad ldan dang / ci smra dang / tha chungs
