103b4(rgyud): dang / sel byed dang / 'tsho ba dang / legs skyes dang /  du ba'i tog dang / rgyal mtshan tog dang / dkar ba'i tog dang / tog bzang dang / nor lha'i tog dang / nor lha'i
103b5(rgyud): bu dang / mes po dang / pa dang / mthar byed dang / 'ji ga rten grags pa dang / kun nas grags pa dang / gra gas pa chen po dang / dpal ldan dang / pham byed dang / 
103b6(rgyud): 'od byed dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / zhi byed dang / 'jig rten dang / lha byed dang / mtho ris byed dang / mar me mdzad dang / 'byung po mthar byed dang / don thams cad mdzad dang / grub
103b7(rgyud): mdzad dang / gsal mdzad dang / snang bar mdzad pa dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / skad kyi sgra dang / sgra snyan dang / mtha' yas pa'i sgra dang / tog gi sgra dang / ngan spong gi bu dang / gser thub dang / 'khor
103b8(rgyud): ba'ajigs dang / 'od srung dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / rnam par gzigs dang / shAkya thub pa dang / 'di dag dang gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po dag gis
104a1(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas te/ pad+ma'i gdan dag la bzhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang de lta bu'i tshul du lhags par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 
104a2(rgyud): phyag na rin chen dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / mnyam pa'i phyag dang / na mkha'i phyag dang / mtha' yas phyag dang / sa'i phyag dang / snang ba'i phyag dang / dri med bzang po dang / bzang brtsegs dang / nor
104a3(rgyud): bu brtsegs dang / rin chen brtsegs dang / rin chen phyag dang / kun nas phyag dang / dri ldan phyag dang / legs 'gro dang / dri med 'gros dang / 'jig rten 'gros dang / mdzes pa'i 'gros dang / mtha'
104a4(rgyud): yas 'gros dang / grags pa mtha' yas dang / grags pa ba dazang po dang / grags pa'i dri ma bral dang / grags pa'i 'gro ra ba dang / grags pa dri ma med pa dang / grags pa dang / grags
104a5(rgyud): pa 'dren pa dang / mgon po dang / mgon por gyur pa dang / kun nas mgon po dang / rgyun shes kyi bu dang / maHSha yas rgyun shes kyi bu dang / kun nas rgyun shes kyi bu dang
104a6(rgyud): byams ma'i bu dang / byams pa bzang po'i bu dang / byams pa'i bu ma yin pa dang / dus gsum rgyun shes kyi bu dang / rgyun shes kyi bu 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang / rgyun shes kyi bu dkon mchog gsum
104a7(rgyud): dang rgyun shes kyi bu skyabs gsum dang / rgyun shes kyi bu theg pa gsum dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa dang / yid 'ong bzang po dang / gsung snyan ldan dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / dngos
104a8(rgyud): med dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / legs gzigs dbang phyug dang / rnam gzigs dbang phyug dang / rten mchod 'os dang / legs mchod dang / 
104b1(rgyud): sgra sgrogs dbang phyug dang / rnga chen dbang phyug dang / sna tshogs sgra'i dbang phyug dang / rnam 'jig dbang phyug dang / mthon ka bzang po dang / sku mdzes dang / grags ldan dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / khyab 'jug
104b2(rgyud): bdag po dang / bdag pa'i ngang tshul dang / nam mkha' dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / don thams cad kyi snying po dang / thams cad 'byung ba dang / ngan song spong ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos ma
104b3(rgyud): yin pa gcod par byed pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhug so// gzhan
104b4(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med kyi gzu/ gas 'chang ba rnams te/ spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i don/ 'ji ga rten sgrub pa'i don/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
104b5(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la dgod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig pa'i tshig dang / sngags kyi tshig dang / gzungs dang / sman gyi cha byad 'dzin pa dang / 'dab chags kyi tshogs rnam pa sna
104b6(rgyud): tshogs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nor bu dang / sngags dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi grangs su rje su yang dag par 'jug pa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rje su
104b7(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de bzhin du byed pa rnams dang / de dang rjes su 'thun pa'i ming dang 'brel pa rnams dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i nye bar bstan pa dang / chos/ 
104b8(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las nges par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyi rje su zhugs pa dam tshig las
105a1(rgyud): mi 'da' zhing tshig gi lam la 'jog par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod par byed pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / mngon par
105a2(rgyud): mtho ba dang / gdugs dkar po dang / mdab ma mtha' yas dang / mdab ma brgya pa dang / rgyal po'i gtsug tor dang / 'jig rten mthon po dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags
105a3(rgyud): pa'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i 'od dang / me tog pad+ma'i 'od dang / me tog ka ta ka'i 'od dang / 'od dkar po dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang / gser gyi phung po dang / dkar po'i phung po dang // gzi
105a4(rgyud): brjid phung po dang / nor bu'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po/ dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / 'byung po'i phung dpo dang / bden pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
105a5(rgyud): phung po dang / de kho na nyid kyi phung po dang / de dag dang gzhan ya nga gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa rab tu rdzogs
105a6(rgyud): par byed pa/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying po dang ldan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du yang bgrang zhing mthar thugs par mi nuso// stobs dang pha rol gnon pa bsam
105a7(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyang bstan par mi nuso// mdor bstan par bya ste/ brjod pa ni rig pa'i rgyal mo'i 'dus pa brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ mdzod spu dang / smin ma dang / spyan dang / rdzi ma
105a8(rgyud): dang / rna ba dang / mgrin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pa dang / brtse ba dang / shes rab dang / 'od zer dang / sems pa dang / 'od dang / dri ma med pa dang / sgrib pa dang / 
105b1(rgyud): mchog sbyin thams cad dang / de dag dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal mo mtha' yas mu med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las spros pa dag ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snod dang / de bzhin
105b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal

105b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sngags brjod pa rig pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal mo dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo
105b5(rgyud): dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ting la dzin gyi khyad par rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba'i rgyan gyi tshogs kyi khya da par dang / 'khor brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med
105b6(rgyud): dang / rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa'i tshogs thams kyi gong nas gong du yongs su gnas pa de dag kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der gnas par gyur to// rig pa'i rgyal po pad+ma'i rigs kyang 'di lta ste/ bcom
105b7(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag bcu gnyis pa dang / phyag drug pa dang / phyag bzhi pa dang / hA la hA la dang / don yod zhags pa dang / rta mgrin dkar po dang / mgrin pa mtha' yas dang / mgrin sngon dang / mgrin
105b8(rgyud): bzang dang / mgul bzang dang / mgul dkar dang / mgul sngon dang / 'jig rten mgul pa dang / rnam par lta ba dang / lta ba dang / kun tu lta ba dang / dbang phyug dang / 'od zer stong ldan dang / 
106a1(rgyud): yid dang / yid las byung dang / rnam par grags pa'i yid dang / pad+ma dang / phyag na pad+ma dang / yid la bsam pa dang / dbugs 'byin dang / rab tu dgod pa dang / skra bzang ba dang / 
106a2(rgyud): ska mthar byed dang / rgyu skar gyi rgyal po dang / zhi ba dang / skal pa bzang po dang / 'du byed mchog ste/ de dag dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal po pad+ma'i gtsug tor la sogs pa dang / sgrub pa mtha' yas pa'i
106a3(rgyud): chos kyi tshogs kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ rig pa'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo du ma dag dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba 'di lta ste/ 
106a4(rgyud): sgrol ma dang / sbrel ma bzang po dang / gar mkhan ma dang /  khro gnyer ma dang / 'gro ba mtha' yas dang / 'jig rten/ 'gro ma dang / sa thob par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med par

106b1(rgyud): glang po dus byed pa dang / 'dul byed ma dang / 'byung ba ldan ma dang / dpal byed ma dang / phreng bas dang / longs spyod breng ma dang / 'gugs byed ma dang / drang byung ma dang / 'dudun mang /

112a4(rgyud): mkha'i ngo bo dang / chos kyi dbyings dus gsum las yang dag par 'das par mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi don spyod
112a5(rgyud): pa la yang dag par soms shig/ bsam pa ji lta ba ba zhin du mngon par dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la dad pa dang ldan pa la sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yang dag por
112a6(rgyud): thob pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshig dang / las kyi tshig dang / zhi ba'i tshig dang / thar pa'i tshig dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid thob par byed pa dang / de
112a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu kun gyi stobs dang / bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shig ceso// de nas
112a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu 'jal dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur grus snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas stong
112b1(rgyud): gsum gyi skyong chen po 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya drug stong du ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par rab tu g.yos te
112b2(rgyud): snang ba chen pos gsal bar yang byas nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed bsten te/ rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang snyan pa la/ namaHsa man bud+d+hA nA/ a b+hA bas
112b3(rgyud): b+hA ba mung+ga tA nAM/ na maHpra te ka bud+d+ha ar+ya shrA ba kA nAM/ na me bo d+ha satwA nAM/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te shwa rA NAM/ bod+hi satwA nAM/ ma hA satwa nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ duSh+Te sa twad ma ka a/ 
112b4(rgyud): sa~M mu sa la par shu pA sha haste/ tsa tur+N+Na dza/ tsai tu khA/ da Te tsa rat+na/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sarba big+h+na bag+hA ta ka/ bikr-i/ nan/ sarba b+huta b+ha ye ka ra/ an+dan+d+ra tre sa ni nA da ne/ 
112b5(rgyud): bAn+darma Ni bA san/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba d+harmA NAM/ chen+da tshiH/ sarba ma~M t+pan/ bin+ti~M bin+d+ha/ ba ri nud tra A kaR+Sha ya nA~MkarA ya/ sirba b+hut+pan/ nirma ba ni rmam/ sarba duSh+TAn/ 
112b6(rgyud): bri be sha ya bre be sha ya/ maN+Da la mad d+h+ye/ bebs taM dzi bi tAn+dan+ta kar/ ku ru ku ru ma mas tra~M katru~M/ dang dang/ pe tse baH/ mA bi la mA mA bi lam+ba/ sa ma ya ma nu smad/ hU hU~M phaT/ s+pho Ta ya su~M
112b7(rgyud): ya/ sarbA sha pa ri pU ra ka/ he b+ha ga bi ki tsi rA ya si ma ma sarbA tra sA d+ha ya// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba yin te/ gshin
112b8(rgyud): rje'i rgyal po yang 'joms pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa yin na sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sems can thams cad
113a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags par gyur te/ 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / spangs pa dang / yid skyo ba dang / snying 'gas par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bco/ 
113a2(rgyud): ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/ skyob pa gzhan med/ dpung gnyen gzhan med par gyur te/ de nas gang su dgas la gnas pa dang / chu la gnas
113a3(rgyud): pa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / brtan par gnas pa dang / mi brtan par gnas pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / sgong las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzus te skyes
113a4(rgyud): pa'i sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dgra na rnam par gnas pa steng dang / 'ogod dang / thad ka dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig/ 
113a5(rgyud): de dang / yud tsam de lagab cing gnas pa dag skad cig de nyid la khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di nyid du bkug par gyur to// khro bo rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams
113a6(rgyud): kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir na/ de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ skam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dam tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang /

113a8(rgyud): tso'-i phyi zhe na/ ltas ngan chen po dang / mya ngan chen po dang / bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir// thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
113b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kho na'i spyod pa rje su sgrub cing bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par
113b2(rgyud): bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par bya ba dang / bstan pa med pa dag tu bstan pa dang / lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / dkon
113b3(rgyud): mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i rgyu 'thun pa'i thugs kyis bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa dang / bgegs chen po
113b4(rgyud): rnam par gzhig pa dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa rnam par da gzhom pa dang / bdag gi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi stobs rnam par gzhig pa dang
113b5(rgyud): rengs par bya ba dang / bsad pa dang / mi snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / nye bar bsgom pa dang / dga' khar bya ba dang / rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa
113b6(rgyud): dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / myur ba'i las rje su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang /

114b7(rgyud): dang / chun spyod pa dang / gsung ri dang / zla ba'i ri dang / rib chen po dang / brtsegs mig dang / mgo bo gsum pa ste/ de dag dang gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin du
114b8(rgyud): khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
115a1(rgyud): bskyed pas 'dus par gyur te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// gang yang srin po'i rgyal po chen po de dag gnod sbyin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan

115a5(rgyud): dag kyang 'di lta ste/ bI lu dang nye 'i dri pra dang / pI lu bzang po dang pI lo mtha' yas dang / bsam pa dang / bsam pa ma yin pa dang / gdung ba bzang po dang / za byed dang /

115b7(rgyud): pi pa la za ba dang / grog mkhar skyes dang / nyi ma'i rigs te/ de dag dang gzhan yang drang srong chen po brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nye
115b8(rgyud): bar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas sngags spyod pa'i don byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mnyan pa'i phyir dang / rje su yi rang ba'i don du 'khod par gyur to//

117b8(rgyud): dang / bde ba dang / byang chub dang / so so gcig dang / nyan thos dang / dmyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / gzi brjid chen po ldan dang / dud 'gro dang / yi
118a1(rgyud): dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / sha ldan dang / sha ba dang / gnod sbyin srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / 'byung ba dang / phyogs kyi glang po dang / steng 'gro/ 
118a2(rgyud): dang / thad kar 'gro dang / kha bye ba dang / bsam gtan 'gro dang / rnam 'byor 'gro dang / rab tu gnas dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma ste/ khyim chen po de dag kyang khyim brgya stong
118a3(rgyud): brag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa gang na gang na gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gang na bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der lhags shing phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas
118a4(rgyud): rang rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to// nga yang gdo sbyin pog so/ sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa la 'di da lta ste/ mig bzang ma dang / skra bzang ma dang / skad snyan/ 
118a5(rgyud): ma dang / blo bzang ma dang / dge ldan ma dang / sna tshogs mig ldan ma dang / rdzogs byed ma dang / bzang po ma dang / ska rags bzang po ma dang / pad+ma ltar smra ba dang / 'jigs
118a6(rgyud): byed ma dang / mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang / rgyal me dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / nam gru ma dang / skrag can ma dang / sgra mthar byed ma dang / rlung ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / yid
118a7(rgyud): ldan ma dang / me tog ldan ma dang / me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang / ser skya ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dpa' mo dang / dpa' bzang mo dang / shin tu mi
118a8(rgyud): bzed ma dang / mi bzad ldan ma dang / lha mdzes ma dang / ro bzang ma dang / gsang ba dam pa ma dang / shing la mu la gnas ma dang / mya ngan med ma dang / mun par mdzes ma dang / snang
118b1(rgyud): bar mdzes ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang / lhag par ldan ma dang / gzugs mdzes ma dang / dkar med ma dang / zhi ba ma dang / phyogs mtshams ma dang / stug ma dang / dga' byed ma dang
118b2(rgyud): nye ba'i dga' byed ma dang / 'jig rten las 'das ma ste/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas
118b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang yang sha za mo dag sha za mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang
118b4(rgyud): ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal dezhing 'khod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ sdud ma dang / bya/ dag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang / sha za drag mo dang / sha za mo
118b5(rgyud): skar mda' ma dang / she ba mo bar me dang / thal ba zam dang / sha za ma dang / dug ma dang / bung ba ma dang / rmongs byed ma dang / bsdigs mdzub ma dang / dmar
118b6(rgyud): ldan ma dang / glang dmar ma dang / 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang / thal bar nye gnas ma dang / shing pi lu dang ldan ma dang / mang ldan ma dang / mang ma dang / gdul dka' ma dang / e
118b7(rgyud): la ma dang / mtshon byed ma dang / du ba la gnas ma dang / du ba ma ste/ sha za mo chen mo 'di dag sha za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen
118b8(rgyud): po der 'dus shing rab tu zhugs par gyur to// gang yang ma mo dang / ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rje su rnam par spyod cing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing gtor ma dang / me tog dman
119a1(rgyud): ma la spyod par byed pa dag la 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa ma dang / dbang phyug chen po ma dang / khyab 'jug ma dang / gzhon nu ma dang / rgan byad ma dang / phag mo dang / 
119a2(rgyud): dbang mo dang / gshin rje mo dang / ma phyogs ma dang / nyi ma'i bu mo dang / 'jig rten mthar byed ma dang / chu lha ma dang / dbang ldan ma dang / rlung phyogs ma dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma
119a3(rgyud): dang / mgo bregs ma dang / bya ma dang / bya ma chen mo dang / srul mo dang / lus srul mo dang / skem byed ma ste/ ma mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas
119a4(rgyud): pab de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin du mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khri phrag
119a5(rgyud): brgya stong du ma dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin/ pa nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas srid pa'i rtse man bar du thams cad kyang skabs 'dir nam mkha'i dkyil du
119a6(rgyud): snang bar gyur to// sems can gyi ris na srog chagasu la yang phan tshun mi mthun pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phral gyi rgyan gyis
119a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thug pas
119a8(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ dag pa'i sems dpa' sngags kyi spyod pa'i don
119b1(rgyud): rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang // ting 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa bcom ldan
119b2(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang par mdzad pa na mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje mthug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
119b3(rgyud): gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du dpag tshad brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur to// gang du gnod sbyin dang / 
119b4(rgyud): srin pa dang / dri za dang / rlung lha dang / sha za de dag dang / ma dador na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje nor
119b5(rgyud): bu rin po che lta bur gyur te/ der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod pa/ ra gyur kyang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa med do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil
119b6(rgyud): 'khor chen po de 'dus par gyur par shes nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshon rje'i gshed la smras pa/ kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rje su nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'a
119b7(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig srungs shig/ dbang du gyis shig/ ma rungs pa gdul bar gyis shig/ sems can zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig/ sems
119b8(rgyud): can thams cad dad par gyis shig/ ji srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjesu sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags spyod pa dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi
120a1(rgyud): bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol tu song la srung bgyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bka' mnyan nas khro bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams
120a2(rgyud): cad rje su srung ba dang / rje su bstan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshad khro ba'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang / stang dang / 'og dang / thad ka dag
120a3(rgyud): tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 'don cing gnas par gyur to// de nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang / yid dang / sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur to// bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to// 'di lta bu'i
120a4(rgyud): sgra yang thos par gyur te/ gang dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de dag ni ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa da brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
120a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzho na nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig smras pa/ chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na
120a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rje su mthong ba'o// byang chub
120a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis le rab tu gnas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad la
120a8(rgyud): sems mnyam pa'o// chos gsum dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba nyid dang / byang chub sems
120b1(rgyud): dnga'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang / rang gi sngags yongasu mi gtong ba nyid do// chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par
120b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ rang gi sngags yongasu mi gtong ba nyid dang / gzhan gyi sngags rje su gcad pa med pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang
120b3(rgyud): snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid do// chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyuraro// chos lnga dang ldan na bya
120b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa grub dpa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsten pa nyid dang / 
120b5(rgyud): bas mtha' dgon bsten par byed pa nyid de/ sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sgra gas la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / 
120b6(rgyud): spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub cing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongasu rdzogs par
120b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ drug po gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dang ba rje su mi gcod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dang brje su mi gcod pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
120b8(rgyud): sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / sngags kyi
121a1(rgyud): spyod pa yong su btsal ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongasu mi gtong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na rig pa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing yang dag pa
121a2(rgyud): bsgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro// chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la rjesu spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun po gang zhe na/ theg pa zab mo shes
121a3(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / 'don du 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa nyid dang / dus dang / phyogs dang
121a4(rgyud): nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mi smra ba dang / dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang / rtog/ sa pa dang / blo dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang
121a5(rgyud): brtan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi tshogs dang / theg pa chen po dang / zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang / dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang / rang dga'i sngags
121a6(rgyud): dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po nyid yongasu sgom pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i sems
121a7(rgyud): can gyi khams kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa gnyisu med pa'i ngo bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu tshol ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba nyid dang
121a8(rgyud): theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa nyid de/ chos bdun po de dag gis ni rig pa dang sngags 'grub cing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos brgyad dang ldan na rig pa dang sngags kyi spyod pa'i
121b1(rgyud): don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang / sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas/ 
121b2(rgyud): pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tsom med cing dang ba nyid dang phyin cim ldog pa'i sngags gzung ba dang / bla ma la gus pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i nyid kyi sngag
121b3(rgyud): dang / rgyud dang / spyod pa bstan pa mi slu bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston pa la mkhas
121b4(rgyud): pa nyid dang ser sna dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul
121b5(rgyud): bar byed pa nyid dang / mdor bsdu na dge ba'i rtsabs chog mi shes shing go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub
121b6(rgyud): kyi snying po gnon pa dang / longs spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags par bdag nyid 'dod pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
121b7(rgyud): mi 'bral bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang / ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du
121b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa la yang mi skyo ba'i
122a1(rgyud): yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing yayung byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te// 
122a2(rgyud): de las gzhan du shes par bya ba ma yin no// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas nas nyam sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang
122a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs padag gis 'di skad du tshig brjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras logaso leg so// sngags
122a4(rgyud): spyo pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi tshul la rjes 'jug pa dang 'thun zhing chos bstan pa legs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro// des na 'jam dpal
122a5(rgyud): gozhon nur rgyus chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang rjes su 'thun zhing sngags kyi spyod pa dang rje su 'thun pa legs parabastan pa nyid do// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig
122a6(rgyud): 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba'am/ g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du bzhag pa dang / me tog dang / bdug
122a7(rgyud): pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed na de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la/ gzhan
122a8(rgyud): gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o// glegs bam la bris pa byas te rang gi khyim du bzhag na/ de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ 
122b1(rgyud): rgyal mo 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma dag la srung ba chen po dang / longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / tshe ring ba nyid
122b2(rgyud): dang / nad med pa nyid dang / longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad ces smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang mi smra bar gyur to// theg pa chen po
122b3(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhib mo las byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byam rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las 'dus pa'i le'u ste
122b4(rgyud): dang po'o// // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thams cad dang da ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas nas/ sems
122b5(rgyud): can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba/ zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag
122b6(rgyud): tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ 
122b7(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa
122b8(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byam gyi spyod pa sgrub pa sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi
123a1(rgyud): tshogs gang du sems can yang dag par zhugs na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par thob par 'gyur bas sems dpa'
123a2(rgyud): chen po khyod smros shig smos shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud smras// 
123a3(rgyud): rigs pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston por byed do// lag pa g.yas pa btegs nas sor me'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lo ston par byed
123a4(rgyud): de/ sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khri phrag brgya dastong du ma byung ste/ byung nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gde nas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang ba chen pos gnas par
123a5(rgyud): gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khwa bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang / dpa' bo gcig pa dang / spyan drang ba
123a6(rgyud): dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / chu la mi nub par 'gro
123a7(rgyud): pa dang / dgug pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri thams cad dang / phreng ba dang / mar me dag kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji lta ji
123a8(rgyud): lhar sbyang ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni 'i ge gsum zhes bya ba stobs chen poden thams cad sgrub par byed pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras pa/ de gang zhen/ oM oM hUM/ 'di ni khro ba chen/ 
123b1(rgyud): de'i snying po ste/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis smras te/ bgegs thams
123b2(rgyud): cad 'jig par byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa byaso// 'di skad du yang smras te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
123b3(rgyud): lo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub
123b4(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/ de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa ba da skor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang
123b5(rgyud): ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che bdag tshar bcad
123b6(rgyud): cing der bkug par gyur nas/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs
123b7(rgyud): pa dag la yang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs su byas shing spyi bo la yang dag par gnas par byaso// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang bltas
123b8(rgyud): nas sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcis
124a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdor bstan pa brjod/ 
124a2(rgyud): bar bya yis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o// oM AHhUM/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ oM ra ra sma ra a pra tiha ta shA sa na/ ku mA ra rU pa d+ha ri Na hUM hUM phaT paT
124a3(rgyud): swA hA// grogs po dag 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yin te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba yin no// phyag rgya ni gtsug pud lnga pa zhes grags te/ de la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rtsa ba'i
124a4(rgyud): sngags 'di ni las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// snying po'i sngags ni las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin te/ oM bA kye dr-i na ma 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pud
124a5(rgyud): gsum zhes bya ba yin te/ longs spyod thams cad mngon/ per 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/ bAkye hUM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug
124a6(rgyud): bud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/ sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yin no// 'dir snying po mchog tu 'gyur ba ni maM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan zhes
124a7(rgyud): bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o// gzhan yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod de/ dpal mchog tu byed pa// 
124a8(rgyud): dag byed chen po// srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las
124b1(rgyud): dngas pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa
124b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnas pa/ re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga
124b3(rgyud): yang yongasu sbyor bar byed na bzlas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de yang gang zhe na/ oM A bI ra hUM khe tsa ra/ grogs po dag 'di ni yige brgyad po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba gsang ba'i
124b4(rgyud): snying po'i bdag nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas nyid bzhin da du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no// mdor na bya ba/ thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni
124b5(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/ 'di ra phyag rgya yang stobs po che zhes rnam par grags pa/ ra ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'o// spyan drang ba'i
124b6(rgyud): sngags ni/ au he te ku mA ra bi shwa rA pi Ni/ sarba bA la b+ha shi Ta pra bo d+ha na/ a d+ye hi bA ga bAn/ e h+ye hi ku mA ra/ kr-i Da nut+pa la dA ri Na maN+Da la ma d+he ti ShA tiSh+Ta sa ma ya ma nu smA ra/ a
124b7(rgyud): pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn hUM/ mA bi laM ba ku ru phaT swA hA// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang pa'i sngags so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang
124b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang
125a1(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi'ang yin no// tsan dan gyi chur byas te/ lan
125a2(rgyud): bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thams cad du gtor na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas
125a3(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang / sngags dang / de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyuraro// na maHsarba
125a4(rgyud): bud d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/ oM d+hu d+hA ra d+hA ra d+ha mad bA si ni/ d+hu ma ra tsa shi hU~M tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sA hA// bdug pa'i sngagaso// tsan dan dang / ga bur dang / gur
125a5(rgyud): gum gcig tu byas te/ bdug pas bdugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tha mas cad dang / sems can thams cad bdug pas tshim zhing
125a6(rgyud): dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyuraro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa// thams cad 'gugs byed zhi ba yin/ spyan drang ba yi sngags la yang / pad+ma'i
125a7(rgyud): phreng ba bzang po zhes// bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur
125a8(rgyud): dang tsan dan dang / gur gum chu dang sbyar nas me tog sum dang / ma li ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / me tog pun ka dang / me tog paku la dang / me tog piN+Di tag ru 'di dag gang yang rung
125b1(rgyud): ba'i me tog gam/ dus ji lta ba'i me tog dri zhim po bcug ste/ sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta sh+tsas na nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kA ru Ni ka
125b2(rgyud): shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni/ arbaM pra tIts+tsha pa ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha pra be sha/ sarba d+hu tA nu ke pa ka gr-ih+Na hUM/ aM par bi tsI ri Na sAny+dza/ 'dir yang phyag rgya ni gang ba
125b3(rgyud): zhes bya bar grags pa sems can thams cad rje su 'thun zhing brtan pa'o// 'dir yang dri'i sdig su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa mne bud d+ha nAM/ na maHsa man+ta gan+d+ha a bab+hAs shr-i ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA
125b4(rgyud): gan d+hegan dwe gi drA de/ gan+d+hen mor te/ pra tIn+ta pratI n+da maM/ dad+hA sa ma tA nuH ri Ni swAtwA// 'dir phyag rgyur 'gyur ba ni mdam zhes bya bar baM thams cad long su rdzogs par byed du'o// 
125b5(rgyud): me tog gi sngags su 'gyur baM ni/ na maHsan+ta bud d+hA nAM/ oM pra ti he ta shA sa nA nAM/ na ma saM ku su mi ta rA dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku sa ma d+h+ye/ ku su ma
125b6(rgyud): bA ra bA si ni/ ku su ma ba ti swA hA// bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang / gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// sku ni rmad byung bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ 
125b7(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi// gtor ma'i sngags ni bshad par bya// na maHsarba bud d+hA nA/ a pra ti ha ta shrI sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAM/ ma hA satwa sar+b+ba ba lo ki ta i ma pa la
125b8(rgyud): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM/ sarba bi shwa ra ra Ta Ta phaT swAhA// 'dis ni bshos dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma yang bya'o// 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni mdung zhes bya ba ma rungs pa thams
126a1(rgyud): cang 'dreg par byed pa'o// namaHsan+ta bud d+hAn+tu/ a pra titatashwA sa nA nA/ s+yArba ta man d+ha kar bai d+d+hAn+dan+tu/ na maHsam/ dz+nyA d+h+r-ig t+taN+Da b+hAs shri ye/ tathAg ta la/ tAH
126a2(rgyud): he he b+ha ga bAM/ dz+ye ta rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti ma N+Di ta shwa rI ra bi kurba bi kurba maN+Da bo d+hi sa tra sa mnA dzA lid d+yo tai ti murti khurda khurdi/ a bi lo ke ya/ a ba lo ka ya ma/ laM sarba/ satwAM nany+dzi sA hA/ mar mo'i
126a3(rgyud): sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o// kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ni sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ trad+ya thA/ dz+nyA la dzAM / dz+wA li ye dz+wA la ya/ 
126a4(rgyud): hUM bi b+ho da ka ha ri kr-iSh+Ta ping+ga la swAhA// me'i bya ba byed pa'i sdug so// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// sems can kun la 'od gsal byed// kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags/ 
126a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyir// thub pa mchog gis sden/ bshad pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba
126a6(rgyud): pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang ba rgya ba yin te/ khyod bu 'jig rten rnam grangs pa'i// mi bzad pa ni gang yin pa// sngags rnams dag ni thams cad
126a7(rgyud): kyis/ mkhas pa rnams kyis sgrub pa te// spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs kyang yin// de ni rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// na ma
126a8(rgyud): sa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ oM ka ra kar/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+yaM bany+dza bany+dza/ sarba big+hAd ha da sarba badz+ra bi nA ya kAM mur+d+ha ka Ta dzI bi tAn+ta kar ma hA bi kri ta rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ patsa pa/ 
126b1(rgyud): tsasarba duSh+kaM/ ma hA gan pa ti dzi bi tAn kar ban d+ha ban d+ha sa rba grah+man/ Sha Da mu khaSh+Ta ra b+hu dzA/ ShA Ta tsa ra Na ru dram nA ya/ beny+tsa ma nA ya/ brah+ma dwe de ba mnA ya mA bi la ba/ lartul hu maN+Dal
126b2(rgyud): mad+h+ye pra bo she ya/ sa ma ya ma nu smar hUM hUM tsA hU~M hUM hU~M phaT phaT swAn+d+ha/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni 'jam dang la gzhan nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang po'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa zhes bya ba yin te/ 
126b3(rgyud): khri bo'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jigs par byed pa yin na bgegs ma rungs pa lnga smos kyang
126b4(rgyud): ci dgos/ 'di brjod pa tsam nyid kyis srung ba chen po byas pa dar 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ nag po da chen po zhes bya ba'i// bgegs rnams thams cad zhi byed pa
126b5(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ oM hrIHSh+TiHbi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha trUM na sha ya staM b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzer chen po dang / 
126b6(rgyud): nad chen po dang / nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dga' ba med pa dang / byams pa med pa dang / snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas zin gyi
126b7(rgyud): bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag la bya'i/ zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan dag la ni ma yin no// phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po
126b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/ oM tri kA la rU pa hUM khaM swA hA// phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba nyid sbar bar bya'o// ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed pa
127a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// snying po'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya'o// hUM/ 'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o// phyag rgya yang rtseg tu/ 
127a2(rgyud): chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o// dung khrol thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// dkyil
127a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad par du 'phags par 'gyuraro// 'dir gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsarba bud d+ha nAM/ oM pra ti ha ta shAs na
127a4(rgyud): nAM/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya su dza ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shA rU pi Ni gats+tsha sarba bud d+hA sh+tsa bi saR+YA ya sa pa ri bA raM swab+hA ba nAM tsa pra be sha ya sa ma ya me nu sma ra sarbAn+ma sh+yA maM/ 
127a5(rgyud): sid d+hA nu mnA pA da ma nor thaM tsa/ me pa ri pA ra yen+d+ra swA hA/ 'di ni gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags te/ las tham/ sa cad la sbyar bar bya'o// phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan
127a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba yin te/ 'dis gdan la yang sbyar bar bya'o// yid kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegasu gsol lo// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / 
127a7(rgyud): sngags dang / sngags 'grub pa dag dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang / nges par sdom pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang mi
127a8(rgyud): gzhal med khang la yang bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang / rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam smraso// namaHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra tiha tag
127b1(rgyud): dzi NAM/ oMr To ni swAh+ma/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjesu 'brang ba sman na ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad byed pa/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug dud lnga zhes pa bdug gi las thams cad la smyung bar bya/ 
127b2(rgyud): namaHsarba bud d+hA na~M/ a pra tita Sha shAs nan/ oMn ti/ 'dri ni kyai bI na canA ma zhes bya ba'i ga bzhin te/ las thams cad byed pa'o// phyag rgya ni 'bye ba zhes bya bag pa 'thams cad kyi las ma/ 
127b3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o// namaHsa man+ta bud d+ha naM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI nI lo nI// rigs pa 'di ni pad+ma nan zhes bya ste/ lngas thams cad byed cing dge ba'o// phyag rgya bdang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan pas
127b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin mongs par dgug par bya'o// na maHsa man bungadid+hA nA~M/ a tsi tA b+hutaru bI NAM/ oMSh+NISh+Te swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung ni bsdams pa yis// mkha' 'gro ma rnam
127b5(rgyud): 'joms par byed// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis/ thams cad gzugs can rab sngags pa// rig pa tha can zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin// 
127b6(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA naM/ a pa tita ta tsa rI nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM bar de swA hA// phyag rgya gtsug pud gsum nyid ni// dpal sbyin byed pas sbyar bar bya// gzugs mnga' 'chang ba lha mo ni// myur du longs/ 
127b7(rgyud): spod grab byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsi t+yAd b+hu ta ru pi Ni/ oM b+ha ri sA hA// phyag rgya mdung rtse yang dag sbar// rims nad thams cad rnam 'jig yin// na maHsa man+ta bud dA NaM/ a
127b8(rgyud): tsitAd b+hU ta rU pI NAM oM tA re swA hA// rig pa du ga ron zhes bya ba// las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bgegs ni 'joms par byed pa yin// na maHsa maM ta
128a1(rgyud): bud dA nA~M/ a sa~M d+ha b+hUta rU b+hI tAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba lo ka ni swAn// rig pasnad ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad sbyin phreng
128a2(rgyud): ba gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya// na maHsa men+ta bud d+he na/ a tsi nud b+hu rA pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi shre bi shre so b+hA baM bai shwa rA pI Ni ka tA A pre sha A be sha sa ma ya ma nu sAr ru ru tiSh+Tha swA nA~M/ 
128a3(rgyud): rig pa rin po stobs chen 'di// 'jig rten 'dren pas bsten pa ste/ mchi ba'i phyag rgya ldan byas te// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/ 'byung po kun la mchog sbyin pa/ 
128a4(rgyud): thams cad ces ni yang dag bsgrags// na maHsa man+ta bud da d+hA nAM/ a tsi t+yAd b+hU ta rU pI NaM/ oM shwe te shrI ba su swA hA/ 8// rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yis// rnam dgod las ni thams
128a5(rgyud): cad byed// dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba// rmad byung bas me med gzugs can te// 'jig rten rnams kyi skal lnga/ na byed// skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur// na maHsa/ 
128a6(rgyud): man+ta bud d+ha naM/ a tsi twAd b+hu ta rU pi NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM khi khi ri khi ri b+haM khu ri sarba sha truM staM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya mo ha ya ba sha mA na ya sAh+ma// rig pa 'di ni rig chen po// rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan/ 
128a7(rgyud): phyag rgya gdong gsum sbyar byas na// ma rungs sems can 'dul bar byed// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha naM/ oM pra tita ta sha ka ti pre tsa rI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrIH// rig pa 'di ni dpal chen mo// 'jig
128a8(rgyud): rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgya kha sbyar sbyar byas nas// rgyal srid chen po sbyin byed pa'o// nam sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ sarba satwa b+ha ya pradwa yi nAM/ oM a dzi te ku mA ra rU pi ni a h+ye hi A gats+tsha
128b1(rgyud): mam kA ku ru swAt+ma// rgyal byed ma zhen rnam grags pa// gnon nu bdud rdzi las byung ba// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis// dgra rnams thams cad bzlog par byed/ gnamaHsa man du na/ 
128b2(rgyud): a tsin+da b+hutA rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swAhA/ a dzi twe swAhA/ a par dzA tre swAt+ma/ sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro
128b3(rgyud): zhing / ku la rdzi su 'dzin byed pa'o// ming po gtum bu ru zhes grags// 'di dag kau rje su 'brang // gru yi bzhon pa la zhon nas// rgya mtsho la ni gnas pa yin// khu tshur phyag bcings pa yis/ 
128b4(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ lo kA grA d+hi pa tI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA sa su / 9we/ shaM mu kha bo d+hi satwa nu dz+nyA ta/ ma yu rA san/ shak+Sho d+he/ 
128b5(rgyud): bA ne ra kug kag d+hA nu le ba na pra A yA/ kha ga khA d+hi ShAH/ hU~M nr-i t+ya/ rek+She pu shA tsi ta murti sa me ya ma nu smar/ khA ma b+h+ra ma/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ la hul tu mA bi laM bas
128b6(rgyud): kar+ya Ni me ku ru ku ru/ be cing tra rU pa d+hA ri NI/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM sarba bud d+ha nu dzA ta swA hA// skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// sa rnams ma lus rnam drug tu// 
128b7(rgyud): kun nas yongasu rab tu g.yos// sems can kun gyi don phyir dang / ma rungs sems can bzlog pa'i phyir// mi bzad dbang phyug bu'i gzugasu// gdul ba'i don du 'dir skyes te// skam
128b8(rgyud): byed dang ni mig dmar gyi// phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste// snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi// 'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa yin// sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid che// byis pa rnams/ 
129a1(rgyud): la phan byed gang // sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni// 'gro ba kun la rnam par spyod// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bdag nyid chen pos sbyar na ni// tshangs pa
129a2(rgyud): sogs pa'ang 'gugs byed na// mi rnams la ni smos ci dgos// gzhon nu'i sems su mtha' dag ni// bsdus nas yongs su bshad par bya// smin drug bu dang 'jam dpal gyi// sngags
129a3(rgyud): su 'di ni yang dag bstan// sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpar 'dir ston to// yid gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni// 'di yi sngags su brjod pa yin// sems
129a4(rgyud): can kun la phan pa'i phyir// longs spyod 'dren pa'i mtshodag de yin// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bkod dan las kun byed pa yin// oM hU~M dzA/ sngags 'di ru
129a5(rgyud): bsdu byas na// mi rnams kyi ni don byed do// nam sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa man+ta d+yo tita mur+t+ti naM/ oM bik+kata grah+Na hUM phaT swA hA// 'di yang nye ba'i snying po ste/ 
129a6(rgyud): bzhin phyag rgya mdung ldan pas// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs byed cing // de bzhin bza' dang ma mor bcas// phyag rgya kun gyis phyag rgya la// bkod na 'bras bur bcas par
129a7(rgyud): 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni spangs byed cing // ma rungs 'jug pa bzlog par byed// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu ni rjes su
129a8(rgyud): 'brang ba ste// las thams cad byed pa ste// bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad spangs par byed pa dang / skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs
129b1(rgyud): bar byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / skem par byed pa dang / 'jig par byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// nam sa man+ta bud d+ha na
129b2(rgyud): a pra ti hata shAs nA nAM/ tang thA/ oM prang+ga brah+ma ba tsas shAn+ti ku ru swAt+ma/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// 'byung pos ni gyur
129b3(rgyud): rab tu thob// skyed cig nyid la bsil bar gyur// phyag rgya gtsug pud lnga sbyar na// myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur// mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la// srid srung gi ni rig byed
129b4(rgyud): 'dod// 'di ni mdor bsdus bstan pa ste// 'di yi cho ga bsdus po yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ti shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ru Da bA ha na tsakra pA Na
129b5(rgyud): tsa tur+N+Na dza hU~M hU~M sa ma ya ma nu smar/ bo d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsa zhi ba'i don ni myur byed yin// 'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig
129b6(rgyud): cing / khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin// phyag rgya gtsug pud gsum sbyar na// las rnams kun byed brtan pa yin// gang dag khyab 'jug rgyud las ni// bya ba rgya cher bstan pa dag
129b7(rgyud): thabs kyis gdul bya'i sems can la/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/ ga na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ trad+ya thA/ oM ma hA ma ha shwa ra b+hA tA d+hi pa ti pra Sha b+ha dA dza
129b8(rgyud): pra laM badz+ra Ta mu kroT d+hA Ne/ sita b+has dus riT mUdz+r-i hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ be d+his twA dA pa la ti swA t+ma// sems can rnams la phan 'dzid pas// sngags 'di bdag gis smras pa ste// byas
130a1(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum sbyar na// 'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o// bdag gis sngon na gang bstan pa// 'di yi chog sngon byung ba// sems canas sngang
130a2(rgyud): gnas pa la// zhi bang zhes brjod pa ste// yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba// zhi ba'i rgyud las nga yis bstan// namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pA ti tata shus nA nAM/ trad+ya thA/ 
130a3(rgyud): shA kun ma hA shA kun/ dang ma bid ta prak+Sha sarba pA nA shI gi kha kha khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM tiSh+Tha bo d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA// sngags 'di mthu ni chen po ste// na mkha' lding zhes
130a4(rgyud): rnam par grags// gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams kyi mtsho dag/ gdengs ka con gyi dug rnams tshims/ dug rje dang sbrar byas/ daphung khrol shin tu mi bzad 'joms// gnas dang 'gro
130a5(rgyud): ba'i dug dag ni/ gso bar byed par the tsom med// sem sa can gdul bya'i thab su ni// byang chub sems dpa yang dag bka'// nam mkha' lding gzugs sa la
130a6(rgyud): spyod/ 'dab chags dbang po 'od chen ldan// ji srid na mkha' lding rgyud du// cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thams cad da yis bstan pa ste// byang / 
130a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' na mkha' lding // gdul ba'i don du 'di bstan to// gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir// 'dab chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu// 'jig rten sngags ni ji srid pa/ 
130a8(rgyud): tshig 'di ni bstan pa na// sems can gdul bya'i don du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu// gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang // rdo rje bad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // nga yis chog rag
130b1(rgyud): 'am dang // mdodag kyang ni bstan pa yin// ji ltar ma mo mang pon// 'bad bas byis pa rnam srung ba// de bzhin byis pa'i b+h+yocan la// sngags kyi tshul gyis nga yis bshad// sngon na
130b2(rgyud): stobs bcu ldan pas bstan// de ni nga yis bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa// 'odadi chen gzhon nus bstan pa yin// rgyal ba me chog gis gang gsungs dang // stobs bcu
130b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang / rmad byung bas ma mi khru' tshul gyis// 'jam dbyangs kyis gdungs de dag go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur mu nga sa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas
130b4(rgyud): gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'tsho chen po la gzigs nas dam tshig yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// gang
130b5(rgyud): du ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha'a'ang/ ga gi sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par smra ra to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs
130b6(rgyud): mthag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu chen po sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems
130b7(rgyud): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dkyil
130b8(rgyud): 'khor de bri ba 'am/ 'drir 'jug par mi nus na so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa/ 
131a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'angags pa nyan thos thams
131a2(rgyud): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa tham
131a3(rgyud): cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i
131a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to// sems can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na/ bri ba'am 'dir 'jug pa lta smos
131a5(rgyud): kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems ca na de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de
131a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin na/ sems can gzhan 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos
131a7(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yid las byung ba ni bstan to// mi rnams kyi dkyil
131a8(rgyud): 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das na yang sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags/ 
131b1(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras gang de dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig
131b2(rgyud): gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge mgon po ni// yongasu mya ngan 'das 'ag na// sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid// sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed// mthong ba tsam gyis/ 
131b3(rgyud): 'jig rten na// sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// mi shes cho ga nyams pa'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na// bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang // sngags rnams 'grub par
131b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// sngags la dad pa med pas ni// 'bad pa du ma byas gyur kyang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// ma rungs dam tshig mi bstan te// 
131b5(rgyud): dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa ni// rab 'byam brgya byin yin na/ yang // sngags rnams 'grub pa mi 'gyur na/ mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam tshig bstan
131b6(rgyud): bcos de nyid shes// las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// las
131b7(rgyud): kun byed la rab zhugs na// bstan pa ni gzhon nu bzhin// sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab pa/ 
131b8(rgyud): kyi sems can chen po sems mdod kyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems
132a1(rgyud): can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ re shig dang po cho 'phrul gyi zla byed dam/ dpyid zla 'bring po 'am/ dpyid zla tha chungs sam/ zla ba yang ngo 'am/ nyin
132a2(rgyud): zhag dge ba dang / gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yang de'i tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba dang / dus gzhan la dbyar gyi dus spangs la/ snga dros byin gyis brlabs par
132a3(rgyud): bya ste/ gang du grong khyer chen po la rten pa'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o// rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sam/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye bgrong khyer chen po'i byang shar
132a4(rgyud): gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste/ lo ma'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig
132a5(rgyud): bu rab tu gnas par bya ste/ gang gnas de dag tu yang gtsang ma sa phyogs rdzob med pa/ gyo mo dang / thal ba da / sol ba dang phub ma dang / rus pa spangs pa
132a6(rgyud): shin tu gtsang ba/ shin tu yongasu spangs pa'i sa phyogs srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga 'am/ tsan dan dang / gapur dang / gur gum gyi chus bsres pa khro bogashin rje gshed kyi sdug
132a7(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du bas
132a8(rgyud): gti bya'o// de nas phyogs de kun nes gru bzhi khrubacu shegs/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad pa byas te/ de la chen pa ni khru cu drug pa'o// 'bring ni khru btsug nyis/ 
132b1(rgyud): pa'o// chung ngu ni khru brgyad pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa gsum// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste// 'bring ni longs spyod 'brel/ 
132b2(rgyud): byed pa// chung ngu dam tshig yang dag srung // las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin// de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de las phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/ der/ 
132b3(rgyud): rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / ska la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko ba byas na gnod pa med pa dang
132b4(rgyud): 'tshe ba med par 'gyuraro// ri bo'i rtse mo dang / chu bo'i dogardzas dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang / chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu so sor
132b5(rgyud): brtags te/ shin tu gtsang ba dang / srog chags me/  par byas la bri bar bya'o// sa phyogs de yang srog cha/ gas med pa'i chul ba'i rnam pa lnga bsres te chu bo'i klung gis
132b6(rgyud): gtsang ma'am/ grogs mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o// bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam por byas la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum
132b7(rgyud): gang 'dod par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun bzla zhing phyogs bzhir gdab bo// tshen sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te
132b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyis gnas su nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o// dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi
133a1(rgyud): rig brtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o// gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs po dang / bdag nyid srung bar byas la
133a2(rgyud): sngags blo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de la g.yasu bskor ba byas nas kha shar pogasu bltas te ku sha'i stan la 'dug par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
133a3(rgyud): dpa' thams cad yid la byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun tu ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang ba rnams zhag gcig gnas pas bskal zhing dbyung bar bya'o// 
133a4(rgyud): de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la mkhas pa dang / sems da can gyi don gyi thabs kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang
133a5(rgyud): zhag gcig bsrung bar byas pa dang / grogs bzang po dang ldan pa dang / bsten bcos sna tshogs kyis las mdze nga bas tshon sna lnga'i bye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs
133a6(rgyud): par sbyar ba byas la// yi ge drag pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par bya'o// phyi rol tu yang rgyal mtshan dang // ba dan sgreng ba dang / rta babs bzhis rgyan pa
133a7(rgyud): chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za ba dang / rnga bo tshe dang / rdza rnga rdung ba dang / dung gi sgra dang / dga' ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dge bya'o// zur bzhi nas chos mnyan pa dag la
133a8(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags
133b1(rgyud): pab zla ba sgrol ma'i ting 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa sdong po rgyan pa byang phyogasu bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shar phyogasu bklag par bya'o// 
133b2(rgyud): glags bem med na mdo sde bzhi po shes pa'i gang zag chos 'chad pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur
133b3(rgyud): gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du chal par dgram par bya'o// mngon par bkram pa byas nas phyi rol du byung ste/ zhag bdun
133b4(rgyud): gyi bar 'dod pa'i kha zas bstan pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam/ gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong nye bar bsten pa mkhas pa dag bcug ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis
133b5(rgyud): gtsug pud bcing ba byas la/ de nas gser dang / dngul/ dang / zangs dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las/ tshon sna shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu
133b6(rgyud): blangs te/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dgra 'drir gzhug pa byas na dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub 'thob pa yin na/ sngags sbubs
133b7(rgyud): par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur nas// sems can bsod nams chung ba la// 'di 'dra'i longs spyod ga la yod// de bas cho ga 'di bstan bye// 
133b8(rgyud): 'jam dbyangs 'od chen ldan pa yis// skye bo phongs par gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sa lu dang
134a1(rgyud): thug po che'i phye ma shin tu zhing pa'i tshon sna lnga bzang po dkang ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / nag po dang / ljang kudag gis bsgyur te/ sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi
134a2(rgyud): bye ma slob dpon rang gis blangs nas gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la ngag rgya bcing ngo // sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon
134a3(rgyud): gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyog su cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru do la zabasu khru gang ba kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/ phyi rol yang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/ 
134a4(rgyud): shing bal shi la shing gis me sbar bar bya/ shing bil ba'i yam shing dgis mtho gang tsam rlon pa la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / ma da ra la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa'am/ snying
134a5(rgyud): pos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan drang bar bya'o// spyan drangs nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge ga/ cig pa'i snying pos phyir yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs bya'o// 
134a6(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang / 'chog chas byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed tu gzhug/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
134a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la bya ste/ sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu btud nas/ 'jam
134a8(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag byas te/ tshon gyi phye ma blangs nas sku'i gzugs kyis bcad pa la ri mo mkhan gyis yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// cho ga 'di dag gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom
134b1(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ram
134b2(rgyud): 'dri ba la 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis slob dpon bdag nyid srung ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma btang bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og
134b3(rgyud): dag tu gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te thab khung du nye bsang nas gos tsang ma bgos te/ gtsang sbra dang / srung ba'i cho ga byas nas gur gum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad
134b4(rgyud): bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas pa byas te de nyid du gnas par bya'o// nyungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par
134b5(rgyud): bsngags la kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par bya'o// bgegs kyi rnam pa 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs can mi barba da pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma rlung dang / char dang / yul ngan
134b6(rgyud): gzhan dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba mthong na khros pas nyung kar chang bar bcas te/ lan bdun sbyin sreg byas pa des ni bgegs rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ro// mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang ba nas
134b7(rgyud): sprin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la nams kyang the tsom med de brgya byin yang / 
134b8(rgyud): 'chi bar byed na ma rungs pa'i sems can dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo gshin rjeg shed kyis 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bros shing mi
135a1(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de du ku sha'i khrel la gnas nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// de nas
135a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas nges su rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos
135a3(rgyud): nyan pa bya'o// de dag gi yang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la
135a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyagagayas pa mchog sbyin pa/ de'i yang g.yas na bcom da ldan 'das yum gos dkar mo// phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma
135a5(rgyud): bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkyanU ba pa la phyag 'tshal ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag gser gyi cod pan 'chang ba/ dar la dkar po'i na ba
135a6(rgyud): banabs pa/ dar la'i bla gos banabs pa/ thal ba nag pos thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can yang rang rang gi gnas su spyod lam dag gis gnas pa bya'o// 
135a7(rgyud): de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang / gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
135a8(rgyud): bcu drug bya ba la 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang / byams pa
135b1(rgyud): yab lag na thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang
135b2(rgyud): nang thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi nga byug gi rgya po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo chen po dang / blo bzang po ste/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus shin tu ni
135b3(rgyud): ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang / phyag rgya lung ji lta ba bzhin du gnas ji lta
135b4(rgyud): ma lus bdag tu bri bar bya'o// mtha'i gru ba ni'i gnas dgad ni gnas rnams bzhag par bya'o// pad+mi me tog la dgas par byas pa dang / rig pa'i lha gang dran pa yang de dag tu
135b5(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su bcom ldan ngas shAkya thub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni rang spos kyi ngang ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du/ 
135b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi shar du bdag nyid lta ba dang / thams cad la yang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogasu rang sangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/ tsan
135b7(rgyud): dan dang / grub pa zhes bya ba gnyis bri bar bya'o// de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos gnyis ni 'od srung chen po dang / ka tA ya na bri bar bya'o// de dag gi yang g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje
135b8(rgyud): ud pa la ltar mdog sngo bsangs gzugs shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thog pa/ g.yon pa khro bo'i lus kyis gnas pa
136a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dru ma/ rdo rje lugs kyum/ rdo rje lugu d+hu ma/ dpung ba'angam/ rdo rje sdem/ cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs kyi gdan la gnas pa/ rig pa'i rgyal / 
136a2(rgyud): thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang / phyag rgya dang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o// de dag gi yang g.yon du zur bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri
136a3(rgyud): bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa'i gnas de dag kyang bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// de'i steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma kI bri
136a4(rgyud): bar ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs shin tu mdzes par bya'o// de dag gi steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal dpo brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas rang
136a5(rgyud): rang dag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bri bar bya ste/ gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu du la la/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin
136a6(rgyud): gshegs pa la zur gyis lte bdag la 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdug dkar po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor
136a7(rgyud): dang pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gdug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mngon po ste brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnamaso// g.yo
136a8(rgyud): du bri ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnamaso// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogasu ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ 
136b1(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa spri'u blugs 'dzin cing sgrol mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i
136b2(rgyud): g.yon phyogasu ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya ste/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na dbyig pa dang spyi'u blug
136b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa ni mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang ldan pa sgo la mngon par phyogs pa bri'o// seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar
136b4(rgyud): pas khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la da gnas pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen mdapa' gzhosu gyur pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya/ 
136b5(rgyud): zhi ba'i gzugs dang mdzes pa'i gzugs can cung zadazhal 'dzum pa/ phyag g.yon pa na ud pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa na bile ba bsnams pa/ 
136b6(rgyud): byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug pud lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs parlabs pa/ dar gyi ni bzas
136b7(rgyud): smad g.yogs mdzad pa/ 'od kun nas 'phro ba/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la gzigs pa/ dkyil
136b8(rgyud): 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgol mngon du phyogs pa blta na sdug pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya ste/ mi sdug pa chen po'i
137a1(rgyud): gzugs can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ bka' len cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyog su lta'o// g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu
137a2(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lta bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri med dang / shin tu dul ba dang / dag pa dang / mun sel dang / kun tu snang ba'o// 
137a3(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dug pa/ rin po che du ma 'bar ba'i rdo'i steng dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa/ shin tu mdzes
137a4(rgyud): pa bri bar bya'o// phyi rol 'khor yug tu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshon sna lngas gsal bas ri mo shin
137a5(rgyud): tu drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// shar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus/ su me tog kun nas skyes po'i rgyal po'i dbang pos pad+ma'i
137a6(rgyud): gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o// 'od kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ mchog sprin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ skyil mo krung gis
137a7(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ de'i g.yas su gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// g.yon du ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag tu bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng du ni
137a8(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'i g.yas su bcom ldan
137b1(rgyud): 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs can te/ phyag rgya mchog sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i yang gal/ 
137b2(rgyud): phyogasu lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po
137b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon phyogasu gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i g.yon phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog bya
137b4(rgyud): ste rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po dang / margad dang / pad+ma rA gA rnam pa sna da tshogs 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar
137b5(rgyud): bya'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas
137b6(rgyud): 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogasu 'khar sil dang / spri'u blugs dang / phreng ba dang / bzang po'i gdun gyi phyag rgya bri'o// mthar gyis sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyi ga la
137b7(rgyud): yang kun nas 'bar badri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga zhes bya ba dang / ud pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di gnyis phan tshun
137b8(rgyud): 'brel pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o// sgo dag ni rgyab kyis lta ba dang / 'jug pa na ni mdun gyis lta bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gyur ba yang
138a1(rgyud): kha dog lnga'i tshan shin tu gsal ba sna tshogs bltan sdug pa/ bur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis tsam
138a2(rgyud): nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogasu tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa la stod g.yogs gos dkar po dang / tshangs skad dkar po thogs pa
138a3(rgyud): kha dog gser 'dra ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ lag na dbyug pa dang spre'u blugs 'dzin pa/ de'i g.yas phyog su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ bsam
138a4(rgyud): gtan khyad par can gyi gzugs can/ dang la'i gos bgos pa/ dar li'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ bzhin shin tu gsal ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ mchod phyir
138a5(rgyud): thogs dkar po can/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/  ga pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas phyog su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad
138a6(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ bsam gtan gyi rnam po'i chu byad can/ dar la'i gos dgos pa/ dar la'i gos kyi stod g.yog byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas
