138a7(rgyud): pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la
138a8(rgyud): sogs pa'i lho'i bu bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du'o// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris la rtag tu myos dang / phreng thogs
138b1(rgyud): dang lag na gnong thogs dang / pi bang gnyis pa dang / sa bla'i lnga'i bu dag go rims ji lta ba dang / khya di lta bani du bya de bzhin du lho phyog su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 
138b2(rgyud): nom snang ba dang / dge rlung dang / bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu chu byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs dang / byang phyogasu yang de bzhin te/ de dag ni rim pa
138b3(rgyud): 'og ma gnyis la brtan te bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la mthar gyis phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/ byang phyogs nas 'jug pa'i g.yas
138b4(rgyud): ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la gnod sbyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug pung cung zad 'dud pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/ de'i g.ya su nor bu bzang dang / gang ba
138b5(rgyud): bzang po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o// de bzhin du mtha ra gyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogasu chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs
138b6(rgyud): pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad po bri'o// de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sprin dang / 
138b7(rgyud): srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / smon dang / 
138b8(rgyud): nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang / ri dang / chu bo dang / gling dang / mthar gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o// lho phyogasu ni gshen rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// shar lho maH
139a1(rgyud): su me kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ dbyug pa dang / spri'u blugs dang / phreng ba lag na thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar/ 
139a2(rgyud): la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs
139a3(rgyud): dang / kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol tu dka' bzlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lag na mdung
139a4(rgyud): rtse gsum thogs pa/ lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs pa// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ smin drug gi bu rma bya'i dgadan la 'dug pa/ mdung thogs pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can
139a5(rgyud): gdong drug pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po bgo sa pa/ gos ser po'i stod g.yogs can/ lag pa g.yon pa na dril bu dang / ba dan dmar po thogs pa
139a6(rgyud): mthar gyis byung gi ri ti shin tu rid pa 'dra ba dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / kha dog
139a7(rgyud): dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// nor lha brgya dang / drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin 'khor lo dang / dung dang / gad dang / ral gri thogs pa/ gdan na mkha' lding
139a8(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang yang nye ba'i gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba yang bri bar bya'o// mthar gyis tshes grangs
139b1(rgyud): bco lnga dang / yar ngo dang mar ngo'i phyogs dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / lo tshogs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la non pa dang / ming po lnga gru la zhon cing chu la
139b2(rgyud): gnas pa ste/ mdor na phyag rgyar bzhag par bya ba yang yin no// lha mo de dag ma thar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la bsten te bya ba yin no// slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil 'khor de la
139b3(rgyud): g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ mdor ni dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor gsum la rten cing bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum car yang gru bzhir rnam par gnas par bya ba yin no// mdor
139b4(rgyud): na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'pha dgas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri bar bya'o// 
139b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje yang nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa/ kun tu bzang po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpal
139b6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa yang nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams kyi ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// 'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar ma la yang shar phyogs
139b7(rgyud): su ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o// sgo'i drung du ni smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan yod pa/ lag na mdung thogs pa/ lus kyi kha dog dmar ba/ gos ser pos stod g.yogs dang gos
139b8(rgyud): byas pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na dril bu dang bdan thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can 'khor la lta ba'o// shar phyogasu ni na mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can/ drang srong gi nang nas
140a1(rgyud): mar kand nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / ming po gzhon nu dang bcas pa
140a2(rgyud): gru'i bzhon pa la gnas pa/ rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang / me lha'i rgyal po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po las ni grong khyer lnga ka'i bdag po/ 
140a3(rgyud): b+hi b+hi sha na shing pi nu marda la gnas pa dang / dzam+b+ha la chu dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis gshin rje'i rgyal po yi dgas
140a4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal nga po rnam par g.yengs byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// 
140a5(rgyud): de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtsham su ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang nye dga' khonges par bri bar bya'o// gza'i gtso bo nyam bri ba/ ra bya'o// nub phyogasu ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog gcer
140a6(rgyud): bu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i gzugs bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// nub byang mtshamasu ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang / dri za'i
140a7(rgyud): rgyal po gtsug pud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni gnas ji lta ba dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi
140a8(rgyud): pa phyi rol tu ri mo lngar bkod de/ phyag rgya'i phreng bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis rgyan pa/ ji ltar gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ phyag
140b1(rgyud): rgyar 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ud pa la sngon po bri'o// g.yas dang g.yon phyog su ni pad+ma/ rdo rje/ dgra sta/ ral gri/ mdung dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gang dang / 'khor lo dang / 
140b2(rgyud): swasti ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung dang / gdub kor dang / spri'u blugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / chu gri dang / gzhu dang / tho
140b3(rgyud): ba dang / 'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra ba'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogasu kun nas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtsho chen po bzhag par bya ste/ 
140b4(rgyud): byang phyogasu ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bya ste/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o// shar phyogasu dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can byas te bzhag la
140b5(rgyud): kun nas 'bar ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o// lho byan/ su ni dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te/ kun nas/ 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o// nub phyogasu ni
140b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum po byas te/ ud pa la sngon po sdong bu dang / mdab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// phyogs mtshams bzhir yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ba yin te
140b7(rgyud): nub byang gi phyogasu ni dkyil 'khor zlum po bya ste/ zhags pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// lho nub kyi mtshamasu ni dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba bya ste/ dbyug pas kun nas 'bar bas
140b8(rgyud): mtshan pa'o// shar lce'i mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa byas te/ dgra sta 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// byang shar gyi mtshams su ni ral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba bzhag par
141a1(rgyud): bya'o// de ltar thams cad bris nas steng dang / 'og dang / thad kar phyag rgya gsum dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang nye bar phye ma dang bri bar bya la/ 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / 
141a2(rgyud): rnga yab dang / lha mo 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo can gyis// sems can rnams la phan bzhed nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga rnams// 'dir ni mdo
141a3(rgyud): bsdus bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ba la dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang / bram ze dang
141a4(rgyud): rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod
141a5(rgyud): pa'i ngang tshul can dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dad / pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / rgya la po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod chung ba la/ 
141a6(rgyud): smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bza' ba dag dang / dul ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
141a7(rgyud): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdom pa la nges par gnas pa dang / gso slong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang
141a8(rgyud): ba dang / phyogs chen po dang / rigs mthon po dang / rang bzhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang / zhag gcig bsnyung ba byis pa dang / gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang / ska dri zhim pa dang
141b1(rgyud): dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang / de'i nyin zhag lag pur dang / gur gum dang / li shi'i dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa rtag tu nye reg dang ldan pa dang / ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang / srung
141b2(rgyud): de'i cho ga byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bden pa dang ldan pa dang / dus mtshams las rgyal ba dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye/ ha cang yang mi ring bar bzhag par
141b3(rgyud): bya'o// shin tu gtsang ba dang / shin tu gtsang sbra dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kyi bar te/ de las gzhan ma yin pa de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen du 'brel ba/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
141b4(rgyud): bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dag gi bu bzhon nu ma 'am/ gzhon nu grong gi chos mi shes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems
141b5(rgyud): dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa/ gzhozhi na nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na/ dang po nyid du gno/ na du nang du gzhug par bya'o// rgyal po chen po mngon par
141b6(rgyud): 'phel ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal ba chen po mngon par 'phel ba yin te/ khyad par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pas grub pa gnas pa yin te/ 
141b7(rgyud): de dag sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs po bag yod pa bzang po dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi ga pur gyi bdug pas bdug te/ rgyab kyi phyogs pa ma yin pas phyi rol tu byung bar bya ste
141b8(rgyud): byung nas dus dang ji ltar 'thun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang / srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos phyag/ 
142a1(rgyud): rgyar byas pa'i chus khrus pas la nye reg ca gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste/ ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas byang shar gyi phyog su mngon par
142a2(rgyud): bltas te/ mar gyi sbyin sreg ga pur dang / gur gum dang / tsan dan bsres pas stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// sngar bshad pa'i tshogs spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba bya ste/ yang dkyil
142a3(rgyud): 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// nges par yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shing a mra'i lo ma dang / 'bras bu dang ldan pa// gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che
142a4(rgyud): dang / 'bras dang / 'bru nang du bcug pa gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dbul lo// gnyis pa ni sad das rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams
142a5(rgyud): cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos la'o// bzhi pa ni byang chub sem sa dpa' chen po thams cad la'o// lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o// drug
142a6(rgyud): pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang / brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo gang la bzhag par bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o// gcig ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong
142a7(rgyud): du gyur par bsngos nas bzhag par bya'o// de bas na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang / lha bshos kyang sngar
142a8(rgyud): bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar me 'dzin pas mar gyi mar me bzung bar bya'o// 'phags pa dang 'phags pa me yin pa
142b1(rgyud): thams cad la lta bshos zhes smos pa ni 'bras sa lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyab par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la bcos pa'i snam khur gyis 'breng bu la sogs pa dang
142b2(rgyud): khan da la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// mar gyis gang ba dang / tsan dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po dang 'o mer bcos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas
142b3(rgyud): thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du gats+tshed u lo bi ka ri ka dang / khyad par du snam
142b4(rgyud): khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i tsho gas sbyin par bya'o// de de bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa sna ma'i me tog dang / rgya spos dang
142b5(rgyud): klu'i me tog dang / me tog pun na ga la sogs pa sngar bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po
142b6(rgyud): dang 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs pa'i sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad+ma dang / 
142b7(rgyud): bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog ud pa la dang / lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// 
142b8(rgyud): tsan dan ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// de bzhin du gu gul ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o// lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o// mar gyi mar me 'phags pa
143a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad la ni dbul bar bya// 'phags min lha ni thams cad la// dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya// cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni// bdug pa mthong
143a2(rgyud): rgyu yiso// de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri// sngags rnams kun la rtag tu bya// spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang // gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la// rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis/ 
143a3(rgyud): sdigs spyod don du sgrub pa'o// cho ga gcig pu blta bya ste// rtag tu rje su 'thun par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar mthong ba'i tshogs spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bdug
143a4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa byas nas gtsor 'thun pa'i bya ba byas te/ de'i dag tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis mkhas pa dang myur ba sa 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa/ kun nas
143a5(rgyud): rnga pa ta ha dang / dung gi sgra dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs la sogs pa des bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog dang phreng bas rgyan pa'i phyogs bzhi/ mtshams brgya
143a6(rgyud): steng dang / 'og dang / thed ka thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bskor ba bya zhing 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang
143a7(rgyud): mar gyis bsgos pa'i sa lu dang / 'bras thug po che'i sprin sreg rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge drag pa dang / snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// sbyin sregs byas nas dkyil 'khor la rje su bcug cing sngar bzhan
143a8(rgyud): pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
143b1(rgyud): dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phul ba/ dngos grub kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang / yongasu longs spyod pa thun mongs du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying
143b2(rgyud): po gnon par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o// bstan pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te
143b3(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo yang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyuraro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa thag mas btags me thag pa sgra med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas
143b4(rgyud): te/ dri zhim po'i tsan dan dang / gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyis gdong g.yog par bya'o// dang por byis pa lo gsum de nas lo bcu drag pa'i bar zur phud lngas nye bar mdzes pa'am
143b5(rgyud): gtsug pud gcig gis nye bar mdzes pa'am/ gtsug pud kyis nye bar mdzes pa skra dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i bu spyi bo na sad/ bang bskur ba 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu'am/ gzhan bdag
143b6(rgyud): nyid chen po rgyal po chen po 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyin pa na gdong g.yog par bya ste/ ud pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
143b7(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sngags lan gcig brjod du gzhug ste/ me tog dri zhim po tsan dan dang / gur gus dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang ba byas pa lag pa gnyisu byin la me tog 'dor du gzhug go// gang du de'i me tog
143b8(rgyud): babs pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya ste/ sngags 'di'i ni de'i yin par bstan te/ skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rje su 'brel ba yin te/ de nyid dge ba'i gshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying po la gnon pa/ 
144a1(rgyud): / byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su rdzogs pa 'dzin du mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ longs spyod chen po dang / rgyal po chen po dang / grags
144a2(rgyud): pa chen po dang / gang dag rtse gcig par mngon par sgrub pa yin no// tshe 'di nyid la yang chos thams cad la the tsom med par bsgrub par byang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub
144a3(rgyud): rjod pas brgyad kyi bang du bya ste/ gzhan la ni ma yin// gzhan dag la ji ltar sdig pa spang ba'i phyir dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bskur na dang po
144a4(rgyud): shig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ro la ha cang yang menye/ ha cang la dang mi ring bar byang shar gyis phyog su rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag/ dpar byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rgyal po dang
144a5(rgyud): bskung ba bzhin du bdag nyid sems pa dang / gcisangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun lang/ da cing dang bdang spong chen po dang ldan pa dang
144a6(rgyud): byang chub gi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang / dkan mchog gsum la phan pa byed pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma smad pa dang / 
144a7(rgyud): 'di nyid la sngags 'grub par 'dod pa dang bsam pa bzang ba dang / sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can dang / sad par 'dod pa'i phyir yang
144a8(rgyud): sngags kyi don la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / der gtod pa'i yid dang / gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o// lhag ma ni spang bar bya'o// shes rab
144b1(rgyud): can dang / spyod pa la rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang bskur bar bya'i/ gzhan dag ni ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon
144b2(rgyud): mkhan po mnyes na/ de nas bla re chen po bres te/ rgyal mtshan dang be dan mthon po sgreng zhing / gdugs dkar po dbu la 'dzin pa dang / rnga yab dkar pos g.yob pa dang / bkur sti chen pos
144b3(rgyud): dung dang / rnga bo che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs shing rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshigasu bcad pa dang / bde legs dang / rab tu sngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pas mngon
144b4(rgyud): par bstod pa dang / dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas 'di skad du slob dpon bdag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
144b5(rgyud): dpa'i sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las yang ba dag par 'das pa'i ga sang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug
144b6(rgyud): pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyi ro zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ 
144b7(rgyud): shar gyi phyog su phyogs te dkyil 'khor la lta zhing / dang po re shig rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin te/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga 'ching du gzhug par bya'o// de nas rang 'dod pa'i sngags
144b8(rgyud): gang dang gang la dga' bgro ga'i mdab ma la gi wang gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang tsan dan dang / gur gum gyi chus lag pa dang / kham por kha sbyar bkrus la/ de nas gro ga'i
145a1(rgyud): 'dab ma de kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung du bzhag par bya'o// de nas ku sha de la
145a2(rgyud): gnas nas rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sdo ma nyid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can thams cad dang thun
145a3(rgyud): mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang bsgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs te/ slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// gzhan dag la ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i chu so// de/ 
145a4(rgyud): nas kham por kha sbyar de de la sbyin par bya ste/ mar me la klog/  tu gzhug par bya'o// gal te de nyid yin na ni rim gyis nga 'bad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na ji ste gzhan na ni
145a5(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyuraro// yang na yi ge'i yan/ lag nyams pa 'am/ lhag pa byin na ni dang po sgrub pa kho/ na la 'grub par the tsom medo// de ltar slob dpon gyis slar
145a6(rgyud): bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par the tsom med do// de bzhin du dang pos ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor
145a7(rgyud): du lha thams cad la bstabs pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o// spyi bo la sngar gyi cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas
145a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang zhing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor
145b1(rgyud): dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin no// dkyil 'khor gsum pa la ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / nyan
145b2(rgyud): thos thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba de nyid kyi tsho gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig
145b3(rgyud): rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rgyud dag 'don pa dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / ston pa dang / phyag rgya dang / spyod pa ston pa dang / rang nyid spyod cing ston par khyod la rjesu gnang zhing
145b4(rgyud): brjod par bya ba yang tshe 'di nyid la yin la/ phyi nas skye ba bcu dad padag la ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bsgyu
145b5(rgyud): ba yang sngar bstan pa'i tsho gas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ste ra dul ba'i bum pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la/ phul ba'i bum pa gang bas kyang de bzhin du dbang bskur// 
145b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du brjod par byazhing khyod la rjesu gnang ba yin no// 'byung po/ 
145b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing lus can thams cad kyis mi pham pa dang / sngags thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrubs shig pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor
145b8(rgyud): gyi slob dpon gyis re re la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o// sems can rnams la yang lnga po nyid kyis bya'o// de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor la bcug
146a1(rgyud): ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te slar btang bar bya'o// de las
146a2(rgyud): gzhan pa'i nyin zhag la mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la bslab par bya zhing sbyar bar bya'o// skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
146a3(rgyud): sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par lta bar bya ba la glud par bya'o// 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ kye
146a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gas drang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur nas bsod nams ma nga yin pa mang po skye bar ma byed cig/ sngags thams cad
146a5(rgyud): kyang 'dor bar ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sa/ mas dpa' dag kyang slu bar ma byed cig/ bla ma ma/ nyes par gyis shig/ gzhan du dam tshig las 'das
146a6(rgyud): par gyur na sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams ma yin pa mang po 'gyur ro zhes de ltar smras la btang bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi
146a7(rgyud): dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sa lu dang / 'bras thug po che'i sregs blugs kyis yi ge brgyad pa'i snying po dang sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas langs nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs
146a8(rgyud): te/ sngar bstan pa'i me tog gis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas lha thams cad yid la bya ste mchod yon dbulo// bdugs pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang
146b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang
146b2(rgyud): sha za dang / 'byung po dang / rnal 'byor pa dang / grub pa dang / drang srong rnams dang / sems can thams cad yang dag par bdugs nas me tog gtor te/ tsan dan dang / gur gum
146b3(rgyud): gyis bsangs la sngar bstan pa'i tsho gas slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ sems kyis thams cad btang ba yin no// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bshos dang
146b4(rgyud): gtor ma dang / sa tshon thams cad chu bor dor bar bya ba 'am// srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin pa/ ra bya'o// sa phyogs de legs par byugs shing 'jam
146b5(rgyud): par byas te/ legs par phyag byas nas ba lang gi lci bas 'byug tu gzhug pa 'am/ chus byug par bya ba'am/ shin tu gtsang ba'i sas byug pa'am/ bye mas gtor
146b6(rgyud): bar byas la/ de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'o ma dang / 'bras zan gyis zas sam/ lha la dbul ba'i kha zas bza' bar
146b7(rgyud): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i dbang po las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byam las dkyil 'khor gyi
146b8(rgyud): cho ga bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs// / de nas gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi
147a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa la gzigs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba/ dug thams
147a2(rgyud): cad 'joms par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags dang dkyil 'khor chung ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang / las phran tshogs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba smraso// de yang gang zhe na
147a3(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bu d+hA nAM/ trad thA/ oM dza grogs po dag 'di ni 'byung po thams cad nyon cig/ sngags 'di nyid ni yi ge gcig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga thams cad du dgos pa/ khru brgyad
147a4(rgyud): dam khru bzhi sa'i phyogs yang dag par byas la chen sna lnga'i bye mas rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/ gang de deng de dag tu yang 'dir ni nges
147a5(rgyud): pa med do// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pos nye bar/ mdzes pa/ gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang por shig dri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur
147a6(rgyud): gyur pa'i ud pa la'i phyag rgya dang / mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / zhal gyi phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa'i phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya 'di dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi char bri bar bya'o// de nas
147a7(rgyud): pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / ud pa la dang / phyag mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rta babs dang / shing rta dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / glang dang / ma he dang / swasti/ 
147a8(rgyud): ka dang / rma bya dang / ra dang / lug dang / skyes bu gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyi rol gyi sgo'i rtsa bar bri bar bya ste/ mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas bris te/ dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas
147b1(rgyud): de ltar bri bar bya'o// de nas yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis shar lce'i phyogs kyi char me'i las bya ste/ shing a pa marga'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pas stong
147b2(rgyud): brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas me tog gi mchod yon dbul lo// yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang / lha bshos dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang
147b3(rgyud): spun drang ba dang / gshegasu gsol pa rnams bya'o// de nas rgyal srid 'dod pas ni grong khyer gyi dbusu bri bar bya'o// longs spyod 'dod pas ni shing a mra'i drung du'o// bu 'dod pas ni
147b4(rgyud): bo de tsi'i shing gi drung du'o// chung ma dang / glang po che dang / rta 'dod pas ni glang po che'i bres skya'am/ rta'i bres sbyar ro// chu 'dod pas ni mtsho chen po'am/ klu'i
147b5(rgyud): gnas su'o// nyin bzhi pa'i rims sam/ rtag pa'i mas sam/ rims thams cad la rtags gcig pa 'am/ grong gi g.yas phyogs su'o// srin pos zin pa la
147b6(rgyud): ni dur khrod dam/ khang pa stong par bya'o// yang srin pos zin pa la ni ba ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam/ oM.a rat+na'i shing gi drung du bya'o// ma mo thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am shi
147b7(rgyud): ba'i khyim dang / bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o// tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la ta la'i shing du'o// sbyar ba'i dug 'byin pa la ni yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum bsngags pa
147b8(rgyud): bya ste/ dkyil 'khor de nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du bud med dam skyes pa grags pa 'dod pa la ni bzhi dol bram ze gnas par bri bar bya'o// bu shi ba la ni
148a1(rgyud): shing 'bras bu can nam/ 'o ma can gyi shing du'o// 'bras sa lu smin pa'i sa dang zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri bar bya'o// nad rnam pa gsum bdag gir byas pa dang / 
148a2(rgyud): gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug ngogs la sogs pa la'o// nad chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang 'gram du bya'o// nad thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa la ni ri'i rtse
148a3(rgyud): mor bri bar bya'o// mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la yang bram ze'i ldum ra 'am/ khang pa stong pa 'am/ gnas dben pa gzhol ba'i phyogasu bya'o// de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyed
148a4(rgyud): dam/ dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o// yi ge ga/ da cig pa de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul tog shegs su gsol la/ dkyil 'khor la chus
148a5(rgyud): gtor ba byas na nad thams cad srung ba chen pos byas par 'gyur te// / nad thams cad las grol bar yang 'gyur ro// bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing // skal med rnams kyang
148a6(rgyud): skal ldan 'gyur// dbul po rnams kyis nor thob pa// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyiso// skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyang // thos nas the tsom med byas na// ci 'dod
148a7(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs ni// thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi cho ga rab 'byam las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba las dkyil 'khor gsum
148a8(rgyud): pa'i chog rdzog so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs nas// gzhan
148b1(rgyud): yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus pa la yang gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la btud nas zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
148b2(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga sgrub pa'i rgyu 'thun pa/ chos kyi char ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byam
148b3(rgyud): las ras kyi ri me'i cho ga bsod nams bla na med pa bskyed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis bon ma ngon par sgrub par byed pa// mdor na bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs
148b4(rgyud): par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyis 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor ni dang 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ don med pa ma yi na pa grub cing sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
148b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyod pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub sems/ dpa' chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bdud thams cad kyi ste/ bas zil gyis mnan cing rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa
148b6(rgyud): bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du gsol/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam
148b7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa
148b8(rgyud): la don 'di 'dra bar sems pa ni leg so leg so// de shin tu legs par nyon pa 'a cu shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// khyod kyi ras kyi cho ga sa 'byam sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa la rab tu 'jug
149a1(rgyud): pa mthar gyis ngas bshad par bya'o// sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da ltar yang ngas bshad par bya'o// dang por re shig sa'i phyogs gtsang ba rdul
149a2(rgyud): med pa las ras bal yang dag par blangs la/ dam tshig la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ras bal de yang dag par dag par byas te/ yang sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags
149a3(rgyud): par bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ bod+hi satwa a pra ti te ta gti ma ti pra nA ra NAM/ na maHso sho d+han duHkha pra sha ma nen+t+ra rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyakr-i bu d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ 
149a4(rgyud): sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya/ sarba big+h+nAM in+ta ka ma hA ka ru Ni ka ku mA ra rU paM dI ri Ni/ bi kurba bi kurba/ sa ma ya ma nu smai ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ti hUM hUM phaT phaT sIhI/ 
149a5(rgyud): de nas grong gi chos mi shes pa'i gzhon nu ma bram ze'i rigs de/ nga / rgyal rigasu skyes pa dang / rje 'u'i rigs su/ skyes pa dang / rigs ngan pa'i skye gnas yongasu spangs
149a6(rgyud): pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ pha dang mas rje su gnang ba/ gso spong byas pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzhin dkar
149a7(rgyud): ba/ kha dog gzhan rnam par spangs pa/ mdor na bud med kyi mtshan nyid rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshon pa/ shin tu nyin zhag shis pa dang / zla ba yang ngo dang / gza' bzang po bltas/ 
149a8(rgyud): te/ du ba dang khug rna med cing sprin dang bral ba rlung med cing gtsang ba'i sa phyogasu sngar bstan pa'i gzhon nu ma khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gos kyi legs par bkab pa byas pa la sngags
149b1(rgyud): 'di brag rgya chen po dang ldan pas srung bar byas te/ nan na dkar po dang / gur gum sgrog chags med pa'i chu dang sbyang bas sa ngal de dang / bu ma de sngags de nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te// 
149b2(rgyud): gtor la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyi chus steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o// tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga pur gcig tu byas pa'i bdug
149b3(rgyud): pas bdug par bya ste/ rang nyid kyis sbyin pa'am/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis sbyin par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i
149b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ras kyi dog pa 'di la lha/ dag par gnas par mdzod cig ces lan gsum brjod pa dar bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 
149b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgongs su gsol zhes byas nas bdug pas bdug pa de'i dus su rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / dung pa
149b6(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs bya dge bathang la gnas pa 'am/ chu la spyod pa rnams na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/ dge ba'i skad 'don na las 'di ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yino zhes sgrub pa pos shes par
149b7(rgyud): bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gi ras skud 'di la byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag gi skye ba dam pa ni legs par 'tshe ba yin te
149b8(rgyud): bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyuraro// rnga paT ta dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / dung dang / pi bang dang / gling bu dang / khar rnga dang / rdza rnga chen po'i sgra thos pa'am/ bung
150a1(rgyud): med dang / khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ skyes pa rnams bcos ma'am/ bcos pa ma yin pa de'i dus su glo bur du 'di skad ces rgyal ba dang / grub pa dang / sbyin pa dang / byin pa dang / 
150a2(rgyud): khyer cig ces pa dang / dpal dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bras bu yod pa dang / cho ga dang / brgya byin dang / mang po dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu dge ba 'don pa'am/ rmil bri sgra dang / dga' ba'i
150a3(rgyud): sgra thos na/ des na rig pa 'dzin pas shes par bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'di yin te/ don yod pa'i grub pa ni
150a4(rgyud): 'di yin zhing gzhan du ma yin no zhes so// ji ste de'i dus su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig/ zo shig/ zung shig/ nyams pa/ rnam par nyams pa/ kyi hud/ ring ba
150a5(rgyud): shin tu ring ba/ med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra 'don pa la/ ma/ spre'u dang / ma he dang / lce spyang dang / bong bu/ dang / byi la dang / ba lang dang / dud 'gro smad pa rkang / 
150a6(rgyud): gnyis sam/ rkang bzhi pa'i sgra 'don par gyur na/ des ni sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni med pa yin zhes shes par bya ste/ skabs der brtul bar bya zhing yang snga ma bzhin du yang brtsam par
150a7(rgyud): bya'o// de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la/ bdun pa'i las kyi bya ba la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de srung ba byas la ku sha'i
150a8(rgyud): khres la gzhag par bya ste/ shar ram byang phyog su phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid srung ba dang / lha la dbul ba'i kha zas zasu sbyin no// sngar spang ba byas pa'i ku sha'i khres de nyid kyi tshe
150b1(rgyud): gas ras bal la yang bya'o// dog pade 'jam pa dang / legs par bsgrims pa dang / sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te/ gcig dang / gsum dang / lnga dang / brgyad la sogs
150b2(rgyud): pa nas bcu drug gi bar ram/ kar sha'i grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pas bya'o// de las rab ni bcu drug bya// de bzhin brkyang ni bar ma ste// phran tshegs las la sgrub pa ni
150b3(rgyud): gcig dang lnga ni tha ma'o// las rnams kun la sngags rig pas// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya// de nas brtsams te gang cung zad// sdig pa sngar ni byas pa dag/ dog par sems kyis dmigs pa na// de yi mod la
150b4(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// dog pa 'di dag yang dag blangs// gtsang da ma'i snod du gzhug par bya// de nas bzhag pa byas nas de// ga pur gyi ni bdug pas bdug/ srog chags yan
150b5(rgyud): lag min byung ba'am// gur gum tsan dan la sogs dang / me tog ma li tsam pa ka/ dri zhim la sogs yongasu bsgo// / srung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni// gtsang ba'i phyogasu yang dag
150b6(rgyud): bzhag/ sngags rig las kun shes pa yis// shin tu mnyam bzhag bzlas pa bya// de nas thag par song nas// ci'adod pa yi rin sbyin no// rang dbang yan lag ma nyams dang
150b7(rgyud): dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dad// rgan min nad kyis gdungs pa min// lud pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs// ma ning smad pa ma yin dang // 'phye bo ma yin skra dkar spangs// kun gyis bkur
150b8(rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid ldan// rab sngags blta na sdug pa dang // blo dang yang dag spyod pa dge/ 'jig rten pa yi tshul la rten// dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni// ras bzang btag pa'i ched du bskul/ 
151a1(rgyud): grogs po rigs bzang rab bsngags shing // blo ldan bzo ni mkhas pa dang // shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i// ras 'thag bzang la bskul ba
151a2(rgyud): bya/ rab ni rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'bring ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya// tha ma phran tshegs las la ni// dman pa nyid ni thams cad la// bzo ba ji ltar smra ba bzhin// rin ni de ltar sprin/ 
151a3(rgyud): par bya// dang po'i tshig ni yang dag byung // bzo bo la ni sngags rig pas// de nas myur du rin byin pa// dpa' bo'i tsheng zhes de la brjod// don du gnyer med de la ni// rin du smra byed
151a4(rgyud): sgrub pa po// 'di ni myur du 'grub byed pa'i// ras ni ba bzang po bla na med// las kun byed cing mchod pa da ste// lha dang mi yi bde ba sbyin// 'byung po kun gyi dpal
151a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhes// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas thag pa la rgyu skar bzang po 'am/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dang / nyin zhag dge ba'am/ bza'
151a6(rgyud): dge ba bltas te gso sbyong sbyin// yang na dus kyi mchog dpyid kyi dus kyi zla ba yar gyi ngol shing a mra'i me tog skyes shing / shing gi mchog rnams kyi yal ga dang / me tog rgyas pa de'i dus
151a7(rgyud): mtsham su snga dro nyi ma 'tshor po la sngar bstan pa'i thag pa lta la dbul bar 'os pa'i kha zas bsten cing gos gtsang ma dgos la/ mgo la cod pan bcings nas khrus legs par byas te/ can dan
151a8(rgyud): dkar po dang / gur gum gang yang rung bas lus byug nas ga pur gyi dris kha la bsgos te/ yid dga' ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa med par bya ste/ thags kyi lag chag pa la sogs
151b1(rgyud): pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang sar pa las dang b.lang gi lci bas bkrus te/ yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o// de nas srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o// tsan dan dkar po dang gu dgum
151b2(rgyud): gyikyi chus kyang gtor bar bya'o// gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su ca tse med cing skye bo dang bral ba dben pa'i gnas su bkab pa dang / gsang bar me tog gis mchid do// de nas sgrub pos yang dag par byed
151b3(rgyud): pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsta/ 'i nyungs kar gyis phyogs bzhi steng 'og phyogs mtsham su gtong bar bya'o// de nas thag pa la nyungs kar gyis gtor bar bya zhing phyag rgya chen po
151b4(rgyud): gtsug pud lnga bcings te/ gtsug pud bcing ba byas na srung dab chen po byas par 'gyuraro// gal te ras ris rab yin na ni zung bzhir nang du khru bzhi/ chur khru brgyad de tha
151b5(rgyud): gapas de tsam la yongasu goms par bya'o// 'bring ni zhing / du khrud// chur khru lnga pa'o// tha ma ni zheng / du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang / chur ni khru brgyad kyi
151b6(rgyud): byed do// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang la ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te/ tshad ni 'dis tshad du
151b7(rgyud): bstan pa yin no// ras ni rab kyis dngos grub mchog/ 'jig rten gang zag mchog gis gsungs// thub pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu// rgyal srid 'dod la bar ma yin// longs spyod chen 'dod
151b8(rgyud): skyes bu dang // lha mi lha min gdeng can ni// tha ma la ni grub par bshad// 'bring gis 'bring ni grub pa'o// las rnams phran tshegs dag la ni// ras ni thams cad rtag tu 'grub
152a1(rgyud): rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ras gsum gyis kyang bstan pa ni// skal 'dod mi la 'grub pa yin// brgya
152a2(rgyud): byin bde sogs bdag po la'ang // cho ga nyams na 'grub mi 'gyur// cho ga yang dag ldan na ni// mi yi skye ba tha ma la'ang // las rnams thams cad 'bad med par// myur ba nyid du 'grub
152a3(rgyud): pabar byed// rgyal ba rgyal mchog sras dag gis// lam 'di dag ni yang dag bstan// phongs pa mgon med sdug bsngal ba'i// sems can kun la legs smin pa'o// byang
152a4(rgyud): chub lam ni ma lus kyang // de nyid gzigs pas bstan dpa ste// byang chub rgyu yi chos 'di ni// sngags kyi la dam gyis bstan pa yin// 'jig rten dkyil 'khor ma lus
152a5(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te// dkyil 'a/ khor gang dag bstan pa yis// 'bad pa med par snga gas rnams 'grub// gang zhig byang chub rgyu 'dod pas// 
152a6(rgyud): de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur// 'gro la phan sems rtag med pa// gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni// gzhon nur gyur pas khyad par du// byang
152a7(rgyud): chub 'jug pa'i khyad sems la// ras ris 'grub par gsungs pa yin// bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// thams cad 'dir ni thob pa yin// de nas mthar gyis bzo bos ni// ras ni 'bang
152a8(rgyud): pas btag par bya// nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad dang ni// bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dang ni// nyin zhag gcig gis myur du ni// myur bar ras kyi thag bya// grub pa mchog ni 'dod pa yis// 
152b1(rgyud): nyin nag gcig pa dge ba yin// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs// gzob rtag tu byin rlabs ldan// gnas nas bag ring song nas ni// bshang dang gcib yongasu dong // de nas gos/ 
152b2(rgyud): bcas khrus byas te// gos gzhan dag kyang bgo bya zhing // gos dkar phreng ba ldan par 'chang // yang dang yang du nye reg bya// lus ni tsan dan dkar pos byugs// bzo bas lag pa
152b3(rgyud): gnyis kyang byug/ legs 'jam rtag tu dri med pa// 'bad pas kyang ni tha ga bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am// gzhan ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang // rnam dpyad rang bzhin 'bad
152b4(rgyud): pa yis// ras ni ma lus thag bya// ras kyi thag zin pa/ dang // sngar gsungs las kyis lags byas pa/ tshad ldan nyams pa med pa ni// nyin zhag bzang la bltag
152b5(rgyud): te bzhag/ yang ngo'i shin tu bzang po la// de la sngags ni ga zhag par bya// ras ni yongasu gsal byas pa/ kha tshar mthar ni mdud mdzes bya// 'od ma'i shing la
152b6(rgyud): btags nas ni// de nas ras ni blangs te 'gro/ bzo bo bdo legs byas nas ni// nor mang pos ni bgo bsha' bya// brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i// sngags pa ji ltar 'dod
152b7(rgyud): song nas// me tog dri zhim gyis mchod de// gtsang ba'i phyogasu bzhag par bya// 'di nyid kyi ni sngags kyis su// srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya// sngon ni ras bal gang de yis// lan mang
152b8(rgyud): du ni yongs sbyangs pa// bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la// de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba bya// dpa' bo chen po 'jam dpal gyis// sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa dang / 'das pa'i sangs
153a1(rgyud): rgyas mang po dang / ngas kyang da ltar gsungs pa yin// de nyid sngags ni thams cad kyi// sngags kyi ngo bos rnam par spyod// brtson 'grus che zhing gzi brjid che/ 
153a2(rgyud): sngags kyi don kun sgrub byed pa// cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs byed// skyob pa rnam pa sna tshogs rgyu// 'dzajam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams// rmongs pa spyod cing sems pa med// ma
153a3(rgyud): dang phyin ci log par byed// longs spyod shin tu brkam chags kyis// rdzas rnams ma lus pa dag dang // sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub mi byed// 'khor ba'i mun pa'i brtson rar ni// 
153a4(rgyud): de nyid kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur// gang yang rtag tu yi// dad dag cing // dad ldan bkra shis dag la dga'// da sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang // rtag tu 'dzin dang
153a5(rgyud): 'chang ba dang // bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod// spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni// 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// 
153a6(rgyud): dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste//  sa bon tshwa rgor btab pa la// myu gu skye ba med pa bzhin// dad pa'i rtsa ba rtag tu chos// chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa
153a7(rgyud): ste/ chos don spyod pa de dag la// sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs// de nas sgrub pa pos bzo bo legs par bslab pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/ bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas tshon
153a8(rgyud): ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshen rtsi rnams blangs te/ sngar thag pa la byas pa'i cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyang bar bya ste/ sngar ji/ 
153b1(rgyud): ltar bag pa la byas pa de nyid kyis ras la ri mo 'dri gtsug/ yang na bdag nyid bri bar bya'o// gapur dang / tsan dan dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i dris tshon rtsil bsgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te/ 
153b2(rgyud): sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la yang bzla ste/ me tog nag ge sar dang / pun nA ga na/ bku la dang / pan tsa ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nu shwa ri dang / mA la
153b3(rgyud): ti'i me tog la sogs pas ras de gcal bkram pa byas la// shar du mngon par phyogs ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ blo legs par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la
153b4(rgyud): dmigs pa'i sems phra mo lag par blangs nas 'khrug pa ma dra pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri bar bya'o// dang por re shi gra bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ rnam pa thams
153b5(rgyud): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ skud dpe byad bzang po ban+d+ha/ da nus nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 
153b6(rgyud): kun nas 'od 'bar ba/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa// chos 'chang bzhin pa/ sku dang zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i sdong bu can/ 
153b7(rgyud): 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyis gdan chen po'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/ mdog dkar po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
153b8(rgyud): pa/ mi dang 'dra ba/ phyed sbrul gyi gzugs can/ dga' bo dang / nye dga' bri bar bya'o// kun nas pad+ma'i mtsho pad+ma'i mdab ma dang / me tog cung zad kha bye ba dang / rnam par
154a1(rgyud): kha bye ba dang / chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang / bya dang / nyal sogs pas khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan
154a2(rgyud): 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yan ga las pad+ma'i me tog du ma mthar gyis mtho ba bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogasu pad+ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/ pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
154a3(rgyud): chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dang po la re shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad kha dog pad+ma'i ge sar bzhin du ser skya 'am/ gur gum mam/ gser gyi mdog 'dra ba gan
154a4(rgyud): nu'i cha byad/ byis pa dang / khye'u'i gzugs can/ skra zur bud lnga dang ldan pa/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgya/ na po/ lag pa g.yon pa na ud pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ 
154a5(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ sku mdzes pa zhi ba'i cha byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ bzhin cung zad dgod pa 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas
154a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab pa bri'o// pad+ma gnyis pal 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin tu gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni nor bzangaso// bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam
154a7(rgyud): par sel ba'o// lnga pa ni na mkha' mdzod do// drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o// bdun papa ni sdig mdo// brgyud pa la ni spyan bzang yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad
154a8(rgyud): can gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogasu ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa
154b1(rgyud): byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste/ tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ mgo ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa/ mdog gsar 'dra ba/ ka sha dmar po gyon pa/ dar la dmar
154b2(rgyud): po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ dbyig pa dang spyi'u blugs 'dzin pa/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra'i lpags pa thal gos g.yon par
154b3(rgyud): bgos pa/ lag pa g.yon pas phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ der gtod pa'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no// pad+ma gnyis
154b4(rgyud): pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mdog me tog pri yang gu lta ra sngo bsangs/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas
154b5(rgyud): ba ni bal ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ gzugs mdze/ sa pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum/ pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs 'dam bu'i
154b6(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa// 'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba stos
154b7(rgyud): bcu dang ldan pa ral pa'i mthar skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing cod pan du byas pa/ lag pa g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan
154b8(rgyud): la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o// bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas na bil ba thogs pas
155a1(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas/ 
155a2(rgyud): lus nye bar dkris pa/ mu tig gi phreng bso mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba/ gos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos pa/ dar la dkar po'i snod g.yogs
155a3(rgyud): byas pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po'i na bza' stod g.yogs kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o// cha byed ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin bya'o// de bzhin 'ad+ma/ 
155a4(rgyud): lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po/ drug pa la na blo gros zhi ba/ bdun pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad spyi dpo/ brgyad pa la ni ngan song spong ba ste/ byang chub sems
155a5(rgyud): dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dang / glegs bam lag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi sa shin tu mdzes pa/ dar las stod g.yogs byas pa
155a6(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o// de dag gi steng du yang rang sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
155a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ chos gos dmar po gyon pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa/ rin po che'i ud pa la la 'dug pa/ cha byad zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i phreng bas khyab par me tog dri zhim
155a8(rgyud): pos gcal bkram pa la 'di lta ste/ me tog ma li dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang / pun na ga dang / na gag sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kun nas btsal bkram par
155b1(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAk+Sha thub pa'i g.yon rdzogs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po che du mas nye bar smras pa shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor brag gi tshogs kyis nan/ 
155b2(rgyud): tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i yud pa las shin tu bkab pa/ ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o// gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brlang bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste rin chen gtsug
155b3(rgyud): can rin po che be DUr-I'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/ rin po che pad+ma rA ga dang / in dra nI la dang / margad la sogs pa dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / a sma ga dbya la sogs pa nor bu
155b4(rgyud): rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / bla gos dang ldan pa/ skyil
155b5(rgyud): klung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ na bza' ser po ba nabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus sku nye bar mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i
155b6(rgyud): gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o// gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dab
155b7(rgyud): po kha dog gser 'dre ba bri bar bya'o// gsum pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor pad+ma'i ge sar dang 'dra ba'i chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// bzhi pa spyan bzang po yang bri bar bya'o// lnga pa bsnyen par dka' ba dang / 
155b8(rgyud): drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / bdun pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o// 'di
156a1(rgyud): dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs su bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi steng gi phyogs su g.yas g.yon nas sprin gyi
156a2(rgyud): gseb nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs
156a3(rgyud): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa'i mgo la 'dug pa spangs te bri bar bya ba la 'di lta
156a4(rgyud): ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang 'od srung chen po dang / rab 'byor dang / sgra gcan 'dzin dang / dga' bo dang / bzang ldan dang / ka pi na'o// 
156a5(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas dag kyang 'di lta ste/ spos kyi ngad ldang dang / dman pa dang / nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / dkar po da/ nga / dkar po'i tog dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud bzang
156a6(rgyud): de'o// 'di dag thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i chu byad kyi bdag nyid can/ shin tu dul ba'i cha byad can no// nyan thos chen po bdag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
156a7(rgyud): pa lta ba'o// steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas gos kyi bla re chu zheng yangs pa/ shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 
156a8(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang / phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi phreng ba dang / 
156b1(rgyud): zagu dmang po pad+ma drug dang / in da nI la la sogs pa'i mdud pa byas pa rin po che'i tha gu'i tshogs bya'o// de la yang gos kyi bla shin tu legs par kun nas bkod pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba
156b2(rgyud): 'byung bas/ mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung dang nye ban klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyog su rin po che chen
156b3(rgyud): po'i ri bo pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'thon pa/ rin po che'i myu gu dang / phug dang / ri su li dang / b+hu ru'i yal ga dang / rin po che'i shing gis yong su bskor ba/ drang srong chen po'i gnas
156b4(rgyud): dang / grub pa dag gis de la bsten pa/ ri'i rtse mo'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshing shin tu mi bzang ba'i gzugs can lag pa g.yas pa na zhags pa thogs pa
156b5(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa na gzhu thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer dang lnga/ na pa/ bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyo/ gas te lta ba/ gsus pa 'phyang ba skra gyen du brdzes pa mig
156b6(rgyud): sman nag po dang / sprin nag po dang 'dra ba/ kha spu ser ba/ sen mo ring ba/ mig dmar ba/ mgul ba'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi lpags pa banabs pa/ bgegs
156b7(rgyud): thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rab tu mi bzad pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bar ba khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya'o// ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na
156b8(rgyud): 'dug pa/ lus sa la btud de spos kyi snod lag na thogs pa/ cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin rtags 'dzin pa/ ji ltar rje su 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal/ 
157a1(rgyud): gyi rjes su lta ba'i sgrub pa po bri ba bya'o// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i g.yas ngosu pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par byung ba'i rin po che'i
157a2(rgyud): ri'i rgyal po ji ltar sngar ri'i rgyal por bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed med pa/ lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o// ri de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
157a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o// ri de yang shin tu mtho ba rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba/ bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin rtse mo myu gu 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// de la rten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
157a4(rgyud): phyag gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis da brgyan pa/ dar la dmar pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gos can/ bud med
157a5(rgyud): kyi rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ud pa la thogs pa/ gser gyi kha dog can rkang pa pra ba/ ha nAng yang mi skem/ ha cang yang mi sbom/ ha cang
157a6(rgyud): yang mirgan/ sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/ bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng bas yongasu bskor ba/ der yang baiDUR+Ya rin po che'i rtse mo la shing pun nA ga'i yal gas kun
157a7(rgyud): nas bskor ba/ yal ga dag la yang me tog 'phel zhing kha bye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon par bkab pa/ yal ga mngon par 'dud pa de nyid kyang shin tu kha
157a8(rgyud): dog sna tshogs pa/ byi ru'i myu gu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i tshen 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar bya'o// lha mo bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms// 'jigs
157b1(rgyud): bsel bar byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa po ni srung don du// des na dam pa sbyin zhing dge/ stobs bcu ldan sras thugs rje ni// bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo yin// 'byung po kun gyi
157b2(rgyud): dpal don dang // mchog sprin byed pa bri bar bya// 'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen ni// gzhon nu lha mo 'di la dgyes// bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// sgrub pa pos
157b3(rgyud): kyang yang dag bkur// me yi bdag po srung don dang // dpal sgrub phyir yang ri mor bri// khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin de// ri yi rtse mong bzhag bris pa// bgegs rnams thams
157b4(rgyud): cad gzhig pa'i phyir// rgyal ba mchog dang sras kyis gsu dngas// mi bzang chen po 'khyil pa che/ dag tum chen 'od chen ldan pa po// ma rungs sems can
157b5(rgyud): tshar bcad phyir// sgrub pa la ni rab tu brtags/ sgrub pa po ni srung ba dang // bgegs rnams tham sa cad sel bar byed// mi bzang khro bo'i nga tshul can/ 
157b6(rgyud): sngags kyi lha dag 'gugs par byed// shin tu mi bzang drag po'i gzugs// brtse ba med pa thams cad 'dul// sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams// dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du
157b7(rgyud): byed/ mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang // sa 'og spyod pa thams cad kyi// thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang // ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed// ras ni kun nas
157b8(rgyud): gru bzhi dang // zur bzhi dag tu bri ba yin// ras kyi 'og tu tha mar ni// chu bo rgya che'i gnas bya ste// klu yi gdengs ka yan lag can// gcig ni kun tu bya ba yin// yan lag bzang po dkar po
158a1(rgyud): dang lus byed mi yi rnam par skyes// byang du mgo ni gzhag bya ste// rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa// stobs chen gdengs ka bdun dang ldan// mtha' yas
158a2(rgyud): zhes ni bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta// nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes pa// legs par mdzes dang gzugs mdzes dang // rin chen rgyan gyis yongs brgyan pa'i// 
158a3(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng can bri ba ni// klu rgyal chen por rnam par grags// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu zhugs// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam
158a4(rgyud): gzhig phyir// chu bo la rten bri bar bya// ras kyi cho ga dadam pa 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// / de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gsungs pa// rgyas bstan
158a5(rgyud): ngas ni mdor bsdus yin// mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa// de yi bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar byas pa yi// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa// 
158a6(rgyud): sa steng ri mo mthong ba tsam// de yi mod la 'byang bar byed// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // tshul khrims nyams dang smad pa dang / sdig pa kun la 'jug pa dang // 'khor ba'i mun
158a7(rgyud): par spyod pa dang // 'gro ba'i skye gnas ngan pa dag/ der ni ras ris bzhag mi bya// ras ris mthong ba'ang don ldan zhes// thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin// mthong ba tsam gyis
158a8(rgyud): dag 'gyur te// de bas skad cig de tsam gyis// yid dag lus ni dag 'jug dang // rjesu bzlas pa byed pa dang // sngags brtan nyid la rtag brtson pa'i// mi rnams grub 'dod smos ci dgos// 
158b1(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba sangs rgyas la// mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa// sa steng ras rin 'dri ba ye// sngags pas bsod nams de 'thob 'gyur // gang g.yin bri ma dag/ nang du bstan pa
158b2(rgyud): gang yin pa// de dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rang rgyal dang ni byang chub sems// bse ru nyan thos 'jig rten na// lan mang dag tu mchod ston byas// ras ris mthong ba
158b3(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// mi yis de bzhin bsod nams 'thob// chog klog pa tsam dang ni// mchod dang rjes yi rang ba// cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa// de lnga sngags kyis dngos grub nges/ 
158b4(rgyud): 'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed pa// gang dag rgyal ba / skyes mchog dang // de'i slob bse ru byang chub sem/ sa// bdag nyid chen pos gang gsungs pa// ri mo 'ang
158b5(rgyud): ni mdun bzhag na// sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'a gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sde snod phal detheg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde las 'jam dpal gyi cho ga las
158b6(rgyud): le'u dang po'i cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas 'jam dpa
158b7(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang khyod kyis 'bring gi ras kyi cho ga de ngas bshad par rab tu nyen le yid la zung shig/ dang por re shig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa dang / sngar bstan
158b8(rgyud): pa'i cho ga dang / sngar bstan pa'i gzo bo dang / sngar gyi chang par mdang ldan pa/ ras shin tu babang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / shin tu bkrus pa khatshar dang bcas pa dang / tshon ma 'dres pa dang
159a1(rgyud): ska la sogs pa med par byas la tshad ma gtogs pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du byas pa'i ras de la phyi nas bri bar bya ste/ dang por re shig gnas gtsang ma kun nas mdzes pa/ rin
159a2(rgyud): po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu/ mu tig dkar pos brgyan pa de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa chos 'chad cing bzhugs
159a3(rgyud): pa'o// g.yas phyogs na 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i ge sar ram/ gur gum mam/ nyi ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ g.yon pa'i dpung gi phyogasu ud pa la bsnams shing thal mo sbyar bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya
159a4(rgyud): thub pa la lta ba/ bzhin cung zad dgod pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs/ can/ zur phud lngas mgo mdzes par byas pa/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lnga
159a5(rgyud): da dang mgo 'dud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon logs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston/ mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar ba snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bri bar bya/ 
159a6(rgyud): ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par bya'o// de'i phyogasu 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros chen po dang / zhi bar gshegs pa dang
159a7(rgyud): nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// 'di dag gi steng du
159a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste/ bzhengs pa dang / lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang / skal na bza' ser pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pas chos
159b1(rgyud): gos kyi dkyil nas 'dzin pa/ chos gos kyi kha dog cung zad dmar ba banabs pa/ kun nas 'od dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag pa
159b2(rgyud): skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang / rin chen gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / spyan bzang te/ sangs rgyas bcom
159b3(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mdun du 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / rang sangs
159b4(rgyud): rgyas brgyad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bri ste/ 'on kyang 'phags dpa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab kyis g.yob pa 'greng bag tu
159b5(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dra bar bya'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / 
159b6(rgyud): dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'jam pa dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'od gsal dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / 'og min dang / de la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang
159b7(rgyud): 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag mthar gyis bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par dgod par bya ste/ rang rang gi gzugs dang cha byad du bri bar bya'o// 
159b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi sang ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ras ris kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi phyogs gcig gi mtha' la sgrub pa po che
160a1(rgyud): byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba'i rnam pa dbus mo'i lhang dang mgo btud pa/ spos snod lagran thogs pa bri bar bya'o// rin po che'i ri bo de'i steng 'phags pa 'jam
160a2(rgyud): dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed ji ltar bstan pa de ltar bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung dang
160a3(rgyud): nye ba der rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du lha mo sgrol ma sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// ras ris de'i khor yug tu me tog gtor bar bri bar bya la/ gcal bkram par bya ba la/ me toge tsam
160a4(rgyud): bka dang / ni lod pa la dang / pad+ma dang / dri mchog dang / mdal ti dang / bar shi ka dang / d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang / pun nA ga dang / nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris de
160a5(rgyud): 'khor yug tu gtor ba bya'o// ras ris kyi steng gi mtha'i zur ga/ nyis su me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba/ gzugs rnam parabakra ba/ bar snang la gnas pa/ char 'byin pa'i sprin gyi
160a6(rgyud): nang nas mgo tsam 'thon pa/ lding bzhin pa/ kha dog dkar po bri bar bya'o// ras ris 'bring du gsungs pa 'di// dpal don gnyer las yang dag byung // sa yi steng gi mi rnams la/ 
160a7(rgyud): grub pa 'bring ni 'di la rten// 'khor bar sngan chad 'khor ba na// sdig pa cung zad gang byas pa// 'dir ni ras ris mthong tsam gyis// de yi mod la rnam par 'jig/ 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor ba
160a8(rgyud): sems can rmongs pas mi shes te// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ras ris ni// 'bring po mthong bar mi byed pa'o// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // sdig pa'i rnyog pa byed grung pa// 
160b1(rgyud): sngags rnams sna tshogs gsungs gyur pas// tshul khrims nyams pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// myur du rtogs pa'ang 'grub pa ni// bzlas pas thob par byed pa yin// ras ris 'bring po mthong / 
160b2(rgyud): bas ni// nad pa dag kyang nad las thar// dbul po dag kyang nor thob byed// bud med rnams kyang bu 'thob 'gyur// de tshe mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bsod nams rgya chen thob par 'gyur// 
160b3(rgyud): nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi// bde ba mi yis sten par 'gyur// skye ba gzhan du nges par ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni nges 'thob 'gyur// klog dang 'dri ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin mchod dang // 
160b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal dang // mthong dang reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdi dag pa'i rnyog pa kun las grol// ras ris 'di ni mthu che la// don du gnyer dang bskul bas ni// myur du skye ba don yod
160b5(rgyud): 'thob// rje su yi rang de bzhin no// ras ris mthong ba'i skye bo yi// bsod nams thob pa don yod pa// bskal pa bye ba rnamasu yang // brjod par yang ni mi nuso// / 
160b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga lnga pa ras ris pa 'byam las ras ris gnyis pa'i cho ga rab 'byam rdzog so// 
160b7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang khyod kyis ras ris gsum pa'i cho ga rab tu
160b8(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sems can rnams la 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang / cho ga dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam thad kar de bzhin
161a1(rgyud): du kun nas zur bzhi snga ma bzhin du ras la ri mo bya'o// sngar bstan pa'i tshon gyis dang po re shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i khril bzhugs pa/ snga ma
161a2(rgyud): bzhin du byis pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i gzugs can/ 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan pa chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la gnas
161a3(rgyud): pa/ rnga yab lag na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yas
161a4(rgyud): phyogasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin rin po che'i ri la gnas la/ rnga yab leg na thogs pa / lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma 'dzin pa/ lus kun nas 'od
161a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o// seng ge'i khri'o 'og tu rin po che'i ri ras kyi mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o// ras kyi ma tha' ma dang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i
161a6(rgyud): khri'i 'og g.yas phyogasu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu sgul po snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ spos snod lag na thogs pa thams cad kyang snga ma
161a7(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bri bar bya ste/ rin po che'i ri'i pug sor bcu drug gi chad
161a8(rgyud): tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa/ ri'i stod kyi cha khang pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi khor yug tu ri'i rnam pas yongasu 'khor bar bri bar bya'o// steng gi ras kyi mtha'
161b1(rgyud): gnyis la gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la lding ba bzhin du me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing ras la
161b2(rgyud): me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa yang bri bar bya'o// rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni// thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las// 'di ni tha ma zhes bya ste// phan tshegs
161b3(rgyud): las rnams dag la shis// bskal pa bye bar mi bzad las// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni// skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
161b4(rgyud): bye ba stong phrag ni// mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te/  ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag la// blo
161b5(rgyud): dang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas// ras ris tha ma mtho nga ba ni// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// sang / sa rgyas skyob pa kun la ni// mchod byas bsod nams
161b6(rgyud): gang yin pa// mkhas pas bsod nams gang thob de// ras ris tha ma mthong ba'i yin// dge ba dag gi las rnams la// longs spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do// sngags
161b7(rgyud): rnams gang dag ci yod pa// tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang // na mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang // chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang // nor sprin sogs dong srin po dang / 
161b8(rgyud): lha min dbang po lto 'phye dang // zla ba rlung dang gshin rje sogs// khyab 'jug lha chen sogs bshad pa// sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug pa dag/ ras ris mdun du dngos grub 'gyur// 
162a1(rgyud): 'dir ni ni pabya ba ste// de bzhin du ni rgyas pa bya// 'dir ni mngon spyod spang bya ste// thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che/ 
162a2(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa las 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u drug pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las ras ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzog so// 
162a3(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
162a4(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin dgashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs legs
162a5(rgyud): so// rig pa thams cad kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rte/ na la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa'
162a6(rgyud): rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa// phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub
162a7(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyuraro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten
162a8(rgyud): gyi bla ma 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 
162b1(rgyud): 'phags pa nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis nub par gyur pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par 'jig pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / rigs pa thams cad dang / sngags
162b2(rgyud): dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che med pa dang / skye bo dam pa rnams kyis 'jig rten na yongasu ma zin pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang / 
162b3(rgyud): dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang / mi srun pa dang / mi dge ba'i shes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / slu ba spyod pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par gyur to// 
162b4(rgyud): le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par mi 'gyur la/ 'dod pa tshe la zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// log pa'i lta bi skye zhing bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar 'gyur// mtshams med par
162b5(rgyud): gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzad pa 'thob/ pa sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang / dbang med pa la dang/ nga du bya ba'i don dang / dbang du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa sbyin
162b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir dang / thabs mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba sngags kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
162b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa lag so leg so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi mchog
162b8(rgyud): tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs sprod pa'i le'u ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam yod de/ snying po mchog rnams kyi don mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams cad kyi cho gar gyur pa drug po 'di dag yi
163a1(rgyud): gadrug gi snying po'i mchog the tsom med pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gdul ba'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag par rab tu zhugs
163a2(rgyud): pa'i phyir dang / nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs shing da ltar yang ngas bshad de/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i tshogs la phan pa'i phyir
163a3(rgyud): legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de gang zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngags gsungs pa/ oM bAkye rA dza ya/ oM bAM kye she sha sra/ oM bAtsa
163a4(rgyud): baM dza ya/ oM bA kye niSh+Ta ya/ oM bA kye ya na maHoM bAkyed da na maHde ltar 'di dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod da kyi sngags drug dang / yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs
163a5(rgyud): mnyam pa/ snying po dam pa mchog tu grub pa/ sangs rgya sa bzhin du 'byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs pa dam
163a6(rgyud): tshig nyams pa dang / dam tshig g.yos pa rnams kyi las thams cad byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam rje su ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ mchog dang
163a7(rgyud): 'bring dang / tha ma gsum la rab tu sbyor ba/ legs par spangs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa sbyin pa/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus su yang dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// las kyi
163a8(rgyud): tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la skad cig don sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag myur du shin tu myur bar de'i tshe dang / de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyuraro// nyams sad pa'i phyir yang snying
163b1(rgyud): podam pa 'di dag bsgrub par bya ste/ mdor na ji lnga ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas ras ris kyi cho ga 'di bya ba yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang / snyigs
163b2(rgyud): ma la sems can bsid nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ grags pa chung ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / longs spyod chung bas shin tu rgya che ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa la
163b3(rgyud): sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te/ de dag gi phyir shin tu mdor bstan par bya'o// dang por re shig dpa' bo'i tshong gis dag bsrang gcig gam/ srang phyed kyis nyes la/ chur khru gang zheng du khru byed tsam
163b4(rgyud): gyi ras kha tshar dang bcas pa thag pa 'thag tu gzhug go/ yang dan ska med pa'i ras kyi dum bu sar pa gzhan steng dang 'og tu ji da ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis dang / bzhi dang / drag dang
163b5(rgyud): bcu dang / brgyad pa'i ras blangs te ji ltar 'dod pa'i ri mo mkhan gyi pi bri bar bya'o// tshon ma 'dres pa dang / tsanang/ na dang / ga pur dang / gur gum gyis bsgos te/ ras
163b6(rgyud): kyang tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum gcig tu byas pa srog chags med pa'i chu rdul med pa dang bsres te/ snod sar pa'i nang du bkrus la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste bzhag nas
