241b7(rgyud): sems ldan rnams// tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur// mgo dang lag dang nab so dang // de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang // nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la// sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur
241b8(rgyud): na// mag nga rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing // de bzhin yul mi dag la'ang gnod// blon po nad 'jigs shes par bya// 'ching dang nyon mongs grong khyer 'gyur// lha mtshams dang ni sbyin
242a1(rgyud): dag la/ sgra gcan gyis zin kun la snang // de tshe nad rnams kun tu 'gro// yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung // bsad dang 'ching dang nyon mongs
242a2(rgyud): dang / gnod pa rnam du ma byung // 'ching dang gzhan gyi dmag tshogs ni// skye bo'i gtso la de dag skye// chu stod dang ni gro zhin dang // de bzhin chu smad kho na la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus
242a3(rgyud): gnas dang // zla ba la ni dmar bar snang // gza' ni 'dzin par snang gyur pa// rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur// gro zhin mon ga rgyu skar dang // de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang // gang tshe mon
242a4(rgyud): gre dag la ni// gal te nyi zla gzas zin te// gza' ni 'byung bar shes gyur na// kha dog nag pa la brten nas// myang don chen po nyon mongs dang // mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni// 
242a5(rgyud): yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang // rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jig/ sa chen 'byung // nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni// gang tsho khru mas smad dag la ni// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// 
242a6(rgyud): nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na// nub phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin// ma ga d+ha ni mi yi bdag/ sems can rgyal po'i thabs nyams par// zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur// rtag tu sgra gcan 'gro
242a7(rgyud): ba yin/ mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa yin// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa// de dang de yi phyogs dag tu// dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur// gang nyid
242a8(rgyud): sa steng 'gul ba ni// 'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag/ dge dang mi dge de dang der// de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya// khug rna ser ba mjug rings ni// nyi ma lnga yi bar du yod// 
242b1(rgyud): de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung // ngogs las spyod cing gnas pa yin// yul mi thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing // nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba yin// byang phyogs gang ga'i 'gram gyi ni// rgyal po dag kyang
242b2(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhi khe ba can gyi dbus// bgrod dkar khrang khrod la gnas dang // sa yi bdag po la gnas dang // khor yug na rtse rje dang // byang phyogs gang ga'i 'gram dag na// de tshe 'gra
242b3(rgyud): spyod bdag po dag/ mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis// skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur// rgyu skar gang las 'gul ba// de la khug rna yang dag bstan// phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni// 
242b4(rgyud): mi bzang 'od ni spangs pa dang // nyin zhag lnga yi bar du ya dang // rtag tu nyin zhag mang por ni// phan tshun chos ni mi mthong dang // mi yi spyod yul mthong ba min// mi rnams
242b5(rgyud): dag ni phan tshun du// der ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin// der ni 'jig rten 'byung bar shes// rgyal po yul 'khor ba ces te 'jig/ skar mda' khor yug dag tu ni// gang dag
242b6(rgyud): las kyis byung gyur pa// phyogs kyi mthar ni rab snang ba// gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yin// mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang // bya rog gal te mdab ma dkar// dkar ba'am yang na kha
242b7(rgyud): dog nag/ yang na dkar dang nag par mthong // phyin log 'dab chags kha dog dang // phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang / phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod// gang du de ni 'jigs chen 'byung dag
242b8(rgyud): rkang pa bzhi nyid dang // rkang med dang ni rkang mangs dang // mdab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams// phyin ci log 'gyur 'jigs chen 'byung // khyi ni gyen du gdong bltas te// yang
243a1(rgyud): dang yang du zugs 'gyur ba// nyin par ram ni mtshan mo ru// gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung // de ltar rnam pa du ma dang // rnam mang gang du rab brtags
243a2(rgyud): pa// der ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal po'i tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig/ ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni// dge dang mi dga'i srog chags yin// de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa// dge
243a3(rgyud): dang mi dge byed pa yin// sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa// rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste// rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i// bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i
243a4(rgyud): cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shi dan tu rgyas pa'i mdo las skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes dpa'i le'u rab 'byam las bco brgyad pa rdzog so// / 
243a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gza' dang rgyu skar dang / skar ma dang / skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gza' dang rgyu skar gyi
243a6(rgyud): tshogs khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ sngags dang / rgyud dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor
243a7(rgyud): dang / cho ga rnams dang / bzlas pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / rig pa grub pa la 'jug pa dang / rigs pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi cho ga dang / rgyu skar gyi spyod pa dang / rtsis mngon par shes/ 
243a8(rgyud): pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der gegs ma byed cig/ bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de la srung ba gyis shig/ sems
243b1(rgyud): can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig/ bstan par gyis shig/ thams cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan pa la
243b2(rgyud): rnam par bzhag par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
243b3(rgyud): gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
243b4(rgyud): na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i ga zhal med khang na bzhugs pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir
243b5(rgyud): nye bar lhags par gyur to// bsam gyis mi khyab pi sangs rgyas nye bar lhags pa/ rang rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos
243b6(rgyud): te/ gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che// 'jig rten nams la'ang phan pa'i phyir// sngags rgyud cho ga ji lta bar// sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir// 
243b7(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// gtso mchog yi ge gcig pa ni// dus nyams rtsod pa'i dus dag tu// sngags rnams kun gyi
243b8(rgyud): rab mchog ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// gtsug tor rgyal po stobs po che// 'byung po kun ni bzlog par byed// gza' dang rgyu skar ma mo rnams/ 
244a1(rgyud): ma rungs sems ldan 'gog par byed// 'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang // de bzhin gzhan yang gdug sems ldan// sems can rnams ni rjes
244a2(rgyud): gzung dang // zlos pa rnams ni bde bya'i phyir// bstan pa 'di la chog mchog/ stobs chen 'khor los bsgyur ba yin// gtsug tor rgya mo mthu bo che// kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni/ 
244a3(rgyud): gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gsungs// de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas rnams// mi gsungs par ni bzhugs par gyur// de nas sangs rgyas 'dus
244a4(rgyud): bde rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad snod kyi 'ji ga rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la/ sangs rgyas
244a5(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur te/ snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams
244a6(rgyud): cad ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang
244a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
244a8(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs su gsol/ yi ge gcig pa 'di ni rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gong nas gong du gnas
244b1(rgyud): pa/ bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cho ga yang ngas bshad par bya'o// bstan
244b2(rgyud): pa nub pa'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba de bstan pa 'di la srung ba gcig pur 'gyur zhing du sa thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/ sangs
244b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus chod la 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro// yi ge gcig po 'di la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
244b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par 'gyuraro// kye/ lha'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad nyon cig/ b+h+rUM/ bcom ldan 'di ni thams cad mkhyen// sangs/ 
244b5(rgyud): rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas// ston pa thug sa rje che dang ldan// sems can kun la rnam par spyod// sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan// gtsug
244b6(rgyud): tor las byung bstan pa yin// snying rje'i dbang la brten nas ni// 'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni// 'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas/ 
244b7(rgyud): ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni// skye bo rnams la sku gdung gyur// 'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas// zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du// dam chos sku gdung dag tu
244b8(rgyud): bstan// 'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu// sku ni zang zing bcas par gsungs// thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med// zang zing bcas dang zang zing med// 'jig rten rgyur ni
245a1(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// chos kyi dbyings la bsten nas ni// thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// sngags kyi
245a2(rgyud): tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen// sa steng 'di la snang ba yin// sems can rnams kyi sngags grub pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs
245a3(rgyud): pa yin// sngags 'di yongasu mdor bsdu na// rang gi cho gas 'di bzlas na// sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur// 'di yi cho ga mdor bsdus
245a4(rgyud): nas/ dus su yang ni bshad par bya// dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du// de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa na// / de yi dus su cho ga 'grub// sngags 'grub par ni gsungs
245a5(rgyud): pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyi sgra ra ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal
245a6(rgyud): ba/ sngags thams cad kyi bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis don du gnyer ba/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas/ yang
245a7(rgyud): mdor na re shig dang por bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las dpag tshad lnga'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad kyang nus pa med par
245a8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
245b1(rgyud): sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyi grub pa 'phrog par byed cing gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcad pa dang / bcom pa dang / phur bus btab pa yang thar bar byed do// bdag gis
245b2(rgyud): gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par 'dod na rtswa ku sha sngon po chang ba gang blangs pa len brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad na rig pa gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad
245b3(rgyud): pa de gcod par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan byas te 'dis seng ldeng gi bur pas snying la btab na gnad la bab par 'gyur ro// leb rgan du btsos pa'i skud pa la lan bdun bzlas
245b4(rgyud): brjod byas te mdud pa bor na bcings par 'gyur ro// 8/ kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te kha/ da bkab pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro// mtshon chas
245b5(rgyud): snying dum bu gnyis su byas na gnyi su 'gas par 'gyur ro// rke rtse la dug dang khrag gis btab pas bsku ba byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// kar bi ra'i lcug mas
245b6(rgyud): kun tu rdebs na gnod par 'gyuraro// gzhan gyi rig pa thams cad la mngon spyod bya ba ni ci dgar byar rung ngo // sngar gsungs pa'i las thams cad la 'o mas khrus byas nas
245b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyuraro// mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams brtan pa byas par yang 'gyur ro// khu tshur bcings pas sngags thams cad
245b8(rgyud): rengs par 'gyuraro// yid kyis ni dgrol bar bsam pas dkrol bar 'gyur ro// sngags sgrub par 'dod pas kyang 'di nyid kyis bcing ba byas te 'grub par bya'o// 
246a1(rgyud): chog gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyi das bsgrub pa dbyara'o// sngags sgrub pa dang / 'did kyi sngags kyis spya drangs pa bya ba 'ang / yang skar gshegs su/ 
246a2(rgyud): gsol bar bya ba yin no// gang 'di nyid kyis sru ring bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro// gang gis sngags 'di ma grub pa ma lan mtho na 'di nyid dang ldan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na myur du 'grus
246a3(rgyud): bram lan thob cing / gal te mgrub pam lan ma byin na de ring po ma thogs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur// sngags gang la dmigs te/ zho dang / snang rtsi dang mar gyis til la btags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin/ 
246a4(rgyud): sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di dbang du 'gyur zhing gang brjod pa de'i las byed par 'gyur ba'am lan thob par 'gyuraro// lnga dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang shing gi yam
246a5(rgyud): gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du'/ ra ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na mngar gsum sbyin sreg bya'o// dri za dang dri za mo thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na
246a6(rgyud): shing mya ngan med pa dang / pri yang ku'i yam shing ngam/ me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dang / klu mo'i gdon rnams la ni skye tses bya'o// rgyal po rnams la ni
246a7(rgyud): yungs kar gyis bya'o// bram ze rnams la ni me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o// rje'u rigs la ni zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar gyis bya'o// rmangs rigs la ni phub ma'i rdul gyis bya'o// bud med la
246a8(rgyud): ni lan tshwa'i sbyin bsreg bya'o// gdol pa la ni mon sran gro'u dang dza pu li ka'i sbyin bsreg bya'o// bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni 'bras yos kyis sbyin bsreg bya'o// sems can thams cad la ni ma
246b1(rgyud): dang til gyis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du byed do// thams cad du yang dus gsum du zhag bdun bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal ba'i mchog cang mi gsung bar gyur to// thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'a
246b2(rgyud): ni/ de che lha yi tshogs la gsungs// 'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang // de che de ni chags brel blos// de tshe thub pa mchog gis ni// sangs rgyas sras pa thu bo lha// byang chub sems dpe' rdzu
246b3(rgyud): 'phrul tshe// 'jam dpal la ni de ci gsungs// lA yi na blo ldan pa// mgon po la khor ba'i bdag po la// chog don tu che bas// gang gi bskal pa nga du yang // rgyal bas kyang ni bsad mi
246b4(rgyud): mi rnams la ni ban pa'i byer// tshig yos ni phyogs ga ma// mdang bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// de tshe sad gsungs nas ni// dpal ldan 'ad ma dbyangs rdzu 'bru / 
246b5(rgyud): gtsang ma gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de la'/ srung bar byed// gsungs shig gsungs shis / rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dus mthar 'jigs
246b6(rgyud): pa'i dus su ni// mi rnams bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir// mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste// gzi brjid chen po 'di yi ni// ras ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur// myur du ras ris 'grub pa gsungs// 
246b7(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho go byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las yi ge gcig pa 'khor los bsgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byam las bcu
246b8(rgyud): dgu pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ 
247a1(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/ mdor na yi ge gcig pa 'khor los bsgyur brdzu 'phrul chen po'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur
247a2(rgyud): brgya che ba ni sngar bstan to// de ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur zhing shes rab chung ba dang / yid gzhu ngas po dman pa'i phyir ras ris kyi tshad rgya che ba'i
247a3(rgyud): sbyor bsgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par bya ste/ sgrub pa mchog byed
247a4(rgyud): por 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba dag la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'a
247a5(rgyud): lo rab tu bskor ba// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu/ dam pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ de bzhin ga shegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i mchog chos
247a6(rgyud): 'chad pa kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o// 'og tu ni tshangs pa dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje/ steng du ni phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis/ 'og tu sgrub pa po de'i
247a7(rgyud): mdun du dus gsum du a ga ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas las su bya ba ni dang po'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin le sa rtsibs
247a8(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo byas te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ga ru'i du pas gdug cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o// tha mar zla ba nya/ 
247b1(rgyud): bal mchod pargya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// gang gis mthong ba
247b2(rgyud): de dang lhan cig na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas gdugs sgrub par 'dod na gdugs kha dog sna tshogs pa sar pa byas la/ gser gyi 'khor los mtshan pa/ ka shi ka'i gos
247b3(rgyud): 'phyang ba de nyid kyi cho gas mgo la gdugs bzung ba byas te/ bzlas pa byas na rig pa rang nyid nye bar bzhugs par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a
247b4(rgyud): ga ru'i dud pas bdugs te/ 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas da la tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas la dag pas bzung ste/ ji srid rab tu 'ber ba'i bar du bzlas
247b5(rgyud): pabya'o// de thogs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// zla ba re re zhing zla ba nya ba dang 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
247b6(rgyud): 'di grub pa tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da pa' thams cad ma
247b7(rgyud): par dgyes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su bsngags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba
247b8(rgyud): stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur bsgrub par 'dod ni gser dang / dngul dang zangs ma dang / nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyig pa
248a1(rgyud): khrug tsam byas la/ ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas de blangs na na mkha' la 'gro ste/ thams cad la chos ston par 'gyur
248a2(rgyud): bskal pa chen por 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// ci te bum pa bzang po sgrub par 'dod na gser gyi bum pa bzang po byas la 'bru thams cad dang / rin po che dang / sman gyis yongs su bkang la ras
248a3(rgyud): dkar pos bcings te/ de la sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams ni gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lag pa rab tu bcug na ci 'dod pa
248a4(rgyud): de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyuraro// ci ste nor bu rin po che sgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyig pa 'am/ nor dbu bzang po dang / shel gyi nor bu byas te/ gos 'phyang bar
248a5(rgyud): byas la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubs na gang bsams pa de tham sa cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i nang du thob/ sa pa med cing stobs dang pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// ci ste btso
248a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rang gi lus kyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'gyur ro// gzhan gang yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gdugs
248a7(rgyud): dkar po la sogs pa de yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyuraro// de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug te gas
248a8(rgyud): gyi rtog pa'i chogs ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po ma thogs par 'grub par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas
248b1(rgyud): na thams cad la 'grub par 'gyur ba rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi bdagra po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// ci ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na tsan dan dmar po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'am yang
248b2(rgyud): nalcags bzang po la byas te/ ba'i rnam ldes bkrus la yar gyi ngor bco lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing me ra gyi mar me brgya sbar la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/ sangs rgyas
248b3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ gzi brjid phung po'am/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i sngags 'dis srung ba byas la
248b4(rgyud): 'khor gyi nang du grogs la yang srung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ thun dang po 'das shing thu na gnyis pa la nye bar 'dug ste/ sems rtsa gcig pas ji
248b5(rgyud): srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o// skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa lha dang / klu dang /  nod sbyin thams cad 'dus te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po
248b6(rgyud): thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de dag rig pa 'dzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// lus phyag
248b7(rgyud): na rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro// skad cig gis 'og min gyi lha'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyuraro// bo skal par gnas par 'gyur ro// 
248b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pa mthong zhing chos nyan par 'gyur// shi nas gang du 'dod par der skye bar 'gyuraro// gal te phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du yang skye bar 'gyur ro// 
249a1(rgyud): ci snre la gri sgrub par 'dod na skyon med pa'i ral gri blangs nas nyin zhag gcig bsrung bar bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po
249a2(rgyud): byas nas ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de grub na g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// skrarna cha gdubaskor dang 'dra bar 'khyil ba dang / 
249a3(rgyud): lo bcu drug pa'i cha byad can dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ci ste ldong ros sgrub par 'dod
249a4(rgyud): na dpa' bo'i tshong gis nyos te rgyal dang ldan pa'i dus su zhag ga/ sum bsnyung ba byas te/ dge slong bzang po'i dge 'dun la bshos drangs nas bka' lung stsa la bar bskul
249a5(rgyud): lo// sgrub pa po la der rje su gnang nas rang gi gnas su zhugs te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me spong rab tu sbar nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba
249a6(rgyud): byas la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed nas bdag nyid phul te/ ldong ros blangs nas ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de ji srid du bzlas pa byas te/ dro ba dang / 
249a7(rgyud): du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bas sngar gang bsams pa nyid du grub par 'gyur te/ dro bar gyur pas dpral bar thig le byas na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
249a8(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can bran du 'gyur zhing gang cung zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// lo sdang
249b1(rgyud): gibang du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dub 'phrul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'don lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ba gyu // skad cig zang cig smang / 
249b2(rgyud): tsam la snang zhing yang mi snang bar 'gyuraro// mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing lo sum stong gi bar du 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// 'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ g.yog
249b3(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ lha gzhon nu'i lusu 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis kyang mi thub par 'gyur na rig pa
249b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te bskal par ya dang gnas par 'gyuraro// dus byis nas dga' da ldan gyi lha'i rigasu skye bar 'gyuraro// tsi ste mdung rtse
249b5(rgyud): gsum sgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po las byas pa'i mthu nga rtse gsum pa byas te lo'i bar du bzlas par bya 'i// de nas bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten khrug
249b6(rgyud): tsam gyi tshad byas te de la mchod pa chen po byas shing gtor ma rgya chen po btang la log pa g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa blangs la skyil mo krung bcas nas ji srid du spros pa na 'od zer
249b7(rgyud): stong byung ba de'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas/ skabs 'dir dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang / lnga
249b8(rgyud): thams cad kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// de nas de thams cad kyis yongasu bskor nas gang dag gis mthong ba dang / gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig tu na mkha' la 'dra/ 
250a1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rig 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mag gsum par 'gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po gnyis pa dang 'dra ba'o// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis phyag byas
250a2(rgyud): shing bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur la/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ltung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur
250a3(rgyud): na rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shi 'phos nas bde ba can skye bar 'gyuraro// ci ste ri langs sgrub par 'dod na yan lag rma med pa'i skyes bu'i ro blangs te seng lding gi bur ba bzhi
250a4(rgyud): btab la/ drang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing ma chod na de'i lce'i rtse mo la nor bu rin po che snang bar 'gyur te/ de blangs na rig po 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// 
250a5(rgyud): mtshon gang dag yid la bsams pa tsam gyis de dag 'byung ba 'gyur ro// 'od dpag tshad brgya tsam du snang bar 'gyu/ ro// 'dod na dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod
250a6(rgyud): pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu yang rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar yang 'gyuraro// shi 'phos nas kyang dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su
250a7(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ro// ro langs gnyis pa sgrub pa ni rnga med pa'i lus kyi blangs te rmya shug gi shing gi phur bus btab la// de'i khar lcags kyi phye mas gtor zhing byin na de'i lce 'byin par 'gru
250a8(rgyud): taM/ de bcad na g.yog 'khor brgya dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ bar gyi bskal par gnas par 'gyung // ri rab kyi mor rtse zhing dga' bar 'gyungagang gi tsho 'tsho de
250b1(rgyud): phyogs gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro// ci ste lcags kyu sgrub pa 'dod na rdza ku sha'i rang bzhin gyi lcags kyu byas te/ 'thab mo pa mdog nag po'i lag pa'i mthil gyis pa'i rnam lngas bkrus te mtshan mo
250b2(rgyud): gcig bsnyung ba byas nas lcags kyu gang gi tshad du byas la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyag na rdo rje la mar gyi mar me brgya sbar bar bya'o// rdo rje lcags kyu dang / bdag nyid la gdugs
250b3(rgyud): dkar pos bsrungs par bya'o// gzi brjid phung pos ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o// phur bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor la phur bus btab na 'og tu bcing
250b4(rgyud): ba byas shing gnas yongs su gzung ba byas par yang 'gyuraro// // de nas thun gnyis pa la rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis skyil mo kru dang bcas la lcags kyu la me tog dang / dI dang / bdug
250b5(rgyud): pas mchod na de srung ba byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas ska bas 'dir lcags kyu lag pas bzung nas ji srid du dmyal
250b6(rgyud): ba'i sems can rnams 'tshe ba nye bar zhi sa du bzlas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba la
250b7(rgyud): thogs pa med pa lcags kyu lagan thogs pa/ lha thams cad dang / klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa yang thag ring po nyid nas mthong na phyag 'tshal bar byed do// bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ 
250b8(rgyud): gang gi tshe 'chi bdo'i che phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro zhing phyag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyuraro// gal te ras res sgrub par gyur na da 'bar ba na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod kyang ngo'i
251a1(rgyud): sngags kyi ming bzung la 'bum bzla zhing de nas nub gcig bsrung ba byas te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ shing ar+tha'i me rab tu snang te te la dag la
251a2(rgyud): zho dang mar gyis gtags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na sbyin sreg gi mthar 'ongs nas nor gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur zhing mngag gzhug pa dbang du byed pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 
251a3(rgyud): ci ste dbang phyug chen po dbang du byed par 'dod na dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ lho phyogasu yud tsam gyis shing arga'i me rab tu sbar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pa na
251a4(rgyud): ha ha zhes pa'i sgra byung bar gyur na 'jigs par mi bya// de de nas de 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// dbang phyug chen po'i rig pa thams cad bdag
251a5(rgyud): la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / mchog gang 'dra da pa de ster bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang
251a6(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa yang 'gug par 'gyur te/ mchog dang 'dod pa de yang 'di bzhin te/ cho ga 'di bzhin du byas la legs par bsrung ba yang bya'o// ci ste gnod sbyin mo dgug par
251a7(rgyud): 'dod na de'i ming bzung la zhag bdun du shing mya ngan med kyi me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'ong zhing mchog ster bar byed// zhag bdun gyis ma dang / sring mo dang / chung ma gang 'dod pa de'i cha byad du
251a8(rgyud): nges par 'ong bar 'gyuraro// ci ste mi 'ong na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro// klu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na klu shing gi me tog gis cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o// srin po dgug par 'dod na zla ba gsu
251b1(rgyud): duno dang 'bras can gyi sbyin bsreg bya'o// sbyin bsreg gi mthang nag gcig bsnyung ba byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing gnod sbyin la gtor mtshan rnams sbyin par byas shing gnod sbyin dgug pa
251b2(rgyud): bya'o zhes yid la byed cing a mra'i shing gis yom shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi btags pa steng rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na skabs 'dir lus ngan po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur la/ 
251b3(rgyud): de dag la shing arga'i me tog gi mchod yon byin na de dag ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// des brjod par bya ba ni nyin ra zhing gnod sbyin lung bzhin du byed pa dgos so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des
251b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin re re ster bar 'gyuraro// des lung bsgo bar bya ba ni dpag tshad brgya nas bud med rnams 'dir 'ong b.ragyis la// tho rangs de nyid du khyer cig ces pa dang / 'khor
251b5(rgyud): brgya la yang 'bras chan byin cig ces brjod na// rgyab tu khu nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing khyer bar 'gyur ro// lung stsal ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ci ste phyag na rdo rje
251b6(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod na bzhi gyur dang / bdun gyur gyi sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ cho 'phral gyi zla byed po ma lus pa la rab tu rgya che ba'i mad byu pa sred pa pa'i ba du ste/  banya ba'i bar du mchod pa byas la dge slong gi dge 'dun
251b7(rgyud): khyad par can dag bshos gsol nas/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin la rje su yi reng bar byed du gzhug go// de nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dang po'i thun 'das te/ gnyis pa'i thun la skyil mo
251b8(rgyud): kruklung bcas te 'dug la/ sems rtse gcig pas rdo rje 'dzin blta bar bya'o zhes sems la kun tu brtags te/ gu gul gyi ri lu rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyis mtshan mo thun gcig tu sbyin
252a1(rgyud): bsreg bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bskyod par 'gyur zhing sa 'gul ba dang / sprin gyi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams
252a2(rgyud): cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rig pa thams cad kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal pos yongs
252a3(rgyud): su bskor ba byon par 'gyur/ lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za dang / mi'am cis byang chub sems dpa' yongasu bskor ba byon par 'gyur// 
252a4(rgyud): de'i mod la dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi shin tu drag pa'i tshor pa'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// dri'i chus/ mchod yon dbul zhing phyag 'tshal te 'dug par bya'o// de
252a5(rgyud): nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa ni mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid nas/ sa 'og tu 'gro ba 'am/ rgyal srid dam/ mi snang bar 'gro ba 'am/ 
252a6(rgyud): gang 'dod pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das las thob par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo ris bsgyur ba nyid dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rdo rje sku dang / 
252a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba dang / bsams pa tsam gyis mtshan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen po'i gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'grur
252a8(rgyud): ro rig 'dzin pa gzhan dag gi yang cho ga 'di bzhin te/ mdor na phyag na rdo rje'i tshig gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi chog gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan
252b1(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / tshangs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa gang
252b2(rgyud): yin pa de dag kyang 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags gang gis sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub pa ni 'dis lus la bzlas pa byas na nub bdun gyis nges par mthong ba spyi na par byed// 
252b3(rgyud): ci ste mi sbyin na ni rnam par nyams par 'gyuraro// dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i mdun du gal te zlos pa byed na nub bdun gyi nang du mthong ba sbyin par byed do// gal te sbyin par mi byed
252b4(rgyud): na mgo tshal pa bdun phrag gsum du 'gas par 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa na mar dang / shu dag dang nga/ mig sman dang / dag byed dang / sro shing dang / mchod phyir
252b5(rgyud): thogs dang / babla dang / ldong ros la sogs pa bsgrub par bya 'o// ci ste rdzas rnams sgrub par 'dod na ldong res blangs te mo'i 'o ma dang por byas la ril bu lngang bya zhing / ag
252b6(rgyud): ru'i snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug cing yungs kar dang lha na cig bsgrub pa bya'o// zla ba dang nyi ma ge zas 'dzin pa'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas te/ gang gi tshe yungs kar tsi ti tsi ti zhe sgra 'don
252b7(rgyud): pa de'i tshe grub pa dang po yin te/ skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ de'i tshe 'di thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur te/ gang smras pa de thams cad byed do// ci ste du ba 'thul bar byed ni mi sna
252b8(rgyud): bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni lha gzhon nu'i gzugasu 'gyur zhing nyi ma 'char ka'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa
253a1(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du gi ru wang dang / babral sogs pa la yang bsgrub par bya'o// ci ste rigs/ 
253a2(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod na lig pu mig dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / ru rta dang / tsan dan dag gcig tu byas te/ zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la/ zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su ji srid du ba 'thul pa de srid
253a3(rgyud): kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// ci ste ral gri sgrub par 'dod
253a4(rgyud): na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras daris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang / gtor ma btang zhing sru dang ba byas la/ ral gri lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ ji
253a5(rgyud): srid 'od 'pho ba dang / 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas nag la te 'od 'pho na ni rig pa 'dzin pa gcig pur 'gyuraro// 'bar bas ni de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / 
253a6(rgyud): stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa dang / gang gis mthong ba dang / gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po'i rang
253a7(rgyud): bzhin las rdo rje bya ste/ sor bcu drug pa rtse mo gnyis ka yang rtse gsum pa tsan dan dmar pos byugs la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla byed kyi tshes nas brtsams nas ra~M sa ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te
253a8(rgyud): bzlas pa bya zhing tshes nas nyi ma re re zhing re res bskyed pa'i dge slong dag la bshos drang bar bya'o// tha mar nub gsum bsnyung ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du ras ris rab tu
253b1(rgyud): bzhag cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ mar gyi mar me brgya rab tu spa shing ku sha ri khres la nye bar 'dug par bya'o// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la ji srid 'bar bde'i bar du bzlas pa byas shing / de ba
253b2(rgyud): na 'khor dang bcas pa namakha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyung / phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ ba rol gnon par 'gyung / bskal pa chen po 'tsho bar 'gyur
253b3(rgyud): lus ni gnas phragan rdo rje gan su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mdung rtse dang / 'khor mo dang / mad dang / mdung la sogs pa mtshan thams ca dang / mchil ldam dang / sa shing dang / 
253b4(rgyud): thogs la sogs gzhan gyi cho ga bya bas bsgrub par bya zhing thams kyidad kyang grub pa rnam pa gsum yin no// zhi ba byed par 'dod pa la pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thab khung byas la/ mchod
253b5(rgyud): sprin la 'os pa'i yan lag gis me rab tu spang la glags gzar gyis zas mchog dang / no dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang spu ba'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag gsum byas na bdag dang gnan
253b6(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis ni grong ngamagrong khyer gyi 'chi ba mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur// shing sha ma'i yam shing la zhod ngo / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang
253b7(rgyud): bya'o// yang na shing u dum pa ra'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o// char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar gsum gyis sbyin sreg byas na thams
253b8(rgyud): cad du mchog tu zhi bachen por 'gyur ro// slongs mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed kyi zlo ba nya'i bar du nub gsum bsrung ba byas la/ zla ba gzas zin pa na ba nag mo'i 'o ma la lan brgya
254a1(rgyud): rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis len gyi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyuraro// rtsa dUr ba'i 'dzag ma la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btag
254a2(rgyud): pas stong rtsa brgyad nub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan dang / dung la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na mthong ba dang / thos
254a3(rgyud): pas pha rol gyi sde dpung gi mi g.yo bar byas par 'gyur ro// bum pa sar pa 'bru thams cad dang / spros chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis gtses shing zin
254a4(rgyud): pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di sa dbang bskur na sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang gdon gyis las rnams kyang byed par 'gyu
254a5(rgyud): ro/ rma bya'i mjug ma la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dug/ thams cad sel bar 'gyuraro// de nyid kyis rims dang / mig gi nad dang / gzer thabs la sogs pa sel bar
254a6(rgyud): byed do// srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing la no dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags
254a7(rgyud): pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na lA ma yin gyi sngags 'joms par byed do// dus gsum du nyin mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras theg po che la no dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi btags pa'i sbyin
254a8(rgyud): sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na long sung thob par 'gyur// lha dbang du bya bar 'din a ga ru'i lam shing la zho dang / sdang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg dus gsum du ston nas/ 
254b1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// 'bras thug po che la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dbang
254b2(rgyud): du byed na gu gul gyi ril bu la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// shing mya ngan med kyi yam shing gis ni gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o// klu rnams
254b3(rgyud): leklu shing gi me tog gis bya'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la ni a ga ru'i yam shing gis bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa la ni bo so 'cha'i shing gi yam shing giso// a ga ru'i yam shing la du ru ska'i
254b4(rgyud): 'bru mar gyis btags pas ni dri za la sbyin sreg bya'o// da yi dgas rnams ni bil ba'i shing gi yam shing giso// mi 'am ci rnams la ni sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis// log
254b5(rgyud): 'dren thams cad la ni zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// rgyal po'i bu la ni yungs kar til mar gyis ba tags pa dus gsum du zhag bdun lo sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
254b6(rgyud): bya zhing nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyuraro// rig pa thams cad tshim par byed par 'dod na ba gcin dang // nas kyi kha zas
254b7(rgyud): za zhing rtsa u shir las gzugs brnyan byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas nas 'o mas khrus byas te bzlas pa brgyad bzlas shing / a ga ru'i dud pas
254b8(rgyud): bdugs ni tsham zhing rgyas par byas par 'gyuraro// lan gcig bzlas pas bdag srung ba byas par 'gyur/ lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan srung ba byas par 'gyuraro// lan gsum bzlas pa byas pas
255a1(rgyud): rdzas srung babyas par 'gyuraro// lus chad pa dang / zhem pa dang / dug gis reg pa dang / pur dus btab pa rnams la brtan par byed par 'dod na/ 
255a2(rgyud): sman u shi ri las gzugs brnyan du byas te me tog dkar pos mchod la/ 'dis gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i ras ris kyi mdun du yungs kar gyi rgyal po la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags
255a3(rgyud): la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rig pa nye bar dmigs nas phur bu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// ji srid du bzlas kyang rig pa 'bras bu med par shes na gi'u wang gis gro ba la bris te/ gro ba de la brgya rtsa
255a4(rgyud): brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dang lhan cig stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la ku sha'i stan de nyid du gnyid
255a5(rgyud): log na rmi lam du 'ongs te 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston par 'gyu ro// ci ste me tog pad+ma sgrub par 'dod ni can dan dam po las padad+ma byas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsu
255a6(rgyud): bsnyung ba byas te/ pad+ma lag pa g.yas par bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na g.yog 'khor nyi shu dang na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los
255a7(rgyud): bsgrer bar 'gyur/ thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// ci ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyis dang / byem bsres nas
255a8(rgyud): rdo rje byas la bslangs pa'i khazas kyis 'tsho zhing ma smra ba'i dka' thub dang / lam 'gog par byed cing rdo rje bzung ste myur du bzlas pa 'bum bya'o// rdo rje ni rtsi gcig par byas te/ rdo rje/ 
255b1(rgyud): de yungs kar gyi nang du bzhag la/ yungs kar de ji srid du tsi ti'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas pa byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ rdo rje de blangs nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ ri'i// 
255b2(rgyud): rtse mo yang phye mar byed la/ klu'i shing yang skems par byed cing chu ba yang rgyun phyogs las bzlog par byed do// klu rnams 'byed par byed do// dug rnams dug med par byed// srog
255b3(rgyud): chags thams cad rengs par byed do// rmongs par byed do// ltung bar byed// sngags phye mar byed do// shing rta la sogs pa yang rengs par byed do// de la sogs pa'i las thams cad
255b4(rgyud): byed par 'di nyid rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes sgrub par byed de/ ga cug spyod kyis kyang mngon sum du gegs byed par mi nuso// / 'di'i cho gas rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas
255b5(rgyud): kyi spyan gyi sngags kyis thogs ma dang tha mar lan re re bzla/ sa pa byas na de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur zhing grub pa yang ma ngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu
255b6(rgyud): bo la yi ge gcig pas pad+ma 'bum dor na dpal rang 'ongs nas mchog dang / rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed do// ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'bum phrag gsum dor nas kun la dbang
255b7(rgyud): pa'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// lnga 'bum bzlas na 'dzam+bu'i gling gi bdag por 'gyur ro// sa 'og tu 'jug pa'i sgor rkang pa bzhag ste 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom
255b8(rgyud): nas dgos pa med par 'gyur zhing / zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis lan thams cad 'byin par 'gyuraro// ci ste de nyid du 'dug nas yang khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyuraro// 
256a1(rgyud): ci ste 'khor lo nang du byung na yang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal bar 'gyuraro// bsams pa tsam gyis phyir gso bar yang nuso// nam yang phyir
256a2(rgyud): rab tu 'jug par yang mi 'gyur ro// yang de'i dang de'i tshes gcig nas brnams te dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog la lan gcig bzlas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyis mthe bo'i drung du bzhag
256a3(rgyud): pa byas na/ ji tsam na zhabs kyi mthe bong nas 'od zer byung nas sgrub pa po de'i lus la zhugs par gyur gyi bar du byas na/ de'i mod kho na la ska 'khyil zhing 'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// 'khor dang
256a4(rgyud): bcas pa na mkha' la 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang gyur ro// bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su ras ris nub phyogasu bstan te bzhan
256a5(rgyud): la klu shing gi me rab tu spar nas rgya mtsho la dmigs nas klu shing gi me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jig
256a6(rgyud): par mi bya'o// ji srid rgya mtsho las bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra ba na khyod nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces bya bar smra bar bya'o// de nas gang ci bsgo ba de
256a7(rgyud): thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// sa la pad+ma mdab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te/ de'i steng du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa byas na pad+ma de sa las 'phags nas g.yog 'khor stong dang bcas pa
256a8(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro// lam gcod par byed par yang mi nus so// 'od dpag tshad lngar snang bar byed par 'gyuraro// 
256b1(rgyud): cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba byed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pa re res bzlas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi steng du 'bum phrag gcig pul na ji srid gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
256b2(rgyud): sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs kyi bar du byas na de'i mod kho na la mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur // 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur// 
256b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dang lhan cig gal te rig pa zlo bar byed na de nges par 'ong bar 'gyuraro// mngon sum du bzlas na yang 'ong bar 'gyuraro// gal te 'ong bar mi byed na de'i mgo 'gas pa 'am skam
256b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// yi ge gcig pa 'di ni gzhan ci zhig yin te/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid mngon sum yin te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na
256b5(rgyud): sngags dang rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa / dado// gdugs dkar po dang / gzi brjid phung / po la sogs pa ni 'di'i g.yog 'khor yin te/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal
256b6(rgyud): po thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin te/ cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la sbar bar bya zhing / gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o// dngos grub dam pa 'dod/ 
256b7(rgyud): pas kyang gnas ma yin par sbyar bar mi bya'o// gal te sbyor bar byed na grub pa dam par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing / mdor na lha thams cad kyang 'dis 'gugs par byed do// de nas gter 'byin
256b8(rgyud): par 'dod na gang du gter yod pa der song la rtsa ba mi gnag pa'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi bde gus byugs te/ tsan dan dkar po dang chus nang du bcug ste/ stong rtsa brgyad mngon pa
257a1(rgyud): bsngags pa byas na/ gal te gter yod nas de rang bye bar 'gyuraro// gal te gter de mi gang tsam na yod na chus gtor la khru gang tsam brkos la
257a2(rgyud): blang bar bya'o// ci ste seng ge sgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyis dang gi wang 'de gus bsres pa'i gong bu las byas nas bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji srid 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du
257a3(rgyud): bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'gul ba na 'grub par 'gyuraro// rgyab tu zhon na rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra zhing 'khyil pa'i skra dang / bdag dang bcas pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang nam
257a4(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa ji lta bar lo// stong phrag dgur 'tsho bar 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du glang po ched
257a5(rgyud): ma he bsgrub par bya'o// gang gi tshe seng ge sang ge'i sgra sgrog sa pa de'i tshe lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar 'gyuraro// pad+ma'i mtshor phyin nas pad+ma 'bum gyis mchod nas kun gyi
257a6(rgyud): rgyal thabs thob par 'gyuraro// shing ka ra bi ra'i mo tog kham 'bus pa'i sprin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo thob par 'gyuraro// sna ma'i me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu/ 
257a7(rgyud): bo la sngags dang bcas pas gtor na gang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob par gyur zhing grub pa mchog thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de
257a8(rgyud): gang du 'ongs pa der dbang po yang de la stan stobs par 'gyur ro// lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang ring po nas mthong na 'jigs pas dga' bar 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyi rgyal po
257b1(rgyud): thams cad du yang 'gyur ro// de ltar rgya cher bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge mi mchog gis gsungs pa yin no// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal
257b2(rgyud): gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i las kyi cho ga dang / ras ris bstan pa'i
257b3(rgyud): le'u rab 'byam las nyi shu pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang
257b4(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ de de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha tshogs thams cad dang / sa/ dngas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs
257b5(rgyud): rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bsta na pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor du gyur
257b6(rgyud): pa/ chos kyi mdzod dang / 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa'i phyir nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur pa'o// dus kyi tha ma'i dus de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
257b7(rgyud): pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag stongs pa nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub pa'i dus chod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi mdzod yang
257b8(rgyud): dag par srung ba'i phyir gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po ni thun mong du gyur cing gter du gyur par 'gyur ba yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa
258a1(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa byas na thob pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dang
258a2(rgyud): rgyud rnams kyi 'di ni snying por gyur pa yin te/ gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ni mchog tu gyur pa yin no// yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba 'di bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa
258a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po gter du gyur pa/ snying por gyur pa/ mchog tu gyur pa/ gtso bor gyur pa sngon yi ge/ 
258a4(rgyud): gcig po sngon byung bar gyur to// 'das pa'i dus dang 'das pa/ dus chod du gang ga'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
258a5(rgyud): pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
258a6(rgyud): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i dran pa tsam mam/ mtshan 'dzin pas
258a7(rgyud): kyang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyang zad par 'gyur ro// gang gis mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can mang po nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur na sngags 'grub pa lta smos
258a8(rgyud): kyang ci dgos/ sngags zlos pa thams cad kyis kyang nges par tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i de la dang por
258b1(rgyud): ngag gis kyang phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
258b2(rgyud): de la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin du de nas 'od dpag med dang / rin chen teg la phyag bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas ci 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na myur
258b3(rgyud): du 'grub pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi mtshan yongasu bsgrags pa dang / phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i phyir dang / 
258b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal bas ni nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang / dge ba'i tshogs/ 'di yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems
258b5(rgyud): dpa'i grangs su 'gro zhing de'i sngags kyang myur du 'grub pa so/ la bar 'gyuraro// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rna ma par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa
258b6(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang sngags dang / rgyud thams cad kyi
258b7(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu gtsang ba dang / gtsang ba dam pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la
258b8(rgyud): phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// slob ma mo yin pa dang / chos dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du ston pa dang / bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / gzhan gyis pham pa dang / ma
259a1(rgyud): rungs pa dang / nga rgyal can dang / ston pa dang / bstan pa la nyes pa tshol ba la ni nam yang rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o// rgyal ba'i sras la
259a2(rgyud): rab tu mi dang ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang mchod pa dang / rje su gzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas smin par mi bya'o// de la ni sngags 'grub pa mi snang ste// / 
259a3(rgyud): dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang // byang chub sems la rtag tu ni// mchod dang rje su gzung de gcer byed// de la sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur zhes/ 
259a4(rgyud): cho ga 'dir ni yang dag bstan// sngags chen yi ge gcig pa/ ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar// 'ji ga rten mgon 'dis sngags 'di ni// re ba skyed byed stsol ba yin// 
259a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin// sngags rnams ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni// rang byung nyid kyis sngon gsungs pa// lus can sdig pas
259a6(rgyud): rmongs rnams la// sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yin// de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyis sngags// ston pa'i gzugasu yang dag gnas// de dag la ni snying por gyur// rig pa'i rgyal
259a7(rgyud): po rdzu 'phrul che// yi ge gcig por rtag par gnas// ther zug tu yang 'di rab 'jug/ 'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas yin// chos kyi tshul la yang dag gan/ 
259a8(rgyud): 'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin// sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub// rgyal po ma rungs bzlog byed yin// las ni sna tshogs byed pa yin// las kun ma lus sgrub pa'o// las ni rtsa brgyad stong/ 
259b1(rgyud): po rnams// nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster// 'jam dpal gyis ni snying po ni// yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan// yi ge
259b2(rgyud): u dang rtag 'gro zhes// 'jig rten na ni rtag 'jug 'gyur// tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal// dbang pos nges pa'i don du gsungs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sangs rgyas kyis// dab
259b3(rgyud): gi don du 'di rab sbyin// des na dus mtha'i 'jig rten 'dir// ston pa mya ngan 'das pa na// cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas/ 
259b4(rgyud): rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin// der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byed pa/ dpog med bskal par gnas pa dang // tshe la dbang bar byin
259b5(rgyud): gyis brlabs// de nyid phyir na de mtshan gyur// dpag med tshe dang ye shes nges// 'jig rten kun gyimango'i dbang / rdzu 'phrul che 'di de bzhin gshegs// des ni sngags mchog/ 
259b6(rgyud): gtso 'di byin// sangs rgyas sras po blo dang ldan// sras kyi gtso bo dam pa ni// rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che// de nas sras po de nyid kyis// 'di ni kun tu bzang la sbyor// de nas sangs
259b7(rgyud): rgyas sras rnams la// de ni de bzhin gshegs dag gis// sngags rnams kyis ni mchog gyur pa// chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa ni// 'byung po rnams la phan don du// sngags rnams
259b8(rgyud): ma lus gsungs pa yin// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
260a1(rgyud): lo/ sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshe dpag tu med pa dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de rnam
260a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum sngags bzlas par bya'o// yi ge gcig po de gang zhe na/ muM/ grogs po dag 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin
260a3(rgyud): gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bzhugs te/ gsungs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang / 
260a4(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo// dag la gzigs nas/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus chod du mkhyen
260a5(rgyud): nas dus kyi tha ma la dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i ma rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po/ 
260a6(rgyud): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun
260a7(rgyud): tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rje su gzung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnasu
260a8(rgyud): rang gi lus la bzhag go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas dus kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus chod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te/ rtsod pa'i dus dang / bstan
260b1(rgyud): pa 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i don byed par 'gyuraro// 'di'i cho ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs gzhon nu nyon cig/ bdag nyid
260b2(rgyud): chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste/ dang por re shig ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar bstan pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'o mas
260b3(rgyud): 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / sngags gzhan la mi rten pa dang / gzhan la mi sems pa dang / skyabs gsum yongasu blangs pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / khrims
260b4(rgyud): lnga'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa dang / byang chub sems da pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas pa byas/ da la/ des las rnams bya ba ste/ dang por re shig ras la ri
260b5(rgyud): mo bya ba ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gi sa bri'o// gtsang ma'i ras kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba 'am/ dar la tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum gyis
260b6(rgyud): chus gtor la/ gtsang ba'i sa phyogasu gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas zla ba nya ba'i bco lnga la nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed
260b7(rgyud): pa'i bar du bri bar bya ste/ de nas bri ba spangs par bya'o// de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongasu rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o// dang por re shig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri bar
260b8(rgyud): bya'o// ras khru gang tsam mam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad dam ras khru bzhi pa la khor yug tu tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri'o// pad+ma rA ga dang / in dra ni
261a1(rgyud): la dang / shel dang / rin po che margad kyis ras ris kyi 'og gi phyogasu mdzes par bya'o// de dag gi phyogasu rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes pa'i rnam
261a2(rgyud): pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par sbreng ba dang / de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa
261a3(rgyud): seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od kyi phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kha dog cung zad dmar zhing dkar ba/ g.yon phyogasu mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
261a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po mthu chen thob phyag g.yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i lta ba dang / lag pa g.yon na skyer rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa
261a5(rgyud): me tog pri yang ku ltar stobasangs/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyi sa lus brgyan pa/ kun nas khor yug du 'od 'phro ba/ g.yas ngos su bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
261a6(rgyud): chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs shing g.yo ba po/ lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
261a7(rgyud): rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba/ ras sngon po g.yo ba dang ldan pas g.yogs pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po ches mchod phyir thogs
261a8(rgyud): byas pa/ khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel pa/ de'i g.yas ngosu 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/ gzhon nur gyur pa/ zur bud lngas mgo legs par mdzes par
261b1(rgyud): byas la/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba// dang sngon po g.yo ba can mnams pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir
261b2(rgyud): thogs byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs par song ba'i lta ba/ cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang / thal mo sbyor ba/ rnam pa thams cad kyi ma
261b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu rtags dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin cing / dbus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang / mgo
261b4(rgyud): mngon par btud paras ris kyi zur gyi mtha' ma'i phyogasu bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogasu
261b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis bri bar bya ba la sa la dab po'i rgyal po dang / rin chen tog khor yug tu kun nas/ 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ g.yon phyogs su gser thug
261b6(rgyud): dang / 'od srung rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ me tog thams cad kyis btsal bkram pa/ pad+ma'i gdan gnyis la bzhugs pa/ ha cang mi ring ba na chos 'chad cing skyil mo
261b7(rgyud): krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa sprin gyi nang nas ro stod byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyun mkha' la
261b8(rgyud): lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya ba mngon par bri bar bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ kun nas 'bar ba 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ phyag g.yo/ 
262a1(rgyud): pas chos gos kyi mtha' ma la 'dzin pa 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ 
262a2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris cho ga bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te/ 'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang rab
262a3(rgyud): tu 'gran pa/ brtson 'grus mtshungs pa/ stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che ba/ mdor na de bzhin gsheg sa pa thams
262a4(rgyud): cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba yin/ yig gcig pa la tshig rgya cher bstan pa gang yin pa deH/ mas cad kyang byed do// ma bsgrubs kyang bzlas pa tsam
262a5(rgyud): gyis kyang las rnams byed na bsgrubs pa sa lta smos kyi/ nga ci dgos/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sun tsho/ sa pa dang / 'dod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// 
262a6(rgyud): yid kyis gang mngon par 'dod pa der ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de nyid bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
262a7(rgyud): pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
262a8(rgyud): tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do// 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes brjod do// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes brjod do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying pon brjod do// 
262b1(rgyud): yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do// mdor na 'di'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang gis phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khya'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam
262b2(rgyud): par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khya'o// sgrub pa med pa dang / sngon du spyod pa ma byas pa dang / khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa dang / gza' ba thams cad sha dang cha
262b3(rgyud): dang / grong gi chos la rab tu zhugs pa dag la yang 'grub ste/ dad pa med pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med ni ma gtogs te/ 'di dag la ni grub pa med do// dkon mchog
262b4(rgyud): gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa la gnod / byed pa dang / 'di dag la yang las phra mo yang grub pa med na grub pa 'bring dang / rab la ni lta smos kyang ci
262b5(rgyud): dgos/ 'dod pa thams cad dang / bza' ba dang /  de pa gtsor byed pa'i sgrub pa po la ni las stong rtsa brgyad kyi las phran tshegs la rab tu sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur// 
262b6(rgyud): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ dang por re shig lan gcig bzlas pas bdag srung // lan ga nyis bzlas pas gzhan srung bar 'gyuraro// lan gsum bzlas pas srung ba dam par 'gyuraro// 
262b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pas kyang yang dag par bskyod par mi nus na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ tshon sna lnga'i skud
262b8(rgyud): pa la len bzhi bzlas nas rked par bcings na sa bon bsdams par 'gyur ba yin te/ rmi lam na yang 'di la sa bon 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rang 'dod pa ni ma gtogs te/ de nyin
263a1(rgyud): bar ram mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod pa na nyi ma re re zhing bya'o// ci ste mi 'dod na thal ba la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas lte ba'i phyogasu bskus na zhag
263a2(rgyud): bdun phrag gsum du sa bon bsdams pa byas par 'gyuraro// lan lnga bzlas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sgom na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// zla ba gzas zin cing zla ba'i dkyil
263a3(rgyud): 'khor thams cad 'dzin pa na shIng ar ka'i me rab tu sbyar la/ ras ris med kyang shar du mngon par bltas te mar gyi sregs blugs stong drag bcus sbyin bsreg bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang dang
263a4(rgyud): bachu bos par ma bcad pa/ lha'i gnas sum byas pa phyog/ sra gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin sregs rab tu sbyar na tho rang rgyal po dbang du 'gyuraro// gang smras pa de
263a5(rgyud): thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// gal te dbang du ma gyur pa de 'i tshe de'i sems phyi ci log tu 'gyur ba'am/ sems ga yeng ba thob par 'gyur na phyir yang bzlog par bya
263a6(rgyud): ste/ 'o ma'i sregs blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na/ gang de'i dus de nas brtsams nas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// las de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa dang / dkon
263a7(rgyud): mchog gsum la dad pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la ni mi bya ste/ gal te byed na shin tu bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan dag la
263a8(rgyud): gnod pa byed pa ma rungs pa'i sems dang / drag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bya ba yin// nyin re zhing yang mthong ba sbyin par byas na sems zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te zhi bar ma gyur na/ 
263b1(rgyud): pung khrol chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// srog gi lhag ma tsam lus par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang lasu 'gyur ba ni zla ba gzas zin gyi du su shing ba la sha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te mar gyi bsregs
263b2(rgyud): blugs stong rtsa brgyad byes na tho rang yul gyi bdag po'i rgyal po spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// de dang lhan cig gros byas na bsams pa den pa nye bar ston par 'gyur te/ de la bstan ngag byas na zla
263b3(rgyud): beb drug gi nang du bsod nams stong yod pa'i grong ster bar 'gyuraro// gal te mtshan phyed du sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gsum gyis ster bar 'gyuraro// gal te thun thams cad kyi mtshan mo sbyin sreg/ 
263b4(rgyud): byas na zla ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur ro// gal te zla gtsi ngag gi mtshan mo re re la sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyu ro// yang na yul dang 'dra ba'i grong ngam/ yang na
263b5(rgyud): gzhan cung zad nor yod pa la yang dgra yod par mi 'argyu/ ra te/ gal te dgra yod na yang las rnams byas te zla ba gzas zin pa ni shing a pa margas me rab tu sbar la
263b6(rgyud): shing pa la sha'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas bram ze'i skal sprin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// de'i tha mar shing pi tsu marda'i lo ma la ske tse'i 'bru mar
263b7(rgyud): gyis btags pa'i sregs blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rang bram ze dgra zhi bar 'gyuraro// gal te rgyal po sdang bar gyur na las gzhan yang yod de/ zla ba gzas zin
263b8(rgyud): bal shing ji snyed pas me rab tu sbar la mor gyi sregs blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ sbyin sreg gi tha mar phyogs gang na rgyal po yod pa de phyogasu thal ba de gtor na/ 
264a1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// dus gang la longs spyod gang 'dod pa rgya che bde dag gi srog kyang byed par 'gyuraro// grong nyung ba'am/ mang po rab tu ster bar 'gyur te/ nges par zla ba drug
264a2(rgyud): gis don yod par 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas rigs bzhi las gang yang rung ba rtags gtso bo dang ldan pa'am lha gzhan nam/ 'jig rten pa la dad pa dag sems 'khrug par gyur na phyogs gang na ga
264a3(rgyud): pa deng thal ba de gtor ni yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/ skyo bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mtshan mo dpal bar 'gyur ba'am/ nye du la gnod par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir gso ba ni 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyan
264a4(rgyud): kyis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur// yang na bza'ang ni po nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang / ras ris sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs pa/ 
264a5(rgyud): mam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gos gtsang ma bgos shing nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/ srog chags med pa'i chus las bya zhing / me tog dkar po dri zhim po/ 
264a6(rgyud): gur gum dang ldan pa dang / gra pur gyi dud pas bdug par bya'o// gang du las la sbyar ba ni bram ze'i dag la ni shing pa la shes bya'o// rgyal rigs kyi dag la ni shing a shod thas bya'o// rje'u
264a7(rgyud): rigs kyi dgra la ni shing seng ldeng gis bya'o// dmangs rigs kyi dgra la ni de las gzhan pa'i shing gis me rab tu sbar la de nyid kyi las bya'o// bram ze'i la ni shing pa la sha'i yam shing dang / 
264a8(rgyud): rgyal rigs la ni a shwad tha'i yam shing dang / rje'u rigs la ni seng ldeng gi yam shing dang / dmangs rigs la ni a pa marga'i yam shing ngam/ de las gzhan ji snyed pas mar gyi sbyin
264b1(rgyud): bsreg bya'o// de bzhin du las gzhan yang bya ba ni rgya len po ni shing a par tsi ti'i rtsa ba'i yam shing dang / mar gyi sregs blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin bsreg bya'o// tha mar yang de nyid kyi thal bas
264b2(rgyud): gtor bar bya'o// gang gi phyogs nas sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyog su gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ro// yang na ut+pa la'i phyag rgya
264b3(rgyud): bcings na de 'jigs na ldog pa'am/ de mag gi tshogs nyams par 'gyur ba'am/ gzhan gang cung zad rnam par ltung ba chen por 'gyur ba'am/ 'go ba'i nad chen po 'am/ sems sdug bsnga
264b4(rgyud): bar gnas pa'am/ gang gis 'di'i ngag ldog par 'gyur ba da'am/ 'di dag dang / gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// gos la mngon par bsngags
264b5(rgyud): te bgos na skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro// mig sman la mngon par sngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro// mig dang gdong la lan bdun bsngags pa byas
264b6(rgyud): la khros pa'i gdong la bltas na zhi ba dang dbang du 'gyur ro// me tog dang / 'bras bu 'am/ gzhan gang cung zad dri zhim pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas la rgyal po la
264b7(rgyud): byin na de bsnams pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhan sems can gang la la mthong ba tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyuraro// yan lag thams cad na ba la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa byas
264b8(rgyud): la chu dron mos khrus byas na bde legasu gnas par 'gyur te/ las 'di rnams ni bya ba yin no// sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad dang / mgon med par gyur pa dang / spen pa
265a1(rgyud): dang / bstan pa 'di'i brtul zhugs can dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa la ni 'di lta bu'i las mi bya'o// bud med la yang las mi bya'o// de bzhin du byis
265a2(rgyud): pa dang / rgan po dang / nad pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sems can phra mo dang / skyes nas ngan par skyes pa 'di dag la yang mi bya ste/ las 'di dag ni sems can chen
265a3(rgyud): po dag la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// dpa' zhing brkam chags babe chol med/ phyogs chen nor ni che ba dang / mngon po'i nga rgyal rab gtum la// las ni 'di 'dra bya ba yin// bstan
265a4(rgyud): la zhe sdang khro ba dang / gzhan gyi nor ni 'phrog byed dang /  sngags rnams kun dang sman rnams dang // rnal 'byo// dar ldan la ma dad dang // spris brtsam gdug pa'i sems
265a5(rgyud): ldan dang // 'jig rten gyis smad rgyal po ste// 'di dag la ni las sbyar bya// chos dang ldan la rnam par spangs// las rnams gzhan yang 'di skad brjod// blo yis de ni
265a6(rgyud): yongasu spangs// de nyid khros pas thal ba ni// bzlas pas phyogasu gtor byos na// de rnams dgra ni rab khros dang // rgyal po dag kyang rnam 'jig 'gyur// nges par skye bo de dag kyang // 
265a7(rgyud): yun ring nad kyis thebs par 'gyur// de dag phyogasu 'chi ba mang // 'go ba'i nad kyang rab tu snang // shin tu nyon mongs cher gyur kyang // las rnams 'di dag bya min te// der ni skye bo'i bdag
265a8(rgyud): po kun// zhag bdun gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur// las rnams brtsams nas sngon du ni/ bdun phrag gnyis la yang dag brtul// bdun pa dang pos sems rnams g.yeng / 
265b1(rgyud): zhag bdun gnyis pas nad kyis 'debs// bdun pa gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur// de bas de ni yongasu spangs// dang po 'di dag rnam par 'byed// gnyis par phyogasu rnam par 'khyam// zhag
265b2(rgyud): bdun gsum pa rnam par 'jig/ de bas las ni bya ba min// sems can gdul bya'i don nyid la// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas thugs ni dag pa yis// gdug pa'i
265b3(rgyud): las 'di gsung mi 'gyur// srog la gnod par byed pa'i las// sangs rgyas kun gyis smad pa yin// grub pa mchog ni rab 'dod pa'i// zlos pas de dag bya ba min// dmyal ba dag tu skye
265b4(rgyud): ba'i las// 'di dag nyid la rab tu snang // dkar nag 'bras bur 'byung byed pa// 'di dag kho na bstan pa yin// 8/ las rnams sna tshogs bdag nyid che// rkang gnyis mchog/ 
265b5(rgyud): gis ji bzhin gzigs// rtag tu dkar las dkar ba byung // nag las nag pa rab tu sbyin// 'dres las 'dres pa'i las rnams ni// 'dres pa dag tu rnam par smin
265b6(rgyud): de bzhin las 'di sna tshogasu// de nyid sangs rgyas gzigs pa yin// thugs rje can gyis gsungs pa'o// de las zlos pa spang bya ba// nag dang 'dres pa'i las nyid do// dge byed
265b7(rgyud): dkar po bsten par bya// dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byung // srog gcod pas ni zlos pa dag/ yang dang yang du dmyal bar 'gro/ de bzhin de las log pa'i chos// 'tshe med las
265b8(rgyud): ni dam pa yin// dge ba'i blos ni sngags rnams dang // de bzhin mtho ris thar grub pa// legs byas las kyis thob pa yin// 'gal ba'i las kyis 'gal bar gsungs// ji/ 
266a1(rgyud): ltar chos dang chos min gsungs// thams cad mkhyen nyid spyod pa yin// zlos pa grub pa 'dod pa yin// dge ba'i las ni brtsams par bya// zlos pa dge
266a2(rgyud): la gnas pa la// de yi sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// dkar po'i las la gzhol byed la// de yi thar pa mi ldog 'gyur// sngags kyis dge ba 'grub 'gyur zhes// de bzhin gsheg/ 
266a3(rgyud): pas rab tu gsungs// las rnams sna tshogs gsungs pa ni// sgrub pa rnams la bsdus don yin// ci 'dod las ni stong phrag brgyad// phra mo'i las ni byed pa na// sgrub pa po ni mi
266a4(rgyud): 'grub ste// grub pa mchog ni mi 'thob bo// 'bad pas pa zlo sa dang sbyin sreg bya// grub pa 'bring ni grub par 'gyuradar// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyi ni// tha ma myur du 'grub par
266a5(rgyud): 'gyur// mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi// las ni rnam pa gsum du bstan// dka' thub can ni zlos mchog gi/ de bzhin grub pa mchog thob 'gyur// de bzhin bzlas pa ba
266a6(rgyud): ma yin// bar ma'i las grub thob pa yin// de bzhin zlos pa tha mas ni// tha ma'i las la yang dag rten// grub pa phra mo thob par yang // gzhan gyi grub pa thob ma yin// dus dang chod
266a7(rgyud): dang bzlas pa dang // sbyin sreg mthong bas bzhin grub pa// mchog gis mchog ni grub pa dang // bar mas bar ma'i grub pa snang // tha mas tha ma'i las dag la// phran tshegs grub pa
266a8(rgyud): thob pa yin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa rtsa ba'i rgyud 'phags pa
266b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi snying po'i cho ga rab 'byam las le'u rtsa gci rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal
266b2(rgyud): med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i thabs la las thams cad don sgrub pa nyon cig/ 
266b3(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i sngags sam/ yi ge drug po ma'i mtha' can khyod kyis sngar bstan pa yi ge drug pa'i snying po 'am/ dang po na oM yod pa'i yi ge ga cig pa'i ras
266b4(rgyud): ris dang po 'di nyid kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stongs shing rtsod pa'i dus tha mar
266b5(rgyud): phyin pa na 'jig rten skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa na cho ga'i rgyal po 'di nyid skyob par 'gyur ba dang / skyabs
266b6(rgyud): su gyur pa dang / gnas su gyur pa dang / dpung gnyen du gyur par 'gyur ro// dang po re shig snga ma bzhin du ras ma nyams pa skra shad dang bral ba/ zhag bdun nam nag bdun gsum gyi
266b7(rgyud): bar du thag pas btags pa kha tshar dang bcas pa gur gum dang / tsan dan gyi chus bsang gtor byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing
266b8(rgyud): chos 'chad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzigs bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su nor bzang dang / 'phags blo gros mi zad pa dang / 'jam dpal yang bcom ldan
267a1(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon phyogasu kun tu bzang po dang / 'phags
267a2(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / bzang skyong dang / legs skyes kyang bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sku las shin tu chung bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan
267a3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nor bzang ni log na rnga yab thogs par bya'o// 'og tu ni sa'i lha mo rin po che'i za ma tog lag na thogs pa ro stod sa las byung ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 
267a4(rgyud): steng du ni rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gnyis phreng ba 'dzin pa da sprin gyi nang nas char gtong ba rig pa dang bcas pa bri ba/ dar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang lag na
267a5(rgyud): me tog thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la rnam par lta ba dang / rgyan dang ldan pa/ dang ba'i lta ba dang / ro stod bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la 'dud pa dang bcas pa
267a6(rgyud): 'dir gzhug par bya'o// de 'di lta bu'i ras ris sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub tu bstan te bzhag la/ 'jam dpal 'di'i yi ge gcig pa bzlas pa 'bum bya'o// 
267a7(rgyud): shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang / dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang / gos lan gsum rje ba dang / rtag tu gso sbyong byed pa dang / tshed rngad dang / nas can khyer gang
267a8(rgyud): tsam dang / 'o ma dang / slongs me'i zas kyi 'tsho ba'o// zas kyang cha rnam pa bzhir byas te/ cha gcig ni dkon mchog gsum la'o// gnyis pa ni 'jal dpal la'o// gsum
267b1(rgyud): pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// bzhi pa ni bdag nyid nye bar spyad par bya'o// mi thub pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das yid la bya ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i yid dang / 
267b2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi don ci yang mi byed cing / gzhan sems can thams cad kyi don 'dir bya'o zhes bsgoms nas bzlas par bya'o// khrus dang / dri dang / me tog dang / spos dang / bshos dang
267b3(rgyud): mar me dag kyang dbul bar bya'o// khrus ni ras ris kyi grib ma 'am/ gzugs brnyan la bya'o// dri ni 'og tu gtor bar bya'o// me tog dang / bshos kyang rtag tu dbu lo// de nyid du 'di dag
267b4(rgyud): la sngar mchod par bya ste/ dang po dkon mchog gsum dang / de'i 'og tu byams pa dang / de'i 'og tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / na mkha
