419b6(rgyud): sdong bu dang sngun chen pos mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo du bsgrub par byas la/ des mig la bskus na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// a ma la/ bi ma le/ ku ma ku me
419b7(rgyud): sa ma ye na/ b+had d+hi si b+ha ni du na/ id tsha ya de bo bar sha ti b+hu b+h+yo ta ya ti grA dza ti pausma ya ma hA ra dze/ sa ma d+hi b+ha ra ta ya tu/ de be b+h+yo/ ma nu She b+ho/ gaM d+ha ra b+he b+h+yo/ shi gi gra ha de ba
419b8(rgyud): A nan+ta s+ya griha/ nai ya a ka ma na ya/ kra ma na ya dzu ho mi swA hA// sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bsnyen pa'i cho ga byas la khang pa'i mdun gyi dbus su bo lcis byugs la gru bzhir bris te ku/ 
420a1(rgyud): sha chal par bkras nas me sbyar nas a ga'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad drangs la sngags bzlas shing me tog re re me la sbyin pasreg byas na 'dod pa'i skyes pa dang bu
420a2(rgyud): med 'gugs par 'gyur zhes mkhas pas de ltar shes par byas la gus par bya'o// dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// 
420a3(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing bsgyur ba'o// 
420a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sI khyA to nA mA d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas degasungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum
420a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha lo// 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag na mo ratsA tra yA ya/ namo b+ha ga ba te/ d+harma d+hA tu ni gar dzi ta rAn+da ya/ ta thA ga tA yo/ ar+ha te sam kr-i bud+d+hA ya/ nam
420a6(rgyud): many+dzu shrI ye/ ku mA ra b+hU ta ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM dz+nyA na lo ka/ tri rat+na bai sha sa d+ha ri ni/ b+ha gaM bA ti/ a bA ya da ha ta me bo d+hi tsita te badz+ra pa ri ba lA ya/ sa man+ta/ a ba/ 
420a7(rgyud): b+ha sai ha na ha na/ sarba satwa saM ta na pa ti ta/ kle shAM nud che shA ya/ bi ra lak+Sha Na/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI re/ bo d+hi satwa shi shU ba ti pU lA ya/ bud+d+hA na de shA ya/ de ba nA ga yak+Sha/ 
420a8(rgyud): gan+d+harba/ a su ra/ ga ru DA/ kin nar/ ma hi ra ga/ ma hor ga/ be she swa pA ya/ a pa yaM dang ti swA hA/ gzungs 'oda'i phan yon ni lan gcig
420b1(rgyud): brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong du las kyis sgrib pa bsags pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'chi gar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
420b2(rgyud): dbang phyug thor tshugs kyis dbu rgyan pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur// mdor na gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni mtha' yas so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa ni/ 
420b3(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar bya dang / lo tsA ba ban dze ka'i dbang pos bsgrur/ 
420b4(rgyud): rgyu gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sa ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsab ba na de de bcan dras gtan la pa 'a dkon mchog gsum la phyag la
420b5(rgyud): lo/ 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs tebla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ dbus mo g.yas
420b6(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
420b7(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig pa mthong bar bgyi ste/ rig pa dam 'di smras na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems
420b8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legaso leg so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis rig pa smos shig/ bdag gis bcom ldan
421a1(rgyud): 'das kyi gsungs gis smra bar bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po chos thams cad la
421a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te mchod pa byas nas rig pa smras so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHna ma many+dzu shI yai/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ oM many+dzu ba ra/ many+dzu g+ho Sha/ ha na ha na/ btsa pa/ ma ta ma ta/ 
421a3(rgyud): ma tha ma tha/ bi d+hA sA ya bi d+hA sA ya/ ka ra ka ra/ tru ta tru ta/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ a b+hi sa a b+hi si/ tu Ta tu Ta/ tu Ta tu Ta/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ hri da yaM ba d+ha ni/ na maHsaM bo d+ha ni/ pra b+he sa/ pra b+he sa
421a4(rgyud): lo ta lo ta/ kri Ta kri Ta/ kri da kri da kri da kri da/ kri Ta kri Ta/ ha sa ha sa/ pra bran d+ha/ pra bran d+ha/ a b+hi sha a b+hi sha/ hU hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ swA hA// gang zhig gis nam pyad
421a5(rgyud): na lan gsum brjod/ nyi ma la yang lan bdun brjod pa byas na/ rig pa chen mo thob par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi se shai lo ka gsum brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cha
421a6(rgyud): ni tsan dan gyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ zhun mar gyi mar mes kyang mchod nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur/ ma grub kyang sho lo ka brgya nyi ma re re la 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 
421a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bstan pa 'dis ma grub na gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga byas na bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa 'jam
421a8(rgyud): dpal gyis smod btsugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// na mo many+dzu shrI ye/ ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ 
421b1(rgyud): trad+ya byA/ oM a ra dze bar dze/ shud d+he bi shud d+he/ she rnon/ bid+hini/ a ma la/ bi ma le/ dza ya/ brtan/ ru ruH le/ nAn+da hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ swAhA/ gang gis gzungs 'di 'a
421b2(rgyud): bar byed/ klog par byed/ ston par byed pa den tho rno ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lan cig bton na gdungs pargya 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa ma lus par byang ba/ 
421b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na
421b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// 'phags pa/ 
421b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bAkyaM te dzA ya/ oM hA kye She She sA/ oM bA kye kha na dza ye/ oM bAkya niny+dza a/ oM bA kye ya na ma/ oM bAkye da na ma/ 'phags
421b6(rgyud): pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan 'di nyid lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byung ngo // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzog so// 
421b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+ha Ta ra ka s+ya pradz+nyA bud d+hi bar d+ha na nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 
421b8(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo many+dzu shrI ya ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ra dze bi ra dza/ shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ni bi shu d+ha ni/ sho d+ha sa bi sho d+ha ya/ bi
422a1(rgyud): ma la dzes pa ti ru ru tsa le hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA// gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa de zla ba gcig gis blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// 
422a2(rgyud): gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig bklags na bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag
422a3(rgyud): gcig bzlas pa na mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyis zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal
422a4(rgyud): te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga nyi du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing / nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/ 
422a5(rgyud): rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// 'phags pa
422a6(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i cho ga/ tad+ya thA/ oM k+ShI gsang sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ las thams
422a7(rgyud): cad byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po// re ba thams cad yongs su skong bar mdzad pa ste/ so shing la sngags nas bcangs na so ne ba 'byung ngo // mig na ba la
422a8(rgyud): rgya ma tshwa brtags pa la lan bdun bsngags te mig bkang na mig nad sel to// mi'i khong du mtshon gyi dum bu lus pa la zhun mar snying pa la lan bdun nam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te blung
422b1(rgyud): pa'amang rma khar bskus na mtshon gyis dum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zas mazhu ba dang / lbos te gsung pa dang / chad pas 'khru ba la mu rang tsha'am/ rgyam tsha'am/ yang na lan chagan/ 
422b2(rgyud): gang yang rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las grol te de nyid kyi nyin par sos par 'gyur ro// glad pa na ba la bya rog gi sgro la lan bdun sngags te byabs na nad de sos
422b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyi yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma aSh+Ta
422b4(rgyud): sha ta ka na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mche na brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ dal phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ 
422b5(rgyud): thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bsngags pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod pa bgyi// gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ 
422b6(rgyud): gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med// mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs// 'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags// bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral// mthu stsal
422b7(rgyud): bsam yas rmad du byung // sku gsung phrin las bsam mi khyab// de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab// stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can// stong pa'i chos dang yang dag
422b8(rgyud): ldan/ stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// srid pa gsum po stong par ston// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// sa rnams kun gyi bdag dang ldan// sems/ 
423a1(rgyud): can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du// mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms// pas
423a2(rgyud): kyis rgol ba tshar gcod pa// smra ba'i seng ge'i mi yi mchog/ dul zhing nyon mongs dgra rnams dang // sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'// sems can thams cad yongs su skyob// 
423a3(rgyud): grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa// ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs// bgrang nor thogs shing phyag 'khar bsnams// dag
423a4(rgyud): cing dag la rnams dang ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' bdag mdzad// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma'i/ spyan// pad+ma'i ze ba'i kha dog 'dra// bzhugs pa'i gdan
423a5(rgyud): khri pad+ma lags// gtsang ma ud pa la sngon po bsnams/ bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan// khyod ni sang so rgyas rang sangs rgyas// khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas
423a6(rgyud): lags/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes// bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po// 'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'// khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bdag/ khyod ni zhi ba'i
423a7(rgyud): sems can rnams// kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso// khyod ni khyu mchog skye dgu'i gtso// thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgos// rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa/ 
423a8(rgyud): rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs// 'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod// zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod// rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lcags// dbang phyugs che khyod khyab
423b1(rgyud): 'jug khyod// k+Sha yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod// de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags// lha man dbang po thags bzangs ras// mgadamar gapa' lag pa pa
423b2(rgyud): sangs/ spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lhags// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// 'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral// khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog/ 'jig rten
423b3(rgyud): mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig/ ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa// dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs// bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi rdzi// kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab/ 
423b4(rgyud): dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags// khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin// mi 'dul kha lo bsgyur ba'i mtsho gra/ blo gros ldan dang rtogs dang ldan// blo dang ldan zhing
423b5(rgyud): mkhas pa lags// khyed ni bsod nams dpag bsam/ shing // byang chub yan lag me tog rgyan// rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// lus can kun
423b6(rgyud): gyi mchog tu gyur// yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa// sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod// khyod ni mjug rings bza' mchog lags// khyod ni drang srong
423b7(rgyud): thub pa mchog/ khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo lags// ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso// mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin// 
423b8(rgyud): khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin// khyod no me dang rlung lta bu// khyed ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar// sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad// 'byung po kun gyis phyag
